atk-s0514a3:1476: “Sabbesu vippamuttesu, ye tattha samāgatā tadā āsuṃ;
atk-s0514a3:1480: Nandiṃ pavesi nagaraṃ, bandhanā mokkho aghositthā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:1481_0: Tattha rājaparisā cāti rājaparisāpi tīhi saṅkhehi abhisiñciṃsu. Rājakaññāyo cāti
atk-s0514a3:1481_1: khattiyadhītaropi naṃ abhisiñciṃsu. Devaparisā cāti sakko devarājā vijayuttarasaṅkhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1481_2: gahetvā devaparisāya saddhiṃ abhisiñci. Devakaññāyo cāti sujāpi devadhītarāhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0514a3:1481_3: abhisiñci. Celukkhepamakarunti nānāvaṇṇehi vatthehi dhaje ussāpetvā uttarisāṭakāni
atk-s0514a3:1481_4: ākāse khipantā celukkhepaṃ kariṃsu. Rājaparisā ca itare tayo koṭṭhāsā cāti abhisekakārakā
atk-s0514a3:1481_5: cattāropi koṭṭhāsā kariṃsuyeva. Ānanditā ahunti āmoditā ahesuṃ. Nandiṃ pavesi nagaranti
atk-s0514a3:1481_6: candakumārassa chattaṃ ussāpetvā nagaraṃ paviṭṭhakāle nagare ānandabheri cari. “Kiṃ
atk-s0514a3:1481_7: vatvā”ti? Yathā “amhākaṃ candakumāro bandhanā mutto, evameva sabbe bandhanā muccantū”ti.
atk-s0514a3:1482_0: Bodhisatto pitu vattaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Antonagaraṃ pana pavisituṃ na labhati. Paribbayassa
atk-s0514a3:1482_1: khīṇakāle bodhisatto uyyānakīḷādīnaṃ atthāya gacchanto taṃ upasaṅkamitvā “patimhī”ti
atk-s0514a3:1482_2: na vandati, añjaliṃ pana katvā “ciraṃ jīva sāmī”ti vadati. “Kenattho”ti vutte ārocesi.
atk-s0514a3:1482_3: Athassa paribbayaṃ dāpesi. So dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā āyupariyosāne devalokaṃ pūrayamāno agamāsi.
atk-s0514a3:1483_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi devadatto maṃ
atk-s0514a3:1483_1: ekaṃ nissāya bahū māretuṃ vāyāmamakāsī”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi. Tadā khaṇḍahālo
atk-s0514a3:1483_2: devadatto ahosi, gotamīdevī mahāmāyā, candādevī rāhulamātā, vasulo rāhulo, selā uppalavaṇṇā,
atk-s0514a3:1483_3: sūro vāmagotto kassapo, bhaddaseno moggallāno, sūriyakumāro sāriputto, candarājā
atk-s0514a3:1487_0: Ahu rājā videhānanti idaṃ satthā laṭṭhivanuyyāne viharanto uruvelakassapadamanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1487_1: ārabbha kathesi. Yadā hi satthā pavattitavaradhammacakko uruvelakassapādayo jaṭile
atk-s0514a3:1487_2: dametvā magadharājassa paṭissavaṃ locetuṃ purāṇajaṭilasahassaparivuto laṭṭhivanuyyānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1487_3: agamāsi. Tadā dvādasanahutāya parisāya saddhiṃ āgantvā dasabalaṃ vanditvā nisinnassa
atk-s0514a3:1487_4: magadharañño parisantare brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ vitakko uppajji “kiṃ nu kho uruvelakassapo
atk-s0514a3:1487_5: mahāsamaṇe brahmacariyaṃ carati, udāhu mahāsamaṇo uruvelakassape”ti. Atha kho bhagavā
atk-s0514a3:1487_6: tesaṃ dvādasanahutānaṃ cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya “kassapassa mama santike pabbajitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1489: Pucchāmi taṃ kassapa etamatthaṃ, kathaṃ pahīnaṃ tava aggihutta”nti. ;
atk-s0514a3:1491: “Rūpe ca sadde ca atho rase ca, kāmitthiyo cābhivadanti yaññā;
atk-s0514a3:1492: Etaṃ malanti upadhīsu ñatvā, tasmā na yiṭṭhe na hute arañji”nti. ; –
atk-s0514a3:1493_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā attano sāvakabhāvaṃ pakāsanatthaṃ tathāgatassa pādapiṭṭhe sīsaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1493_1: ṭhapetvā “satthā me, bhante, bhagavā, sāvakohamasmī”ti vatvā ekatālaṃ dvitālaṃ titālanti
atk-s0514a3:1493_2: yāva sattatālappamāṇaṃ sattakkhattuṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā oruyha tathāgataṃ vanditvā
atk-s0514a3:1493_3: ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā mahājano “aho mahānubhāvo buddho, evaṃ thāmagatadiṭṭhiko
atk-s0514a3:1493_4: nāma attānaṃ ‘arahā’ti maññamāno uruvelakassapopi diṭṭhijālaṃ bhinditvā tathāgatena
atk-s0514a3:1493_5: damito”ti satthu guṇakathaññeva kathesi. Taṃ sutvā satthā “anacchariyaṃ idāni sabbaññutappattena
atk-s0514a3:1493_6: mayā imassa damanaṃ, svāhaṃ pubbe sarāgakālepi nārado nāma brahmā hutvā imassa diṭṭhijālaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1493_7: bhinditvā imaṃ nibbisevanamakāsi”nti vatvā tāya parisāya yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0514a3:1494_0: Atīte videharaṭṭhe mithilāyaṃ aṅgati nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi dhammiko dhammarājā.
atk-s0514a3:1494_1: Tassa rucā nāma dhītā ahosi abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā kappasatasahassaṃ patthitapatthanā
atk-s0514a3:1494_2: mahāpuññā aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ nibbattā. Sesā panassa soḷasasahassā itthiyo vañjhā
atk-s0514a3:1494_3: ahesuṃ. Tassa sā dhītā piyā ahosi manāpā. So tassā nānāpupphapūre pañcavīsatipupphasamugge
atk-s0514a3:1494_4: anagghāni sukhumāni vatthāni ca “imehi attānaṃ alaṅkarotū”ti devasikaṃ pahiṇi. Khādanīyabhojanīyassa
atk-s0514a3:1494_5: pana pamāṇaṃ natthi. Anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ “dānaṃ detū”ti sahassaṃ sahassaṃ pesesi. Tassa
atk-s0514a3:1494_6: kho pana vijayo ca sunāmo ca alāto cāti tayo amaccā ahesuṃ. So komudiyā cātumāsiniyā
atk-s0514a3:1494_7: chaṇe pavattamāne devanagaraṃ viya nagare ca antepure ca alaṅkate sunhāto suvilitto
atk-s0514a3:1494_9: visuddhaṃ gaganatalaṃ abhilaṅghamānaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ disvā “ramaṇīyā vata bho dosinā
atk-s0514a3:1494_10: ratti, kāya nu kho ajja ratiyā abhirameyyāmā”ti amacce pucchi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:1507: Kāyajja ratiyā rattiṃ, viharemu imaṃ utu”nti.
atk-s0514a3:1508_0: Tattha pahūtayoggoti bahukena hatthiyoggādinā samannāgato. Anantabalaporisoti anantabalakāyo.
atk-s0514a3:1508_1: Anāgateti pariyosānaṃ appatte, anatikkanteti attho. Cātumāsāti catunnaṃ vassikamāsānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1508_2: pacchimadivasabhūtāya rattiyā. Komudiyāti phullakumudāya. Mhitapubbeti paṭhamaṃ sitaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1508_3: katvā pacchā kathanasīle. Tamanupucchīti taṃ tesu amaccesu ekekaṃ amaccaṃ anupucchi.
atk-s0514a3:1508_4: Paccekaṃ brūtha saṃ rucinti sabbepi tumhe attano attano ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ ruciṃ paccekaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1508_5: mayhaṃ kathetha. Komudajjāti komudī ajja. Juṇhanti juṇhāya nissayabhūtaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1508_6: abbhuggacchati. Byapahataṃ tamanti tena sabbaṃ andhakāraṃ vihataṃ. Utunti ajja rattiṃ
atk-s0514a3:1509: Iti rājā amacce pucchi. Tena te pucchitā attano attano ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ kathaṃ kathayiṃsu. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:1515: Ye te vasaṃ na āyanti, vasaṃ upanayāmase;
atk-s0514a3:1516: Esā mayhaṃ sakā diṭṭhi, ajitaṃ ojināmase’.
atk-s0514a3:1522: Uttamo ussavo ajja, na yuddhaṃ mama ruccati.
atk-s0514a3:1530: ‘Na hete dullabhā deva, tava kāmehi modituṃ;
atk-s0514a3:1531: Sadāpi kāmā sulabhā, netaṃ cittamataṃ mama.
atk-s0514a3:1534: Yo najja vinaye kaṅkhaṃ, atthadhammavidū ise’.
atk-s0514a3:1536: Vijayassa vaco sutvā, rājā aṅgati mabravi;
atk-s0514a3:1540: Yo najja vinaye kaṅkhaṃ, atthadhammavidū ise.
atk-s0514a3:1542: ‘Sabbeva santā karotha matiṃ, kaṃ upāsemu paṇḍitaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:1543: Yo najja vinaye kaṅkhaṃ, atthadhammavidū ise’.
atk-s0514a3:1549: Taṃ deva payirupāsemu, so no kaṅkhaṃ vinessati’.
atk-s0514a3:1552: Migadāyaṃ gamissāma, yuttaṃ yānaṃ idhā nayā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:1553_0: Tattha haṭṭhanti tuṭṭhapahaṭṭhaṃ. Ojināmaseti yaṃ no ajitaṃ, taṃ jināma. Eso mama
atk-s0514a3:1553_1: ajjhāsayoti. Rājā tassa kathaṃ neva paṭikkosi, nābhinandi. Etadabravīti rājānaṃ alātassa
atk-s0514a3:1553_2: vacanaṃ anabhinandantaṃ appaṭikkosantaṃ disvā “nāyaṃ yuddhajjhāsayo, ahamassa cittaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1553_3: gaṇhanto kāmaguṇābhiratiṃ vaṇṇayissāmī”ti cintetvā etaṃ “sabbe tuyha”ntiādivacanaṃ abravi.
atk-s0514a3:1554_0: Vijayo etadabravīti rājā sunāmassapi vacanaṃ nābhinandi, na paṭikkosi. Tato vijayo
atk-s0514a3:1554_1: “ayaṃ rājā imesaṃ dvinnampi vacanaṃ sutvā tuṇhīyeva ṭhito, paṇḍitā nāma dhammassavanasoṇḍā
atk-s0514a3:1554_2: honti, dhammassavanamassa vaṇṇayissāmī”ti cintetvā etaṃ “sabbe kāmā”tiādivacanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1554_3: abravi. Tattha tava mupaṭṭhitāti tava upaṭṭhitā. Moditunti tava kāmehi modituṃ abhiramituṃ
atk-s0514a3:1554_4: icchāya sati na hi ete kāmā dullabhā. Netaṃ cittamataṃ mamāti etaṃ tava kāmehi abhiramaṇaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1554_5: mama cittamataṃ na hoti, na me ettha cittaṃ pakkhandati. Yo najjāti yo no ajja. Atthadhammavidūti
atk-s0514a3:1554_6: pāḷiatthañceva pāḷidhammañca jānanto. Iseti isi esitaguṇo.
atk-s0514a3:1555_0: Aṅgati mabravīti aṅgati abravi. Mayhampetaṃva ruccatīti mayhampi etaññeva ruccati.
atk-s0514a3:1555_1: Sabbeva santāti sabbeva tumhe idha vijjamānā matiṃ karotha cintetha. Alāto etadabravīti
atk-s0514a3:1555_2: rañño kathaṃ sutvā alāto “ayaṃ mama kulūpako guṇo nāma ājīvako rājuyyāne vasati,
atk-s0514a3:1555_3: taṃ pasaṃsitvā rājakulūpakaṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā etaṃ “atthāya”ntiādivacanaṃ abravi.
atk-s0514a3:1555_4: Tattha dhīrasammatoti paṇḍitoti sammato. Kassapagottāyanti kassapagotto ayaṃ. Sutoti
atk-s0514a3:1556: Rañño taṃ kathaṃ sutvā sārathino tathā kariṃsu. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:1574: Na te apanayī rājā, akataṃ bhūmimāgate”ti.
atk-s0514a3:1575_0: Tattha tassa yānanti tassa rañño rathaṃ yojayiṃsu. Dantanti dantamayaṃ. Rūpiyapakkharanti
atk-s0514a3:1575_2: vigatadosāya rattiyā mukhaṃ viya, candasadisanti attho. Tatrāsunti tatra ahesuṃ.
atk-s0514a3:1575_3: Kumudāti kumudavaṇṇā. Sindhavāti sindhavajātikā. Anilūpamasamuppātāti vātasadisavegā.
atk-s0514a3:1575_4: Setacchattanti tasmiṃ rathe samussāpitaṃ chattampi setaṃ ahosi. Setarathoti sopi
atk-s0514a3:1575_5: ratho setoyeva. Setassāti assāpi setā. Setabījanīti bījanīpi setā. Niyyanti tena
atk-s0514a3:1575_6: rathena niggacchanto amaccagaṇaparivuto vedeharājā cando viya sobhati.
atk-s0514a3:1576_0: Naravarādhipanti naravarānaṃ adhipatiṃ rājādhirājānaṃ. So muhuttaṃva yāyitvāti so
atk-s0514a3:1576_1: rājā muhutteneva uyyānaṃ gantvā. Pattī guṇamupāgamīti pattikova guṇaṃ ājīvakaṃ upāgami.
atk-s0514a3:1576_2: Yepi tattha tadā āsunti yepi tasmiṃ uyyāne tadā puretaraṃ gantvā taṃ ājīvakaṃ payirupāsamānā
atk-s0514a3:1576_3: nisinnā ahesuṃ. Na te apanayīti amhākameva doso, ye mayaṃ pacchā agamimhā, tumhe
atk-s0514a3:1576_4: mā cintayitthāti te brāhmaṇe ca ibbhe ca raññoyeva atthāya akataṃ akatokāsaṃ bhūmiṃ
atk-s0514a3:1577: Tāya pana omissakaparisāya parivutova ekamantaṃ nisīditvā paṭisanthāramakāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:1586: Appābādho casi kacci, cakkhuṃ na parihāyati’.
atk-s0514a3:1588: Taṃ guṇo paṭisammodi, vedehaṃ vinaye rataṃ;
atk-s0514a3:1592: Kacci arogaṃ yoggaṃ te, kacci vahati vāhanaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:1599: Kathaṃ care ācariye, puttadāre kathaṃ care.
atk-s0514a3:1606_0: Tattha mudukā bhisiyāti mudukāya sukhasamphassāya bhisiyā. Muducittakasanthateti
atk-s0514a3:1606_1: sukhasamphasse cittattharaṇe. Mudupaccatthateti mudunā paccattharaṇena paccatthate.
atk-s0514a3:1606_2: Sammodīti ājīvakena saddhiṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathesi. Tatoti tato nisajjanato
atk-s0514a3:1606_3: anantarameva sāraṇīyaṃ kathaṃ kathesīti attho. Tattha kacci yāpaniyanti kacci te,
atk-s0514a3:1606_4: bhante, sarīraṃ paccayehi yāpetuṃ sakkā. Vātānamaviyaggatāti kacci te sarīre dhātuyo
atk-s0514a3:1606_5: samappavattā, vātānaṃ byaggatā natthi, tattha tattha vaggavaggā hutvā vātā na bādhayantīti attho.
atk-s0514a3:1607_0: Akasirāti niddukkhā. Vuttīti jīvitavutti. Appābādhoti iriyāpathabhañjakenābādhena
atk-s0514a3:1607_1: virahito. Cakkhunti kacci te cakkhuādīni indriyāni na parihāyantīti pucchati. Paṭisammodīti
atk-s0514a3:1607_2: sammodanīyakathāya paṭikathesi. Tattha sabbametanti yaṃ tayā vuttaṃ vātānamaviyaggatādi,
atk-s0514a3:1607_3: taṃ sabbaṃ tatheva. Tadubhayanti yampi tayā “appābādho casi kacci, cakkhuṃ na parihāyatī”ti
atk-s0514a3:1608_0: Na balīyareti nābhibhavanti na kuppanti. Anantarāti paṭisanthārato anantarā pañhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1608_1: pucchi. Tattha atthaṃ dhammañca ñāyañcāti pāḷiatthañca pāḷiñca kāraṇayuttiñca. So
atk-s0514a3:1608_2: hi “kathaṃ dhammaṃ care”ti pucchanto mātāpituādīsu paṭipattidīpakaṃ pāḷiñca pāḷiatthañca
atk-s0514a3:1608_3: kāraṇayuttiñca me kathethāti imaṃ atthañca dhammañca ñāyañca pucchati. Tattha kathañceke
atk-s0514a3:1608_4: adhammaṭṭhāti ekacce adhamme ṭhitā kathaṃ nirayañceva atho sesaapāye ca patantīti
atk-s0514a3:1608_6: pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ pucchitabbakaṃ mahesakkhapañhaṃ rājā kiñci ajānantaṃ naggabhoggaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1609_0: Sopi evaṃ pucchito pucchānurūpaṃ byākaraṇaṃ adisvā carantaṃ goṇaṃ daṇḍena paharanto
atk-s0514a3:1609_1: viya bhattapātiyaṃ kacavaraṃ khipanto viya ca “suṇa, mahārājā”ti okāsaṃ kāretvā attano
atk-s0514a3:1609_2: micchāvādaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:1615: Natthi deva paro loko, ko tato hi idhāgato.
atk-s0514a3:1617: ‘Natthi deva pitaro vā, kuto mātā kuto pitā;
atk-s0514a3:1618: Natthi ācariyo nāma, adantaṃ ko damessati.
atk-s0514a3:1621: Natthi balaṃ vīriyaṃ vā, kuto uṭṭhānaporisaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:1622: Niyatāni hi bhūtāni, yathā goṭaviso tathā.
atk-s0514a3:1629_0: Tattha idhāgatoti tato paralokato idhāgato nāma natthi. Natthi deva pitaro vāti deva,
atk-s0514a3:1629_1: ayyakapeyyakādayo vā natthi, tesu asantesu kuto mātā kuto pitā. Yathā goṭaviso tathāti
atk-s0514a3:1629_2: goṭaviso vuccati pacchābandho, yathā nāvāya pacchābandho nāvameva anugacchati, tathā
atk-s0514a3:1629_3: ime sattā niyatameva anugacchantīti vadati. Avaso devavīriyoti evaṃ dānaphale asati
atk-s0514a3:1629_4: yo koci bālo dānaṃ deti, so avaso avīriyo na attano vasena balena deti, dānaphalaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1629_5: pana atthīti saññāya aññesaṃ andhabālānaṃ saddahitvā detīti dīpeti. Bālehi dānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1629_6: paññattanti “dānaṃ dātabba”nti andhabālehi paññattaṃ anuññātaṃ, taṃ dānaṃ bālāyeva
atk-s0514a3:1630: Evaṃ dānassa nipphalataṃ vaṇṇetvā idāni pāpassa nipphalabhāvaṃ vaṇṇetuṃ āha –
atk-s0514a3:1633: Tejo pathavī āpo ca, vāyo sukhaṃ dukhañcime;
atk-s0514a3:1634: Jīve ca sattime kāyā, yesaṃ chettā na vijjati.
atk-s0514a3:1636: “Natthi hantā va chettā vā, haññe yevāpi koci naṃ;
atk-s0514a3:1640: Na so chindati te kāye, tattha pāpaphalaṃ kuto.
atk-s0514a3:1643: Anāgate tamhi kāle, saññatopi na sujjhati.
atk-s0514a3:1646: Pāpañcepi bahuṃ katvā, taṃ khaṇaṃ nātivattare.
atk-s0514a3:1650_0: Tattha kāyāti samūhā. Avikopinoti vikopetuṃ na sakkā. Jīveti jīvo. “Jīvo”tipi pāṭho,
atk-s0514a3:1650_1: ayameva attho. Sattime kāyāti ime satta kāyā. Haññe yevāpi koci nanti yo haññeyya,
atk-s0514a3:1650_2: sopi nattheva. Vītivattareti imesaṃ sattannaṃ kāyānaṃ antareyeva caranti, chindituṃ
atk-s0514a3:1650_3: na sakkonti. Siramādāyāti paresaṃ sīsaṃ gahetvā. Nisitāsināti nisitena asinā chindati,
atk-s0514a3:1650_4: na so chindatīti sopi te kāye na chindati, pathavī pathavimeva upeti, āpādayo āpādike,
atk-s0514a3:1651_0: Saṃsaranti mahārāja, ime sattā imaṃ pathaviṃ ekamaṃsakhalaṃ katvāpi ettake kappe
atk-s0514a3:1651_1: saṃsarantā sujjhanti. Aññatra hi saṃsārā satte sodhetuṃ samattho nāma natthi, sabbe
atk-s0514a3:1651_2: saṃsāreneva sujjhanti. Anāgate tamhi kāleti yathāvutte pana etasmiṃ kāle anāgate
atk-s0514a3:1651_3: appatte antarā saññatopi parisuddhasīlopi na sujjhati. Taṃ khaṇanti taṃ vuttappakāraṃ
atk-s0514a3:1651_4: kālaṃ. Anupubbena no suddhīti amhākaṃ vāde anupubbena suddhi, sabbesaṃ amhākaṃ anupubbena
atk-s0514a3:1651_5: suddhi bhavissatīti attho. Iti so ucchedavādo attano thāmena sakavādaṃ nippadesato kathesīti.
atk-s0514a3:1657: Piṅgalo nāmahaṃ āsiṃ, luddo goghātako pure.
atk-s0514a3:1660: Bahū mayā hatā pāṇā, mahiṃsā sūkarā ajā.
atk-s0514a3:1663: Natthi nūna phalaṃ pāpaṃ, yohaṃ na nirayaṃ gato”’ti.
atk-s0514a3:1664_0: Tattha alāto etadabravīti so kira kassapadasabalassa cetiye anojapupphadāmena pūjaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1664_1: katvā maraṇasamaye aññena kammena yathānubhāvaṃ khitto saṃsāre saṃsaranto ekassa
atk-s0514a3:1664_2: pāpakammassa nissandena goghātakakule nibbattitvā bahuṃ pāpamakāsi. Athassa maraṇakāle
atk-s0514a3:1664_3: bhasmapaṭicchanno viya aggi ettakaṃ kālaṃ ṭhitaṃ taṃ puññakammaṃ okāsamakāsi. So
atk-s0514a3:1664_4: tassānubhāvena idha nibbattitvā taṃ vibhūtiṃ patto, jātiṃ saranto pana atītānantarato
atk-s0514a3:1664_5: paraṃ parisarituṃ asakkonto “goghātakakammaṃ katvā idha nibbattosmī”ti saññāya tassa
atk-s0514a3:1664_6: vādaṃ upatthambhento idaṃ “yathā bhadanto bhaṇatī”tiādivacanaṃ abravi. Tattha sare
atk-s0514a3:1664_7: saṃsaritattanoti attano saṃsaritaṃ sarāmi. Senāpatīkuleti senāpatikulamhi.
atk-s0514a3:1670: Passasanto muhuṃ uṇhaṃ, rudaṃ assūni vattayī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:1671: Tattha athetthāti atha ettha etissaṃ mithilāyaṃ. Paṭaccarīti daliddo kapaṇo ahosi. Guṇasantikupāgamīti guṇassa santikaṃ kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ sossāmīti upagatoti veditabbo.
atk-s0514a3:1674: Kiṃ te sutaṃ vā diṭṭhaṃ vā, kiṃ maṃ vedesi vedana”’nti.
atk-s0514a3:1675: Tattha kiṃ maṃ vedesi vedananti kiṃ nāma tvaṃ kāyikaṃ vā cetasikaṃ vā vedanaṃ pattoyaṃ, evaṃ rodanto maṃ vedesi jānāpesi, uttānameva naṃ katvā mayhaṃ ācikkhāhīti.
atk-s0514a3:1678: ‘Natthi me vedanā dukkhā, mahārāja suṇohi me.
atk-s0514a3:1681: Sāketāhaṃ pure āsiṃ, bhāvaseṭṭhi guṇe rato.
atk-s0514a3:1684: Na cāpi pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, sarāmi katamattano.
atk-s0514a3:1690: Upaḍḍhabhāgaṃ bhattassa, dadāmi yo me icchati.
atk-s0514a3:1693: Na cāpi bhūte hiṃsāmi, theyyaṃ cāpi vivajjayiṃ.
atk-s0514a3:1696: Niratthaṃ maññidaṃ sīlaṃ, alāto bhāsatī yathā.
atk-s0514a3:1703_0: Tattha bhāvaseṭṭhīti evaṃnāmako asītikoṭivibhavo seṭṭhi. Guṇe ratoti guṇamhi rato.
atk-s0514a3:1703_1: Sammatoti sambhāvito saṃvaṇṇito. Sucīti sucikammo. Idha jāto duritthiyāti imasmiṃ
atk-s0514a3:1703_2: mithilanagare daliddiyā kapaṇāya kumbhadāsiyā kucchimhi jātosmīti. So kira pubbe
atk-s0514a3:1703_3: kassapabuddhakāle araññe naṭṭhaṃ balibaddaṃ gavesamāno ekena maggamūḷhena bhikkhunā
atk-s0514a3:1703_4: maggaṃ puṭṭho tuṇhī hutvā puna tena pucchito kujjhitvā “samaṇa, dāsā nāma mukharā
atk-s0514a3:1703_5: honti, dāsena tayā bhavitabbaṃ, atimukharosī”ti āha. Taṃ kammaṃ tadā vipākaṃ adatvā
atk-s0514a3:1703_6: bhasmacchanno viya pāvako ṭhitaṃ. Maraṇasamaye aññaṃ kammaṃ upaṭṭhāsi. So yathākammaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1703_7: saṃsāre saṃsaranto ekassa kusalakammassa balena sākete vuttappakāro seṭṭhi hutvā
atk-s0514a3:1703_8: dānādīni puññāni akāsi. Taṃ panassa kammaṃ pathaviyaṃ nihitanidhi viya ṭhitaṃ okāsaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1703_9: labhitvā vipākaṃ dassati. Yaṃ pana tena taṃ bhikkhuṃ akkosantena kataṃ pāpakammaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:1703_10: tamassa tasmiṃ attabhāve vipākaṃ adāsi. So ajānanto “itarassa kalyāṇakammassa balena
atk-s0514a3:1703_11: kumbhadāsiyā kucchimhi nibbattosmī”ti saññāya evamāha. Yato jāto suduggatoti sohaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1704_0: Samacariyamadhiṭṭhitoti samacariyāyameva patiṭṭhitomhi. Nūnetanti ekaṃsena etaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:1704_1: Maññidaṃ sīlanti deva, idaṃ sīlaṃ nāma niratthakaṃ maññe. Alātoti yathā ayaṃ alātasenāpati
atk-s0514a3:1704_2: “mayā purimabhave bahuṃ pāṇātipātakammaṃ katvā senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ laddha”nti bhāsati,
atk-s0514a3:1704_3: tena kāraṇenāhaṃ niratthakaṃ sīlanti maññāmi. Kalimevāti yathā asippo asikkhito akkhadhutto
atk-s0514a3:1704_4: parājayaggāhaṃ gaṇhāti, tathā nūna gaṇhāmi, purimabhave attano sāpateyyaṃ nāsetvā
atk-s0514a3:1704_5: idāni dukkhaṃ anubhavāmi. Kassapabhāsitanti kassapagottassa acelakassa bhāsitaṃ sutvāti vadati.
atk-s0514a3:1709: ‘Sukhaṃ vā yadi vā dukkhaṃ, niyatiyā kira labbhati;
atk-s0514a3:1714_0: Tattha aṅgati mabravīti paṭhamameva itaresaṃ dvinnaṃ, pacchā bījakassāti tiṇṇaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1714_1: sutvā daḷhaṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ gahetvā etaṃ “natthi dvāra”ntiādivacanamabravi. Niyatiṃ
atk-s0514a3:1714_2: kaṅkhāti samma bījaka, niyatimeva olokehi. Cullāsītimahākappappamāṇo kāloyeva hi
atk-s0514a3:1714_3: satte sodheti, tvaṃ atituritoti adhippāyenevamāha. Anāgateti tasmiṃ kāle asampatte
atk-s0514a3:1714_4: antarāva devalokaṃ gacchāmīti mā turittho. Byāvaṭoti brāhmaṇesu ca gahapatikesu ca
atk-s0514a3:1714_5: tesaṃyeva kāyaveyyāvaccadānādikammakaraṇena byāvaṭo ahosiṃ. Vohāranti vinicchayaṭṭhāne
atk-s0514a3:1714_6: nisīditvā rājakiccaṃ vohāraṃ anusāsantova. Ratihīno tadantarāti ettakaṃ kālaṃ kāmaguṇaratiyā parihīnoti.
atk-s0514a3:1715_0: Evañca pana vatvā “bhante kassapa, mayaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ pamajjimhā, idāni pana amhehi
atk-s0514a3:1715_1: ācariyo laddho, ito paṭṭhāya kāmaratimeva anubhavissāma, tumhākaṃ santike ito uttari
atk-s0514a3:1715_2: dhammassavanampi no papañco bhavissati, tiṭṭhatha tumhe, mayaṃ gamissāmā”ti āpucchanto āha –
atk-s0514a3:1718: Tattha saṅgati ceti ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ce no samāgamo bhavissati,no ce, asati puññaphale kiṃ tayā diṭṭhenāti.
atk-s0514a3:1720: Tattha sanivesananti bhikkhave, idaṃ vacanaṃ vedeharājā vatvā rathaṃ abhiruyha attano nivesanaṃ candakapāsādatalameva paṭigato.
atk-s0514a3:1721_0: Rājā paṭhamaṃ guṇasantikaṃ gantvā taṃ vanditvā pañhaṃ pucchi. Āgacchanto pana avanditvāva
atk-s0514a3:1721_1: āgato. Guṇo attano aguṇatāya vandanampi nālattha, piṇḍādikaṃ sakkāraṃ kimeva lacchati.
atk-s0514a3:1721_2: Rājāpi taṃ rattiṃ vītināmetvā punadivase amacce sannipātetvā “kāmaguṇe me upaṭṭhāpetha,
atk-s0514a3:1721_3: ahaṃ ito paṭṭhāya kāmaguṇasukhameva anubhavissāmi, na me aññāni kiccāni ārocetabbāni,
atk-s0514a3:1721_4: vinicchayakiccaṃ asuko ca asuko ca karotū”ti vatvā kāmaratimatto ahosi. Tamatthaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1726: ‘Candake me vimānasmiṃ, sadā kāme vidhentu me;
atk-s0514a3:1733: Na cāpi brāhmaṇibbhesu, atthe kismiñci byāvaṭo”ti.
atk-s0514a3:1734_0: Tattha upaṭṭhānamhīti attano upaṭṭhānaṭṭhāne. Candake meti mama santake candakapāsāde.
atk-s0514a3:1734_1: Vidhentu meti niccaṃ mayhaṃ kāme saṃvidahantu upaṭṭhapentu. Guyhappakāsiyesūti guyhesupi
atk-s0514a3:1734_2: pakāsiyesupi atthesu uppannesu maṃ keci mā upagacchuṃ. Attheti atthakaraṇe vinicchayaṭṭhāne.
atk-s0514a3:1734_3: Nisīdantūti mayā kattabbakiccassa karaṇatthaṃ sesaamaccehi saddhiṃ nisīdantūti.
atk-s0514a3:1747_0: Tattha tatoti tato rañño kāmapaṅke laggitadivasato paṭṭhāya. Dvesattarattassāti cuddasame
atk-s0514a3:1747_1: divase. Dhātimātaramabravīti pitu santikaṃ gantukāmā hutvā dhātimātaramāha. Sā kira
atk-s0514a3:1747_2: cātuddase cātuddase pañcasatakumārikāhi parivutā dhātigaṇaṃ ādāya mahantena sirivilāsena
atk-s0514a3:1747_3: attano sattabhūmikā rativaḍḍhanapāsādā oruyha pitu dassanatthaṃ candakapāsādaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0514a3:1747_4: Atha naṃ pitā disvā tuṭṭhamānaso hutvā mahāsakkāraṃ kāretvā uyyojento “amma, dānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1747_5: dehī”ti sahassaṃ datvā uyyojeti. Sā attano nivesanaṃ āgantvā punadivase uposathikā
atk-s0514a3:1747_6: hutvā kapaṇaddhikavaṇibbakayācakānaṃ mahādānaṃ deti. Raññā kirassā eko janapadopi
atk-s0514a3:1747_7: dinno. Tato āyena sabbakiccāni karoti. Tadā pana “raññā kira guṇaṃ ājīvakaṃ nissāya
atk-s0514a3:1747_8: micchādassanaṃ gahita”nti sakalanagare ekakolāhalaṃ ahosi. Taṃ pavattiṃ rucāya dhātiyo
atk-s0514a3:1747_9: sutvā rājadhītāya ārocayiṃsu “ayye, pitarā kira te ājīvakassa kathaṃ sutvā micchādassanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1747_10: gahitaṃ, so kira catūsu nagaradvāresu dānasālāyo viddhaṃsāpetvā parapariggahitā itthiyo
atk-s0514a3:1747_11: ca kumārikāyo ca pasayhakārena gaṇhituṃ āṇāpeti, rajjaṃ na vicāreti, kāmamattoyeva
atk-s0514a3:1747_12: kira jāto”ti. Sā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā anattamanā hutvā “kathañhi nāma me tāto apagatasukkadhammaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1747_13: nillajjaṃ naggabhoggaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchissati, nanu dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇe
atk-s0514a3:1747_14: kammavādino upasaṅkamitvā pucchitabbo siyā, ṭhapetvā kho pana maṃ añño mayhaṃ pitaraṃ

atk-s0514a3:1790_4: idhalokopi nāma bhaveyya, soyeva ca natthi. Mātāpitūsu santesu puttadhītaro nāma
atk-s0514a3:1790_5: bhaveyyūuṃ, teyeva ca natthi. Dhamme sati dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇā bhaveyyūṃ, teyeva

atk-s0514a3:1800_0: Tattha pubbāparaṃ dhammanti bhikkhave, pitu vacanaṃ sutvā rucā rājadhītā atīte sattajātivasena
atk-s0514a3:1800_1: pubbadhammaṃ, anāgate sattajātivasena anāgatadhammañca jānantī pitaraṃ micchādiṭṭhito

atk-s0514a3:1800_3: hoti, so bālova samapajjatīti etaṃ mayā pubbe sutameva, ajja pana paccakkhato diṭṭhaṃ.

atk-s0514a3:1800_5: mohaṃ nigacchati, mūḷhataro hoti. Alātenāti deva, tumhehi jātigottakulapadesaissariyapuññapaññāhīnena

atk-s0514a3:1801: Evaṃ te ubhopi garahitvā diṭṭhito mocetukāmatāya pitaraṃ vaṇṇentī āha –
atk-s0514a3:1807: Kīṭova aggiṃ jalitaṃ apāpataṃ, upapajjati mohamūḷho naggabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:1809: “Saṃsārasuddhīti pure niviṭṭhā, kammaṃ vidūsenti bahū ajānaṃ;

atk-s0514a3:1811_1: paññāya sappañño, teneva kāraṇena dhīro, dhīratāya atthānatthassa kāraṇākāraṇassa
atk-s0514a3:1811_2: kovido. Bālebhi sadisanti yathā te bālā upagatā, tathā kathaṃ tvaṃ hīnadiṭṭhiṃ upagato.

atk-s0514a3:1811_4: laddhiyā sati yathā paṭaṅgakīṭo rattibhāge jalitaṃ aggiṃ disvā tappaccayaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1811_5: ajānitvā mohena tattha patanto mahādukkhaṃ āpajjati, tathā guṇopi pañca kāmaguṇe
atk-s0514a3:1812_0: Pure niviṭṭhāti tāta, saṃsārena suddhīti kassaci vacanaṃ asutvā paṭhamameva niviṭṭho
atk-s0514a3:1812_1: natthi, sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalanti gahitattā bahū janā ajānantā kammaṃ vidūsentā
atk-s0514a3:1812_2: kammaphalampi vidūsentiyeva, evaṃ tesaṃ pubbe gahito kali parājayagāho duggahitova

atk-s0514a3:1825: Ācināti ca taṃ pāpaṃ, yena gacchati duggatiṃ.
atk-s0514a3:1828: Tasseva deva nissando, yañceso labhate sukhaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:1830: “Khīyate cassa taṃ puññaṃ, tathā hi aguṇe rato;
atk-s0514a3:1838_0: Tattha nirayeti aṭṭhavidhe mahāniraye, soḷasavidhe ussadaniraye, lokantaraniraye
atk-s0514a3:1838_1: ca. Bhāroti tāta, na tāva alātassa akusalabhāro pūrati. Tassevāti tassa pubbe katassa
atk-s0514a3:1838_2: puññasseva nissando, yaṃ so alātasenāpati ajja sukhaṃ labhati. Na hi tāta, etaṃ goghātakakammassa
atk-s0514a3:1838_3: phalaṃ. Pāpakammassa hi nāma vipāko iṭṭho kanto bhavissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ. Aguṇe

atk-s0514a3:1839_0: Ohite tulamaṇḍaleti bhaṇḍapaṭicchanatthāya tulamaṇḍale laggetvā ṭhapite. Unnametīti

atk-s0514a3:1839_2: kalyāṇakammassa sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā devalokaṃ gacchati. Saggātimānoti sagge atimāno

atk-s0514a3:1840: Yañcesa idāni dāsattaṃ upagato, na taṃ kalyāṇakammassa phalena. Dāsattasaṃvattanikañhissa pubbe kataṃ pāpaṃ bhavissatīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbanti imamatthaṃ pakāsentī āha –
atk-s0514a3:1845: “Khīyate cassa taṃ pāpaṃ, tathā hi vinaye rato;
atk-s0514a3:1847: Tattha mā hevuppathamāgamāti tāta, tvaṃ imaṃ naggaṃ kassapājīvakaṃ upagantvā mā heva nirayagāmiṃ uppathaṃ agamā, mā pāpamakāsīti pitaraṃ ovadati.
atk-s0514a3:1848: Idānissa pāpūpasevanāya dosaṃ kalyāṇamittūpasevanāya ca guṇaṃ dassentī āha –

atk-s0514a3:1869_5: tagarañca aññañca gandhasampannaṃ gandhajātaṃ. Evanti evarūpā dhīrūpasevanā. Dhīro
atk-s0514a3:1870_0: Tasmā pattapuṭassevāti yasmā tagarādipaliveṭhamānāni paṇṇānipi sugandhāni honti,

atk-s0514a3:1870_4: ettha sāriputtattherādīhi sugatiṃ nītānaṃ vasena udāharaṇāni āharitabbāni.

atk-s0514a3:1874: Anāgatāpi satteva, yā gamissaṃ ito cutā.

atk-s0514a3:1889: Paṇḍitaṃ sutasampannaṃ, so maṃ atthe nivesayi.
atk-s0514a3:1892: Taṃ kammaṃ nihitaṃ aṭṭhā, nidhīva udakantike.

atk-s0514a3:1898: Sakammunā apaccissaṃ, taṃ saraṃ na sukhaṃ labhe.
atk-s0514a3:1902_0: Tattha sattāti mahārāja, idhalokaparalokā nāma sukatadukkaṭānañca phalaṃ nāma atthi.

atk-s0514a3:1902_4: Yā me sāti yā sā mama atīte sattamī jāti āsi. Kammāraputtoti tāya jātiyā ahaṃ magadhesu

atk-s0514a3:1904_1: hutvā udakantike nidhi viya nihitaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Yametanti atha mama santakesu pāpakammesu
atk-s0514a3:1904_2: yaṃ etaṃ mayā magadhesu paradārikakammaṃ kataṃ, tassa phalaṃ pacchā maṃ pariyāgaṃ

atk-s0514a3:1904_4: ṭhitassa taṃ duṭṭhaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ halāhalaṃ visaṃ kuppati, tathā maṃ pariyāgatanti attho.

atk-s0514a3:1905: So pana chagalako balasampanno ahosi. Piṭṭhiyaṃ abhiruyhapi naṃ vāhayiṃsu, yānakepi yojayiṃsu. Imamatthaṃ pakāsentī āha –

atk-s0514a3:1952_0: Tattha dassanesūti dassanaraṭṭhesu. Pasūti goṇo ahosiṃ. Niluñcitoti vacchakāleyeva
atk-s0514a3:1952_1: maṃ evaṃ manāpo bhavissatīti nibbījakamakaṃsu. Sohaṃ niluñcito uddhatabījo javo bhadro
atk-s0514a3:1952_2: ahosiṃ. Vajjīsu kulamāgamāti goyonito cavitvā vajjiraṭṭhe ekasmiṃ mahābhogakule nibbattinti
atk-s0514a3:1952_3: dasseti. Nevitthī na pumāti napuṃsakattaṃ sandhāya āha. Bhavane tāvatiṃsāhanti tāvatiṃsabhavane ahaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:1953_0: Tattha ṭhitāhaṃ, vedeha, sarāmi jātiyo imāti sā kira tasmiṃ devaloke ṭhitā “ahaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1953_1: evarūpaṃ devalokaṃ āgacchantī kuto nu kho āgatā”ti olokentī vajjiraṭṭhe mahābhogakule
atk-s0514a3:1953_2: napuṃsakattabhāvato cavitvā tattha nibbattabhāvaṃ passi. Tato “kena nu kho kammena
atk-s0514a3:1953_3: evarūpe ramaṇīye ṭhāne nibbattāmhī”ti olokentī kosambiyaṃ seṭṭhikule nibbattitvā
atk-s0514a3:1953_4: kataṃ dānādikusalaṃ disvā “etassa phalena nibbattāmhī”ti ñatvā “anantarātīte napuṃsakattabhāve
atk-s0514a3:1953_5: nibbattamānā kuto āgatāmhī”ti olokentī dassanaraṭṭhesu goyoniyaṃ mahādukkhassa anubhūtabhāvaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1953_6: aññāsi. Tato anantaraṃ jātiṃ anussaramānā vānarayoniyaṃ uddhataphalabhāvaṃ addasa.
atk-s0514a3:1953_7: Tato anantaraṃ anussarantī bhinnāgate chagalakayoniyaṃ uddhatabījabhāvaṃ anussari.
atk-s0514a3:1953_8: Tato paraṃ anussaramānā roruve nibbattabhāvaṃ anussari.
atk-s0514a3:1954_0: Athassā niraye tiracchānayoniyañca anubhūtaṃ dukkhaṃ anussarantiyā bhayaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0514a3:1954_1: Tato “kena nu kho kammena evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhūtaṃ mayā”ti chaṭṭhaṃ jātiṃ olokentī
atk-s0514a3:1954_2: tāya jātiyā kosambinagare kataṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ disvā sattamaṃ olokentī magadharaṭṭhe
atk-s0514a3:1954_3: pāpasahāyaṃ nissāya kataṃ paradārikakammaṃ disvā “etassa phalena me taṃ mahādukkhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1954_4: anubhūta”nti aññāsi. Atha “ito cavitvā anāgate kuhiṃ nibbattissāmī”ti olokentī “yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1954_5: ṭhatvā puna sakkasseva paricārikā hutvā nibbattissāmī”ti aññāsi. Evaṃ punappunaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1954_6: olokayamānā “tatiyepi attabhāve sakkasseva paricārikā hutvā nibbattissāmi, tathā
atk-s0514a3:1954_7: catutthe, pañcame pana tasmiṃyeva devaloke javanadevaputtassa aggamahesī hutvā nibbattissāmī”ti
atk-s0514a3:1954_8: ñatvā tato anantaraṃ olokentī “chaṭṭhe attabhāve ito tāvatiṃsabhavanato cavitvā aṅgatirañño
atk-s0514a3:1954_9: aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbattissāmi, ‘rucā’ti me nāmaṃ bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “tato
atk-s0514a3:1954_10: anantarā kuhiṃ nibbattissāmī”ti olokentī “sattamāya jātiyā tato cavitvā tāvatiṃsabhavane
atk-s0514a3:1954_11: mahiddhiko devaputto hutvā nibbattissāmi, itthibhāvato muccissāmī”ti aññāsi. Tasmā –
atk-s0514a3:1956: Anāgatāpi satteva, yā gamissaṃ ito cutā”ti. – ādimāha;
atk-s0514a3:1957_0: Tattha pariyāgatanti pariyāyena attano vārena āgataṃ. Satta jaccoti vajjiraṭṭhe napuṃsakajātiyā
atk-s0514a3:1957_1: saddhiṃ devaloke pañca, ayañca chaṭṭhāti satta jātiyoti vuccanti. Etā satta jātiyo
atk-s0514a3:1957_2: niccaṃ sakkatapūjitā ahosinti dasseti. Chaṭṭhā nigatiyoti devaloke pana pañca, ayañca
atk-s0514a3:1957_3: ekāti imā cha gatiyo itthibhāvāna muccissanti vadati. Sattamī cāti ito cavitvā anantaraṃ.
atk-s0514a3:1957_4: Santānamayanti ekatovaṇṭakādivasena katasantānaṃ. Ganthentīti yathā santānamayā honti,
atk-s0514a3:1957_5: evaṃ ajjapi mama paricārikā nandanavane mālaṃ ganthentiyeva. Yo me mālaṃ paṭicchatīti
atk-s0514a3:1957_6: mahārāja, anantarajātiyaṃ mama sāmiko javo nāma devaputto yo rukkhato patitapatitaṃ mālaṃ paṭicchati.
atk-s0514a3:1958_0: Soḷasāti mahārāja, mama jātiyā imāni soḷasa vassāni, ettako pana kālo devānaṃ eko
atk-s0514a3:1958_1: muhutto, tena tā mama cutabhāvampi ajānantā mamatthāya mālaṃ ganthentiyeva. Mānusinti
atk-s0514a3:1958_2: manussānaṃ vassagaṇanaṃ āgamma esa saradosataṃ vassasataṃ hoti, evaṃ dīghāyukā devā.
atk-s0514a3:1958_3: Iminā pana kāraṇena paralokassa ca kalyāṇapāpakānañca kammānaṃ atthitaṃ jānāhi, devāti.
atk-s0514a3:1959_0: Anventīti yathā maṃ anubandhiṃsu, evaṃ anubandhanti. Na hi kammaṃ vinassatīti diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1959_1: tasmiṃyeva attabhāve, upapajjavedanīyaṃ anantarabhave vipākaṃ deti, aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1959_2: pana vipākaṃ adatvā na nassati. Taṃ sandhāya “na hi kammaṃ vinassatī”ti vatvā “deva,
atk-s0514a3:1959_3: ahaṃ paradārikakammassa nissandena niraye ca tiracchānayoniyañca mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1959_4: anubhaviṃ. Sace pana tumhepi idāni guṇassa kathaṃ gahetvā evaṃ karissatha, mayā anubhūtasadisameva
atk-s0514a3:1959_5: dukkhaṃ anubhavissatha, tasmā evaṃ mā karitthā”ti āha.
atk-s0514a3:1962: “Yo icche puriso hotuṃ, jātiṃ jātiṃ punappunaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:1965: “Yā icche puriso hotuṃ, jātiṃ jātiṃ punappunaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:1972: Attano hoti atthāya, itthī vā yadi vā pumā.
atk-s0514a3:1975: Asaṃsayaṃ tehi pure suciṇṇaṃ, kammassakāse puthu sabbasattā.
atk-s0514a3:1977: “Iṅghānucintesi sayampi deva, kutonidānā te imā janinda;
atk-s0514a3:1978: Yā te imā accharāsannikāsā, alaṅkatā kañcanajālachannā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:1979_0: Tattha hotunti bhavituṃ. Sabbasamantabhogāti paripuṇṇasabbabhogā. Suciṇṇanti suṭṭhu
atk-s0514a3:1979_1: ciṇṇaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ kataṃ. Kammassakāseti kammassakā attanā katakammasseva vipākapaṭisaṃvedino.
atk-s0514a3:1979_2: Na hi mātāpitūhi kataṃ kammaṃ puttadhītānaṃ vipākaṃ deti, na tāhi puttadhītāhi kataṃ
atk-s0514a3:1979_3: kammaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ vipākaṃ deti. Sesehi kataṃ sesānaṃ kimeva dassati? Iṅghāti codanatthe
atk-s0514a3:1979_4: nipāto. Anucintesīti punappunaṃ cinteyyāsi. Yā te imāti yā imā soḷasasahassā itthiyo
atk-s0514a3:1979_5: taṃ upaṭṭhahanti, imā te kutonidānā, kiṃ nipajjitvā niddāyantena laddhā, udāhu panthadūsanasandhicchedādīni
atk-s0514a3:1979_6: pāpāni katvā, adu kalyāṇakammaṃ nissāya laddhāti idaṃ tāva attanāpi cinteyyāsi, devāti.
atk-s0514a3:1980: Evaṃ sā pitaraṃ anusāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:1984_0: Tattha iccevanti bhikkhave, iti imehi evarūpehi madhurehi vacanehi rucākaññā pitaraṃ
atk-s0514a3:1984_1: tosesi, mūḷhassa maggaṃ viya tassa sugatimaggaṃ ācikkhi, nānānayehi sucaritadhammaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1984_2: akkhāsi. Dhammaṃ kathentīyeva sā subbatā sundaravatā attano atītajātiyopi kathesi.
atk-s0514a3:1985_0: Evaṃ pubbaṇhato paṭṭhāya sabbarattiṃ pitu dhammaṃ desetvā “mā, deva, naggassa micchādiṭṭhikassa
atk-s0514a3:1985_1: vacanaṃ gaṇhi, ‘atthi ayaṃ loko, atthi paraloko, atthi sukaṭadukkaṭakammānaṃ phala’nti
atk-s0514a3:1985_2: vadantassa mādisassa kalyāṇamittassa vacanaṃ gaṇha, mā atitthena pakkhandī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a3:1985_3: Evaṃ santepi pitaraṃ micchādassanā mocetuṃ nāsakkhi. So hi kevalaṃ tassā madhuravacanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1985_4: sutvā tussi. Mātāpitaro hi piyaputtānaṃ vacanaṃ piyāyanti, na pana taṃ micchādassanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1985_5: vissajjesi. Nagarepi “rucā kira rājadhītā pitu dhammaṃ desetvā micchādassanaṃ vissajjāpesī”ti
atk-s0514a3:1985_6: ekakolāhalaṃ ahosi. “Paṇḍitā rājadhītā ajja pitaraṃ micchādassanā mocetvā nagaravāsīnaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1985_7: sotthibhāvaṃ karissatī”ti mahājano tussi. Sā pitaraṃ bodhetuṃ asakkontī vīriyaṃ avissajjetvāva
atk-s0514a3:1985_8: “yena kenaci upāyena pitu sotthibhāvaṃ karissāmī”ti sirasmiṃ añjaliṃ patiṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0514a3:1985_9: dasadisā namassitvā “imasmiṃ loke lokasandhārakā dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇā nāma lokapāladevatā
atk-s0514a3:1985_10: nāma mahābrahmāno nāma atthi, te idhāgantvā attano balena mama pitaraṃ micchādassanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1985_11: vissajjāpentu, etassa guṇe asatipi mama guṇena mama sīlena mama saccena idhāgantvā
atk-s0514a3:1985_12: imaṃ micchādassanaṃ vissajjāpetvā sakalalokassa sotthiṃ karontū”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā namassi.
atk-s0514a3:1986_0: Tadā bodhisatto nārado nāma mahābrahmā ahosi. Bodhisattā ca nāma attano mettābhāvanāya
atk-s0514a3:1986_1: anuddayāya mahantabhāvena suppaṭipannaduppaṭipanne satte dassanatthaṃ kālānukālaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1986_2: lokaṃ olokenti. So taṃ divasaṃ lokaṃ olokento taṃ rājadhītaraṃ pitu micchādiṭṭhimocanatthaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1986_3: lokasandhārakadevatāyo namassamānaṃ disvā, “ṭhapetvā maṃ añño etaṃ rājānaṃ micchādassanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1986_4: vissajjāpetuṃ samattho nāma natthi, ajja mayā rājadhītu saṅgahaṃ, rañño ca saparijanassa
atk-s0514a3:1986_5: sotthibhāvaṃ katvā āgantuṃ vaṭṭati, kena nu kho vesena gamissāmī”ti cintetvā “manussānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1986_6: pabbajitā piyā ceva garuno ca ādeyyavacanā ca, tasmā pabbajitavesena gamissāmī”ti
atk-s0514a3:1986_7: sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā pāsādikaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ manussattabhāvaṃ māpetvā manuññaṃ jaṭāmaṇḍalaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1986_8: bandhitvā jaṭantare kañcanasūciṃ odahitvā anto rattapaṭaṃ upari rattavākacīraṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0514a3:1986_9: pārupitvā suvaṇṇatārākhacitaṃ rajatamayaṃ ajinacammaṃ ekaṃse katvā muttāsikkāya pakkhittaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1986_10: suvaṇṇamayaṃ bhikkhābhājanaṃ ādāya tīsu ṭhānesu onataṃ suvaṇṇakājaṃ khandhe katvā
atk-s0514a3:1986_11: muttāsikkāya eva pavāḷakamaṇḍaluṃ ādāya iminā isivesena gaganatale cando viya virocamāno
atk-s0514a3:1986_12: ākāsena āgantvā alaṅkatacandakapāsādamahātalaṃ pavisitvā rañño purato ākāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a3:1993_0: Tattha addāti brahmaloke ṭhitova jambudīpaṃ avekkhanto guṇājīvakassa santike gahitamicchādassanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1993_1: rājānaṃ aṅgatiṃ addasa, tasmā āgatoti attho. Tato patiṭṭhāti tato so brahmā tassa
atk-s0514a3:1993_2: rañño amaccagaṇaparivutassa nisinnassa purato tasmiṃ pāsāde apade padaṃ dassento
atk-s0514a3:1993_3: ākāse patiṭṭhahi. Anuppattanti āgataṃ. Isinti isivesena āgatattā satthā “isi”nti
atk-s0514a3:1993_4: āha. Avandathāti “mamānuggahena mama pitari kāruññaṃ katvā eko devarājā āgato bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0514a3:1993_5: haṭṭhapahaṭṭhā vātābhihaṭā suvaṇṇakadalī viya onamitvā nāradabrahmānaṃ avandi.
atk-s0514a3:1994: Rājāpi taṃ disvāva brahmatejena tajjito attano āsane saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto āsanā oruyha bhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā āgataṭṭhānañca nāmagottañca pucchi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:1999: ‘Kuto nu āgacchasi devavaṇṇi, obhāsayaṃ sabbadisā candimāva;
atk-s0514a3:2000: Akkhāhi me pucchito nāmagottaṃ, kathaṃ taṃ jānanti manussaloke”’ti.
atk-s0514a3:2001: Tattha byathitamānasoti bhītacitto. Kuto nūti kacci nu kho vijjādharo bhaveyyāti maññamāno avanditvāva evaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0514a3:2002: Atha so “ayaṃ rājā ‘paraloko natthī’ti maññati, paralokamevassa tāva ācikkhissāmī”ti cintetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2004: “Ahañhi devato idāni emi, obhāsayaṃ sabbadisā candimāva;
atk-s0514a3:2005: Akkhāmi te pucchito nāmagottaṃ, jānanti maṃ nārado kassapo cā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2006: Tattha devatoti devalokato. Nārado kassapo cāti maṃ nāmena nārado, gottena kassapoti jānanti.
atk-s0514a3:2007: Atha rājā “imaṃ pacchāpi paralokaṃ pucchissāmi, iddhiyā laddhakāraṇaṃ tāva pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2009: “Accherarūpaṃ tava yādisañca, vehāyasaṃ gacchasi tiṭṭhasī ca;
atk-s0514a3:2010: Pucchāmi taṃ nārada etamatthaṃ, atha kena vaṇṇena tavāyamiddhī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2011: Tattha yādisañcāti yādisañca tava saṇṭhānaṃ, yañca tvaṃ ākāse gacchasi tiṭṭhasi ca, idaṃ acchariyajātaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2014: “Saccañca dhammo ca damo ca cāgo, guṇā mamete pakatā purāṇā;
atk-s0514a3:2015: Teheva dhammehi susevitehi, manojalo yena kāmaṃ gatosmī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2016_0: Tattha saccanti musāvādavirahitaṃ vacīsaccaṃ. Dhammoti tividhasucaritadhammo ceva
atk-s0514a3:2016_1: kasiṇaparikammajhānadhammo ca. Damoti indriyadamanaṃ. Cāgoti kilesapariccāgo ca deyyadhammapariccāgo
atk-s0514a3:2016_2: ca. Mamete guṇāti mama ete guṇasampayuttā guṇasahagatā. Pakatā purāṇāti mayā purimabhave
atk-s0514a3:2016_3: katāti dasseti. “Teheva dhammehi susevitehī”ti te sabbe guṇe susevite paricārite
atk-s0514a3:2016_4: dasseti. Manojavoti iddhiyā kāraṇena paṭiladdho. Yena kāmaṃ gatosmīti yena devaṭṭhāne
atk-s0514a3:2016_5: ca manussaṭṭhāne ca gantuṃ icchanaṃ, tena gatosmīti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2017: Rājā evaṃ tasmiṃ kathentepi micchādassanassa gahitattā paralokaṃ asaddahanto “atthi nu kho puññavipāko”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2019: “Accheramācikkhasi puññasiddhiṃ, sace hi etehi yathā vadesi;
atk-s0514a3:2020: Pucchāmi taṃ nārada etamatthaṃ, puṭṭho ca me sādhu viyākarohī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2021: Tattha puññasiddhinti puññānaṃ siddhiṃ phaladāyakattaṃ ācikkhanto acchariyaṃ ācikkhasi.
atk-s0514a3:2024: “Pucchassu maṃ rāja tavesa attho, yaṃ saṃsayaṃ kuruse bhūmipāla;
atk-s0514a3:2025: Ahaṃ taṃ nissaṃsayataṃ gamemi, nayehi ñāyehi ca hetubhī cā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2026_0: Tattha tavesa atthoti pucchitabbako nāma tava esa attho. Yaṃ saṃsayanti yaṃ kismiñcideva
atk-s0514a3:2026_1: atthe saṃsayaṃ karosi, taṃ maṃ puccha. Nissaṃsayatanti ahaṃ taṃ nissaṃsayabhāvaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2026_2: gamemi. Nayehīti kāraṇavacanehi. Ñāyehīti ñāṇehi. Hetubhīti paccayehi, paṭiññāmatteneva
atk-s0514a3:2026_3: avatvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā kāraṇavacanena ca tesaṃ dhammānaṃ samuṭṭhāpakapaccayehi
atk-s0514a3:2029: “Pucchāmi taṃ nārada etamatthaṃ, puṭṭho ca me nārada mā musā bhaṇi;
atk-s0514a3:2030: Atthi nu devā pitaro nu atthi, loko paro atthi jano yamāhū”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2031: Tattha jano yamāhūti yaṃ jano evamāha – “atthi devā, atthi pitaro, atthi paro loko”ti, taṃ sabbaṃ atthi nu khoti pucchati.
atk-s0514a3:2034: “Attheva devā pitaro ca atthi, loko paro atthi jano yamāhu;
atk-s0514a3:2035: Kāmesu giddhā ca narā pamūḷhā, lokaṃ paraṃ na vidū mohayuttā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2036: Tattha attheva devāti mahārāja, devā ca pitaro ca atthi, yampi jano paralokamāha, sopi attheva. Na vidūti kāmagiddhā pana mohamūḷhā janā paralokaṃ na vidanti na jānantīti.
atk-s0514a3:2037: Taṃ sutvā rājā parihāsaṃ karonto evamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2039: “Atthīti ce nārada saddahāsi, nivesanaṃ paraloke matānaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2040: Idheva me pañca satāni dehi, dassāmi te paraloke sahassa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2041: Tattha nivesananti nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ. Pañca satānīti pañca kahāpaṇasatāni.
atk-s0514a3:2042: Atha naṃ mahāsatto parisamajjheyeva garahanto āha –
atk-s0514a3:2044: “Dajjemu kho pañca satāni bhoto, jaññāmu ce sīlavantaṃ vadaññuṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2045: Luddaṃ taṃ bhontaṃ niraye vasantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2047: “Idheva yo hoti adhammasīlo, pāpācāro alaso luddakammo;
atk-s0514a3:2048: Na paṇḍitā tasmiṃ iṇaṃ dadanti, na hi āgamo hoti tathāvidhamhā.
atk-s0514a3:2050: “Dakkhañca posaṃ manujā viditvā, uṭṭhānakaṃ sīlavantaṃ vadaññuṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2051: Sayameva bhogehi nimantayanti, kammaṃ karitvā puna māharesī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2052_0: Tattha jaññāmu ceti yadi mayaṃ bhavantaṃ “sīlavā esa vadaññū, dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2052_1: imasmiṃ kāle iminā nāmatthoti jānitvā tassa tassa kiccassa kārako vadaññū”ti jāneyyāma.
atk-s0514a3:2052_2: Atha te vaḍḍhiyā pañca satāni dadeyyāma, tvaṃ pana luddo sāhasiko micchādassanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2052_3: gahetvā dānasālaṃ viddhaṃsetvā paradāresu aparajjhasi, ito cuto niraye uppajjissasi,
atk-s0514a3:2052_4: evaṃ luddaṃ taṃ niraye vasantaṃ bhontaṃ tattha gantvā ko “sahassaṃ me dehī”ti codessati.
atk-s0514a3:2052_5: Tathāvidhamhāti tādisā purisā dinnassa iṇassa puna āgamo nāma na hoti. Dakkhanti
atk-s0514a3:2052_6: dhanuppādanakusalaṃ. Puna māharesīti attano kammaṃ karitvā dhanaṃ uppādetvā puna
atk-s0514a3:2052_7: amhākaṃ santakaṃ āhareyyāsi, mā nikkammo vasīti sayameva bhogehi nimantayantīti.
atk-s0514a3:2053_0: Iti rājā tena niggayhamāno appaṭibhāno ahosi. Mahājano haṭṭhatuṭṭho hutvā “mahiddhiko
atk-s0514a3:2053_1: devopi ajja rājānaṃ micchādassanaṃ vissajjāpessatī”ti sakalanagaraṃ ekakolāhalaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2053_2: ahosi. Mahāsattassānubhāvena tadā sattayojanikāya mithilāya tassa dhammadesanaṃ assuṇanto
atk-s0514a3:2053_3: nāma nāhosi. Atha mahāsatto “ayaṃ rājā ativiya daḷhaṃ micchādassanaṃ gaṇhi, nirayabhayena
atk-s0514a3:2053_4: naṃ santajjetvā micchādiṭṭhiṃ vissajjāpetvā puna devalokena assāsessāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0514a3:2053_5: “mahārāja, sace diṭṭhiṃ na vissajjessasi, evaṃ anantadukkhaṃ nirayaṃ gamissasī”ti
atk-s0514a3:2055: “Ito cuto dakkhasi tattha rāja, kākolasaṅghehi vikassamānaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2056: Taṃ khajjamānaṃ niraye vasantaṃ, kākehi gijjhehi ca senakehi;
atk-s0514a3:2057: Sañchinnagattaṃ ruhiraṃ savantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2058: Tattha kākolasaṅghehīti lohatuṇḍehi kākasaṅghehi. Vikassamānanti attānaṃ ākaḍḍhiyamānaṃ tattha niraye passissasi. Tanti taṃ bhavantaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2059: Taṃ pana kākolanirayaṃ vaṇṇetvā “sacepi ettha na nibbattissasi, lokantaraniraye nibbattissasī”ti vatvā taṃ nirayaṃ dassetuṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2061: “Andhaṃtamaṃ tattha na candasūriyā, nirayo sadā tumulo ghorarūpo;
atk-s0514a3:2062: Sā neva rattī na divā paññāyati, tathāvidhe ko vicare dhanatthiko”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2063_0: Tattha andhaṃ tamanti mahārāja, yamhi lokantaraniraye micchādiṭṭhikā nibbattanti,
atk-s0514a3:2063_1: tattha cakkhuviññāṇassa uppattinivāraṇaṃ andhatamaṃ. Sadā tumuloti so nirayo niccaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2063_2: bahalandhakāro. Ghorarūpoti bhīsanakajātiko. Sā neva rattīti yā idha ratti divā ca,
atk-s0514a3:2063_3: sā neva tattha paññāyati. Ko vicareti ko uddhāraṃ sodhento vicarissati.
atk-s0514a3:2064: Tampissa lokantaranirayaṃ vitthārena vaṇṇetvā “mahārāja, micchādiṭṭhiṃ avissajjento na kevalaṃ etadeva, aññampi dukkhaṃ anubhavissasī”ti dassento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2066: “Sabalo ca sāmo ca duve suvānā, pavaddhakāyā balino mahantā;
atk-s0514a3:2067: Khādanti dantehi ayomayehi, ito paṇunnaṃ paralokapatta”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2068_0: Tattha ito paṇunnanti imamhā manussalokā cutaṃ. Parato nirayesupi eseva nayo. Tasmā
atk-s0514a3:2068_1: sabbāni tāni nirayaṭṭhānāni nirayapālānaṃ upakkamehi saddhiṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
atk-s0514a3:2068_2: vitthāretvā tāsaṃ tāsaṃ gāthānaṃ anuttānāni padāni vaṇṇetabbāni.
atk-s0514a3:2070: “Taṃ khajjamānaṃ niraye vasantaṃ, luddehi vāḷehi aghammigehi ca;
atk-s0514a3:2071: Sañchinnagattaṃ ruhiraṃ savantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2072: Tattha luddehīti dāruṇehi. Vāḷehīti duṭṭhehi. Aghammigehīti aghāvahehi migehi, dukkhāvahehi sunakhehīti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2074: “Usūhi sattīhi ca sunisitāhi, hananti vijjhanti ca paccamittā;
atk-s0514a3:2075: Kāḷūpakāḷā nirayamhi ghore, pubbe naraṃ dukkaṭakammakāri”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2076_0: Tattha hananti vijjhanti cāti jalitāya ayapathaviyaṃ pātetvā sakalasarīraṃ chiddāvachiddaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2076_1: karontā paharanti ceva vijjhanti ca. Kāḷūpakāḷāti evaṃnāmakā nirayapālā. Nirayamhīti
atk-s0514a3:2076_2: tasmiṃ tesaññeva vasena kāḷūpakāḷasaṅkhāte niraye. Dukkaṭakammakārinti micchādiṭṭhivasena
atk-s0514a3:2078: “Taṃ haññamānaṃ niraye vajantaṃ, kucchismiṃ passasmiṃ vipphālitūdaraṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2079: Sañchinnagattaṃ ruhiraṃ savantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2080: Tattha tanti taṃ bhavantaṃ tattha niraye tathā haññamānaṃ. Vajantanti ito cito ca dhāvantaṃ. Kucchisminti kucchiyañca passe ca haññamānaṃ vijjhiyamānanti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2082: “Sattī usū tomarabhiṇḍivālā, vividhāvudhā vassanti tattha devā;
atk-s0514a3:2084_0: Tattha aṅgāramivaccimantoti jalitaaṅgārā viya accimantā āvudhavisesā patanti. Silāsanīti
atk-s0514a3:2084_1: jalitasilāsani. Vassati luddakammeti yathā nāma deve vassante asani patati, evameva
atk-s0514a3:2084_2: ākāse samuṭṭhāya cicciṭāyamānaṃ jalitasilāvassaṃ tesaṃ luddakammānaṃ upari patati.
atk-s0514a3:2086: “Uṇho ca vāto nirayamhi dussaho, na tamhi sukhaṃ labbhati ittarampi;
atk-s0514a3:2087: Taṃ taṃ vidhāvantamalenamāturaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2088: Tattha ittarampīti parittakampi. Vidhāvantanti vividhā dhāvantaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2091: Patodalaṭṭhīhi sucodayantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2092: Tattha rathesu yuttanti vārena vāraṃ tesu jalitaloharathesu yuttaṃ. Kamantanti akkamamānaṃ. Sucodayantanti suṭṭhu codayantaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2095: Sañchinnagattaṃ ruhiraṃ savantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2096: Tattha tamāruhantanti taṃ bhavantaṃ jalitāvudhapahāre asahitvā jalitakhurehi sañcitaṃ jalitalohapabbataṃ āruhantaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2099: Sudaḍḍhagattaṃ kapaṇaṃ rudantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2104: Tattha kaṇṭakanicitāti jalitakaṇṭakehi citā. “Ayomayehī”ti idaṃ yehi kaṇṭakehi ācitā, te dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2108: Tattha tamāruhantīti taṃ evarūpaṃ simbalirukkhaṃ āruhanti. Yamaniddesakāribhīti yamassa vacanakarehi, nirayapālehīti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2114: Dumagge vitacaṃ gattaṃ, ko taṃ yāceyya taṃ dhana”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2115: Tattha vidaḍḍhakāyanti vihiṃsitakāyaṃ. Vitacanti cammamaṃsānaṃ chiddāvachiddaṃ chinnatāya koviḷārapupphaṃ viya kiṃsukapupphaṃ viya ca.
atk-s0514a3:2122: Sañchinnagattaṃ ruhiraṃ savantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2123: Tattha tamāruhantanti taṃ bhavantaṃ nirayapālānaṃ āvudhapahāre asahitvā āruhantaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2126: Sampatitaṃ vetaraṇiṃ, ko taṃ yāceyya taṃ dhana”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2131: Tattha kharāti pharusā. Ayopokkharasañchannāti ayomayehi tikhiṇapariyantehi pokkharapattehi sañchannā. Pattehīti tehi pattehi sā nadī tikkhā hutvā sandati.
atk-s0514a3:2134: Vetaraññe anālambe, ko taṃ yāceyya taṃ dhana”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2136: Imaṃ pana mahāsattassa nirayakathaṃ sutvā rājā saṃviggahadayo mahāsattaññeva tāṇagavesī hutvā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2138: “Vedhāmi rukkho viya chijjamāno, disaṃ na jānāmi pamūḷhasañño;
atk-s0514a3:2139: Bhayānutappāmi mahā ca me bhayā, sutvāna kathā tava bhāsitā ise.
atk-s0514a3:2142: Andhakāreva pajjoto, tvaṃ nosi saraṇaṃ ise.
atk-s0514a3:2144: “Atthañca dhammaṃ anusāsa maṃ ise, atītamaddhā aparādhitaṃ mayā;
atk-s0514a3:2145: Ācikkha me nārada suddhimaggaṃ, yathā ahaṃ no nirayaṃ pateyya”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2146_0: Tattha bhayānutappāmīti attanā katassa pāpassa bhayena anutappāmi. Mahā ca me bhayāti
atk-s0514a3:2146_1: mahantañca me nirayabhayaṃ uppannaṃ. Dipaṃvogheti dīpaṃva oghe. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
atk-s0514a3:2146_2: – āditte kāle vārimajjhaṃ viya bhinnanāvānaṃ oghe aṇṇave patiṭṭhaṃ alabhamānānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2146_3: dīpaṃ viya andhakāragatānaṃ pajjoto viya ca tvaṃ no ise saraṇaṃ bhava. Atītamaddhā
atk-s0514a3:2146_4: aparādhitaṃ mayāti ekaṃsena mayā atītaṃ kammaṃ aparādhitaṃ virādhitaṃ, kusalaṃ atikkamitvā
atk-s0514a3:2147: Athassa mahāsatto visuddhimaggaṃ ācikkhituṃ sammāpaṭipanne porāṇakarājāno udāharaṇavasena dassento āha –
atk-s0514a3:2150: Usindaro cāpi sivī ca rājā, paricārakā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2152: “Ete caññe ca rājāno, ye saggavisayaṃ gatā;
atk-s0514a3:2155: “Annahatthā ca te byamhe, ghosayantu pure tava;
atk-s0514a3:2156: ‘Ko chāto ko ca tasito, ko mālaṃ ko vilepanaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2159: ‘Ko panthe chattamāneti, pādukā ca mudū subhā’;
atk-s0514a3:2160: Iti sāyañca pāto ca, ghosayantu pure tava.
atk-s0514a3:2162: “Jiṇṇaṃ posaṃ gavāssañca, māssu yuñja yathā pure;
atk-s0514a3:2164_0: Tattha ete cāti yathā ete ca dhataraṭṭho vessāmitto aṭṭhako yāmataggi usindaro sivīti
atk-s0514a3:2164_1: cha rājāno aññe ca dhammaṃ caritvā saggavisayaṃ gatā, evaṃ tvampi adhammaṃ parivajjetvā
atk-s0514a3:2164_2: dhammaṃ cara. Ko chātoti mahārāja, tava byamhe pure rājanivesane ceva nagare ca annahatthā
atk-s0514a3:2164_3: purisā “ko chāto, ko tasito”ti tesaṃ dātukāmatāya ghosentu. Ko mālanti ko mālaṃ icchati,
atk-s0514a3:2164_4: ko vilepanaṃ icchati, nānārattānaṃ vatthānaṃ yaṃ yaṃ icchati, taṃ taṃ ko naggo paridahissatīti
atk-s0514a3:2164_5: ghosentu. Ko panthe chattamānetīti ko panthe chattaṃ dhārayissati. Pādukā cāti upāhanā
atk-s0514a3:2165_0: Jiṇṇaṃ posanti yo te upaṭṭhākesu amacco vā añño vā pubbe katūpakāro jarājiṇṇakāle
atk-s0514a3:2165_1: yathā porāṇakāle kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, yepi te gavāssādayo jiṇṇatāya kammaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0514a3:2165_2: na sakkonti, tesu ekampi pubbe viya kammesu mā yojayi. Jiṇṇakālasmiñhi te tāni kammāni
atk-s0514a3:2165_3: kātuṃ na sakkonti. Parihārañcāti idha parivāro “parihāro”ti vutto. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
atk-s0514a3:2165_4: – yo ca te balī hutvā adhikārakato pubbe katūpakāro hoti, tassa jarājiṇṇakāle yathāporāṇaparivāraṃ
atk-s0514a3:2165_5: dadeyyāsi. Asappurisā hi attano upakārakānaṃ upakāraṃ kātuṃ samatthakāleyeva sammānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2165_6: karonti, samatthakāle pana na olokenti. Sappurisā pana asamatthakālepi tesaṃ tatheva
atk-s0514a3:2165_7: sakkāraṃ karonti, tasmā tuvampi evaṃ kareyyāsīti.
atk-s0514a3:2166_0: Iti mahāsatto rañño dānakathañca sīlakathañca kathetvā idāni yasmā ayaṃ rājā attano
atk-s0514a3:2166_1: attabhāve rathena upametvā vaṇṇiyamāne tussissati, tasmāssa sabbakāmaduharathopamāya
atk-s0514a3:2187: Satipatodo dhīrassa, dhiti yogo ca rasmiyo.
atk-s0514a3:2190: Icchā lobho ca kummaggo, ujumaggo ca saṃyamo.
atk-s0514a3:2193: Paññā ākoṭanī rāja, tattha attāva sārathi.
atk-s0514a3:2196: Sabbakāmaduho rāja, na jātu nirayaṃ vaje”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2197_0: Tattha rathasaññātoti mahārāja, tava kāyo rathoti saññāto hotu. Manosārathikoti manasaṅkhātena
atk-s0514a3:2197_1: kusalacittena sārathinā samannāgato. Lahūti vigatathinamiddhatāya sallahuko. Avihiṃsāsāritakkhoti
atk-s0514a3:2197_2: avihiṃsāmayena sāritena suṭṭhu pariniṭṭhitena akkhena samannāgato. Saṃvibhāgapaṭicchadoti
atk-s0514a3:2197_4: nemiyā samannāgato. Hatthasaññamapakkharoti hatthasaṃyamamayena pakkharena samannāgato.
atk-s0514a3:2197_6: “Abbhañjitabbo nābhi hotū”tipi pāṭho. Vācāsaññamakūjanoti vācāsaṃyamena akūjano.
atk-s0514a3:2198_1: apesuññena suṭṭhu saññato samussito. Girāsakhilanelaṅgoti sakhilāya saṇhavācāya niddosaṅgo
atk-s0514a3:2198_2: maṭṭharathaṅgo. Mitabhāṇisilesito mitabhāṇasaṅkhātena silesena suṭṭhu sambandho.
atk-s0514a3:2198_3: Saddhālobhasusaṅkhāroti kammaphalasaddahanasaddhāmayena ca alobhamayena ca sundarena
atk-s0514a3:2198_4: alaṅkārena samannāgato. Nivātañjalikubbaroti sīlavantānaṃ nivātamayena ceva añjalikammamayena
atk-s0514a3:2198_5: ca kubbarena samannāgato. Athaddhatānatīsākoti sakhilasammodabhāvasaṅkhātāya athaddhatāya
atk-s0514a3:2199_2: apālambena samannāgato. Ṭhitacittamupādhiyoti lokadhammehi avikampanabhāvena suṭṭhu
atk-s0514a3:2199_3: ṭhitaekaggabhāvappattacittasaṅkhātena upādhinā uttarattharaṇena vā rājāsanena samannāgato.
atk-s0514a3:2199_4: Kālaññutācittasāroti “ayaṃ dānassa dinnakālo, ayaṃ sīlassa rakkhanakālo”ti evaṃ kālaññutāsaṅkhātena
atk-s0514a3:2199_5: kālaṃ jānitvā katena cittena kusalasārena samannāgato. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā,
atk-s0514a3:2199_6: mahārāja, rathassa nāma āṇiṃ ādiṃ katvā dabbasambhārajātaṃ parisuddhaṃ sāramayañca
atk-s0514a3:2199_7: icchitabbaṃ, evañhi so ratho addhānakkhamo hoti, evaṃ tavapi kāyaratho kālaṃ jānitvā
atk-s0514a3:2199_8: katena cittena parisuddhena dānādikusalasārena samannāgato hotūti. Vesārajjatidaṇḍakoti
atk-s0514a3:2199_9: parisamajjhe kathentassapi visāradabhāvasaṅkhātena tidaṇḍena samannāgato. Nivātavuttiyottakoti
atk-s0514a3:2199_10: ovāde pavattanasaṅkhātena mudunā dhurayottena samannāgato. Mudunā hi dhurayottena
atk-s0514a3:2199_11: baddharathaṃ sindhavā sukhaṃ vahanti, evaṃ tava kāyarathopi paṇḍitānaṃ ovādappavattitāya
atk-s0514a3:2199_12: ābaddho sukhaṃ yātūti attho. Anatimānayugo lahūti anatimānasaṅkhātena lahukena yugena samannāgato.
atk-s0514a3:2200_0: Alīnacittasanthāroti yathā ratho nāma dantamayena uḷārena santhārena sobhati, evaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2200_1: tava kāyarathopi dānādinā alīnaasaṅkuṭitacittasanthāro hotu. Vuddhisevī rajohatoti
atk-s0514a3:2200_2: yathā ratho nāma visamena rajuṭṭhānamaggena gacchanto rajokiṇṇo na sobhati, samena
atk-s0514a3:2200_3: virajena maggena gacchanto sobhati, evaṃ tava kāyarathopi paññāvuddhisevitāya samatalaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2200_4: ujumaggaṃ paṭipajjitvā hatarajo hotu. Satipatodo dhīrassāti paṇḍitassa tava tasmiṃ
atk-s0514a3:2200_5: kāyarathe supatiṭṭhitasatipatodo hotu. Dhiti yogo ca rasmiyoti abbocchinnavīriyasaṅkhātā
atk-s0514a3:2200_6: dhiti ca hitappaṭipattiyaṃ yuñjanabhāvasaṅkhāto yogo ca tava tasmiṃ kāyarathe vaṭṭitā
atk-s0514a3:2200_7: thirā rasmiyo hontu. Mano dantaṃ pathaṃ neti, samadantehi vāhibhīti yathā ratho nāma
atk-s0514a3:2200_8: visamadantehi sindhavehi uppathaṃ yāti, samadantehi samasikkhitehi yutto ujupathameva
atk-s0514a3:2200_9: anveti, evaṃ manopi dantaṃ nibbisevanaṃ kummaggaṃ pahāya ujumaggaṃ gaṇhāti. Tasmā
atk-s0514a3:2200_10: sudantaṃ ācārasampannaṃ cittaṃ tava kāyarathassa sindhavakiccaṃ sādhetu. Icchālobho
atk-s0514a3:2200_11: cāti appattesu vatthūsu icchā, pattesu lobhoti ayaṃ icchā ca lobho ca kummaggo nāma.
atk-s0514a3:2200_12: Kuṭilo anujumaggo apāyameva neti. Dasakusalakammapathavasena pana aṭṭhaṅgikamaggavasena
atk-s0514a3:2200_13: vā pavatto sīlasaṃyamo ujumaggo nāma. So tava kāyarathassa maggo hotu.
atk-s0514a3:2201_0: Rūpeti etesu manāpiyesu rūpādīsu kāmaguṇesu nimittaṃ gahetvā dhāvantassa tava kāyarathassa
atk-s0514a3:2201_1: uppathaṃ paṭipannassa rājarathassa sindhave ākoṭetvā nivāraṇapatodayaṭṭhi viya paññā
atk-s0514a3:2201_2: ākoṭanī hotu. Sā hi taṃ uppathagamanato nivāretvā ujuṃ sucaritamaggaṃ āropessati.
atk-s0514a3:2201_3: Tattha attāva sārathīti tasmiṃ pana te kāyarathe añño sārathi nāma natthi, tava attāva
atk-s0514a3:2201_4: sārathi hotu. Sace etena yānenāti mahārāja, yassetaṃ evarūpaṃ yānaṃ sace atthi, etena
atk-s0514a3:2201_5: yānena. Samacariyā daḷhā dhitīti yassa samacariyā ca dhiti ca daḷhā hoti thirā, so
atk-s0514a3:2201_6: etena yānena yasmā esa ratho sabbakāmaduho rāja, yathādhippete sabbakāme deti, tasmā
atk-s0514a3:2201_7: na jātu nirayaṃ vaje, ekaṃsenetaṃ dhārehi, evarūpena yānena nirayaṃ na gacchasīti
atk-s0514a3:2201_8: attho. Iti kho, mahārāja, yaṃ maṃ avaca “ācikkha me, nārada, suddhimaggaṃ, yathā
atk-s0514a3:2201_9: ahaṃ no niraye pateyya”nti, ayaṃ te so mayā anekapariyāyena akkhātoti.
atk-s0514a3:2202_0: Evamassa dhammaṃ desetvā micchādiṭṭhiṃ jahāpetvā sīle patiṭṭhāpetvā “ito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0514a3:2202_1: pāpamitte pahāya kalyāṇamitte upasaṅkama, niccaṃ appamatto hohī”ti ovādaṃ datvā rājadhītu
atk-s0514a3:2202_2: guṇaṃ vaṇṇetvā rājaparisāya ca rājorodhānañca ovādaṃ datvā mahantenānubhāvena tesaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2203: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi mayā diṭṭhijālaṃ bhinditvā uruvelakassapo damitoyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a3:2209: Ānando sā rucā āsi, yā rājānaṃ pasādayi.
atk-s0514a3:2217_0: Paṇḍu kisiyāsi dubbalāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto attano paññāpāramiṃ ārabbha
atk-s0514a3:2217_1: kathesi. Ekadivasañhi bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, satthā
atk-s0514a3:2217_2: mahāpañño puthupañño gambhīrapañño javanapañño hāsapañño tikkhapañño nibbedhikapañño
atk-s0514a3:2217_3: parappavādamaddano, attano paññānubhāvena khattiyapaṇḍitādīhi abhisaṅkhate sukhumapañhe
atk-s0514a3:2217_4: bhinditvā te dametvā nibbisevane katvā tīsu saraṇesu ceva sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0514a3:2217_5: amatagāmimaggaṃ paṭipādesī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya
atk-s0514a3:2217_6: sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “anacchariyaṃ, bhikkhave, yaṃ tathāgato
atk-s0514a3:2217_7: paramābhisambodhippatto parappavādaṃ bhinditvā khattiyādayo dameyya. Purimabhavasmiñhi
atk-s0514a3:2217_8: bodhiñāṇaṃ pariyesantopi tathāgato paññavā parappavādamaddanoyeva. Tathā hi ahaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2217_9: vidhurakāle saṭṭhiyojanubbedhe kāḷapabbatamuddhani puṇṇakaṃ nāma yakkhasenāpatiṃ
atk-s0514a3:2217_10: attano ñāṇabaleneva dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā pañcasīlesu patiṭṭhāpento attano jīvitaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2217_11: dāpesi”nti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0514a3:2218_0: Atīte kururaṭṭhe indapatthanagare dhanañcayakorabyo nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi. Vidhurapaṇḍito
atk-s0514a3:2218_1: nāma amacco tassa atthadhammānusāsako ahosi. So madhurakatho mahādhammakathiko sakalajambudīpe
atk-s0514a3:2218_2: rājāno hatthikantavīṇāsarena paluddhahatthino viya attano madhuradhammadesanāya palobhetvā
atk-s0514a3:2218_3: tesaṃ sakasakarajjāni gantuṃ adadamāno buddhalīlāya mahājanassa dhammaṃ desento mahantena
atk-s0514a3:2219_0: Tadā hi bārāṇasiyampi gihisahāyakā cattāro brāhmaṇamahāsālā mahallakakāle kāmesu
atk-s0514a3:2219_1: ādīnavaṃ disvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo
atk-s0514a3:2219_2: ca nibbattetvā vanamūlaphalāhārā tattheva ciraṃ vasitvā loṇambilasevanatthāya cārikaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2219_3: caramānā aṅgaraṭṭhe kālacampānagaraṃ patvā rājuyyāne vasitvā punadivase bhikkhāya
atk-s0514a3:2219_4: nagaraṃ pavisiṃsu. Tattha cattāro sahāyakā kuṭumbikā tesaṃ iriyāpathesu pasīditvā
atk-s0514a3:2219_5: vanditvā bhikkhābhājanaṃ gahetvā ekekaṃ attano nivesane nisīdāpetvā paṇītena āhārena
atk-s0514a3:2219_6: parivisitvā paṭiññaṃ gāhāpetvā uyyāneyeva vāsāpesuṃ. Te cattāro tāpasā catunnaṃ kuṭumbikānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2219_7: gehesu nibaddhaṃ bhuñjitvā divāvihāratthāya eko tāpaso tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0514a3:2219_8: eko nāgabhavanaṃ, eko supaṇṇabhavanaṃ, eko korabyarañño migājinauyyānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0514a3:2219_9: Tesu yo devalokaṃ gantvā divāvihāraṃ karoti, so sakkassa yasaṃ oloketvā attano upaṭṭhākassa
atk-s0514a3:2219_10: tameva vaṇṇeti. Yo nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā divāvihāraṃ karoti, so nāgarājassa sampattiṃ
atk-s0514a3:2219_11: oloketvā attano upaṭṭhākassa tameva vaṇṇeti. Yo supaṇṇabhavanaṃ gantvā divāvihāraṃ
atk-s0514a3:2219_12: karoti, so supaṇṇarājassa vibhūtiṃ oloketvā attano upaṭṭhākassa tameva vaṇṇeti. Yo
atk-s0514a3:2219_13: dhanañcayakorabyarājassa uyyānaṃ gantvā divāvihāraṃ karoti, so dhanañcayakorabyarañño
atk-s0514a3:2219_14: sirisobhaggaṃ oloketvā attano upaṭṭhākassa tameva vaṇṇeti.
atk-s0514a3:2220_0: Te cattāropi janā taṃ tadeva ṭhānaṃ patthetvā dānādīni puññāni katvā āyupariyosāne
atk-s0514a3:2220_1: eko sakko hutvā nibbatti, eko saputtadāro nāgabhavane nāgarājā hutvā nibbatti, eko
atk-s0514a3:2220_2: supaṇṇabhavane simbalivimāne supaṇṇarājā hutvā nibbatti. Eko dhanañcayakorabyarañño
atk-s0514a3:2220_3: aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatti. Tepi tāpasā aparihīnajjhānā kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke
atk-s0514a3:2220_4: nibbattiṃsu. Korabyakumāro vuḍḍhimanvāya pitu accayena rajje patiṭṭhahitvā dhammena
atk-s0514a3:2220_5: samena rajjaṃ kāresi. So pana jūtavittako ahosi. So vidhurapaṇḍitassa ovāde ṭhatvā
atk-s0514a3:2220_6: dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ rakkhati, uposathaṃ upavasati.
atk-s0514a3:2221_0: So ekadivasaṃ samādinnuposatho “vivekamanubrūhissāmī”ti uyyānaṃ gantvā manuññaṭṭhāne
atk-s0514a3:2221_1: nisīditvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi. Sakkopi samādinnuposatho “devaloke palibodho hotī”ti
atk-s0514a3:2221_2: manussaloke tameva uyyānaṃ āgantvā ekasmiṃ manuññaṭṭhāne nisīditvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2221_3: akāsi. Varuṇanāgarājāpi samādinnuposatho “nāgabhavane palibodho hotī”ti tatthevāgantvā
atk-s0514a3:2221_4: ekasmiṃ manuññaṭṭhāne nisīditvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi. Supaṇṇarājāpi samādinnuposatho
atk-s0514a3:2221_5: “supaṇṇabhavane palibodho hotī”ti tatthevāgantvā ekasmiṃ manuññaṭṭhāne nisīditvā
atk-s0514a3:2221_6: samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi. Tepi cattāro janā sāyanhasamaye sakaṭṭhānehi nikkhamitvā maṅgalapokkharaṇitīre
atk-s0514a3:2221_7: samāgantvā aññamaññaṃ oloketvā pubbasinehavasena samaggā sammodamānā hutvā aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2221_8: mettacittaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ kariṃsu. Tesu sakko maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe
atk-s0514a3:2221_9: nisīdi, itarepi attano attano yuttāsanaṃ ñatvā nisīdiṃsu. Atha ne sakko āha “mayaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2221_10: cattāropi rājānova, amhesu pana kassa sīlaṃ mahanta”nti? Atha naṃ varuṇanāgarājā
atk-s0514a3:2221_11: āha “tumhākaṃ tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ sīlato mayhaṃ sīlaṃ mahanta”nti. “Kimettha kāraṇa”nti?
atk-s0514a3:2221_12: “Ayaṃ supaṇṇarājā amhākaṃ jātānampi ajātānampi paccāmittova, ahaṃ evarūpaṃ amhākaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2221_13: jīvitakkhayakaraṃ paccāmittaṃ disvāpi kodhaṃ na karomi, iminā kāraṇena mama sīlaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2221_14: mahanta”nti vatvā idaṃ dasakanipāte catuposathajātake paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2222: “Yo kopaneyye na karoti kopaṃ, na kujjhati sappuriso kadāci;
atk-s0514a3:2223: Kuddhopi so nāvikaroti kopaṃ, taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu loke”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2224_0: Tattha yoti khattiyādīsu yo koci. Kopaneyyeti kujjhitabbayuttake puggale khantīvādītāpaso
atk-s0514a3:2224_1: viya kopaṃ na karoti. Kadācīti yo kismiñci kāle na kujjhateva. Kuddhopīti sace pana
atk-s0514a3:2224_2: so sappuriso kujjhati, atha kuddhopi taṃ kopaṃ nāvikaroti cūḷabodhitāpaso viya. Taṃ
atk-s0514a3:2224_3: ve naranti mahārājāno taṃ ve purisaṃ samitapāpatāya loke paṇḍitā “samaṇa”nti kathenti.
atk-s0514a3:2224_4: Ime pana guṇā mayi santi, tasmā mameva sīlaṃ mahantanti.
atk-s0514a3:2225_0: Taṃ sutvā supaṇṇarājā “ayaṃ nāgo mama aggabhakkho, yasmā panāhaṃ evarūpaṃ aggabhakkhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2225_1: disvāpi khudaṃ adhivāsetvā āhārahetu pāpaṃ na karomi, tasmā mameva sīlaṃ mahanta”nti
atk-s0514a3:2226: “Ūnūdaro yo sahate jighacchaṃ, danto tapassī mitapānabhojano;
atk-s0514a3:2227: Āhārahetu na karoti pāpaṃ, taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu loke”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2228_0: Tattha dantoti indriyadamanena samannāgato. Tapassīti tapanissitako. Āhārahetūti
atk-s0514a3:2228_1: atijighacchapiḷitopi yo pāpaṃ lāmakakammaṃ na karoti dhammasenāpatisāriputtatthero
atk-s0514a3:2228_2: viya. Ahaṃ panajja āhārahetu pāpaṃ na karomi, tasmā mameva sīlaṃ mahantanti.
atk-s0514a3:2229: Tato sakko devarājā “ahaṃ nānappakāraṃ sukhapadaṭṭhānaṃ devalokasampattiṃ pahāya sīlarakkhaṇatthāya manussalokaṃ āgato, tasmā mameva sīlaṃ mahanta”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2230: “Khiḍḍaṃ ratiṃ vippajahitvāna sabbaṃ, na cālikaṃ bhāsati kiñci loke;
atk-s0514a3:2231: Vibhūsaṭṭhānā virato methunasmā, taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu loke”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2232_0: Tattha khiḍḍanti kāyikavācasikakhiḍḍaṃ. Ratinti dibbakāmaguṇaratiṃ. Kiñcīti appamattakampi.
atk-s0514a3:2232_1: Vibhūsaṭṭhānāti maṃsavibhūsā chavivibhūsāti dve vibhūsā. Tattha ajjhoharaṇīyāhāro
atk-s0514a3:2232_2: maṃsavibhūsā nāma, mālāgandhādīni chavivibhūsā nāma, yena akusalacittena dhārīyati,
atk-s0514a3:2232_3: taṃ tassa ṭhānaṃ, tato virato methunasevanato ca yo paṭivirato. Taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu
atk-s0514a3:2232_4: loketi ahaṃ ajja devaccharāyo pahāya idhāgantvā samaṇadhammaṃ karomi, tasmā mameva
atk-s0514a3:2232_5: sīlaṃ mahantanti. Evaṃ sakkopi attano sīlameva vaṇṇeti.
atk-s0514a3:2233_0: Taṃ sutvā dhanañcayarājā “ahaṃ ajja mahantaṃ pariggahaṃ soḷasasahassanāṭakitthiparipuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2233_1: antepuraṃ cajitvā uyyāne samaṇadhammaṃ karomi, tasmā mameva sīlaṃ mahanta”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2234: “Pariggahaṃ lobhadhammañca sabbaṃ, yo ve pariññāya pariccajeti;
atk-s0514a3:2235: Dantaṃ ṭhitattaṃ amamaṃ nirāsaṃ, taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu loke”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2236_0: Tattha pariggahanti nānappakāraṃ vatthukāmaṃ. Lobhadhammanti tasmiṃ uppajjanataṇhaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2236_1: Pariññāyāti ñātapariññā, tīraṇapariññā, pahānapariññāti imāhi tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā.
atk-s0514a3:2236_2: Tattha khandhādīnaṃ dukkhādisabhāvajānanaṃ ñātapariññā, tesu aguṇaṃ upadhāretvā tīraṇaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2236_3: tīraṇapariññā, tesu dosaṃ disvā chandarāgassāpakaḍḍhanaṃ pahānapariññā. Yo imāhi
atk-s0514a3:2236_4: tīhi pariññāhi jānitvā vatthukāmakilesakāme pariccajati, chaḍḍetvā gacchati. Dantanti
atk-s0514a3:2236_5: nibbisevanaṃ. Ṭhitattanti micchāvitakkābhāvena ṭhitasabhāvaṃ. Amamanti ahanti mamāyanataṇhārahitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2236_6: Nirāsanti puttadārādīsu nicchandarāgaṃ. Taṃ ve naranti taṃ evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ “samaṇa”nti vadanti.
atk-s0514a3:2237_0: Iti te sabbepi attano attano sīlameva mahantanti vaṇṇetvā sakkādayo dhanañcayaṃ pucchiṃsu
atk-s0514a3:2237_1: “atthi pana, mahārāja, koci tumhākaṃ santike paṇḍito, yo no imaṃ kaṅkhaṃ vinodeyyā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2237_2: “Āma, mahārājāno mama atthadhammānusāsako mahāpañño asamadhuro vidhurapaṇḍito nāma
atk-s0514a3:2237_3: atthi, so no imaṃ kaṅkhaṃ vinodessati, tassa santikaṃ gacchāmā”ti. Atha te sabbe
atk-s0514a3:2237_4: “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchiṃsu. Atha sabbepi uyyānā nikkhamitvā dhammasabhaṃ gantvā pallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2237_5: alaṅkārāpetvā bodhisattaṃ pallaṅkavaramajjhe nisīdāpetvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2237_6: nisinnā “paṇḍita, amhākaṃ kaṅkhā uppannā, taṃ no vinodehī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0514a3:2238: “Pucchāma kattāramanomapaññaṃ, kathāsu no viggaho atthi jāto;
atk-s0514a3:2239: Chindajja kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchitāni, tadajja kaṅkhaṃ vitaremu sabbe”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2240_0: Tattha kattāranti kattabbayuttakakārakaṃ. Viggaho atthi jātoti eko sīlaviggaho sīlavivādo
atk-s0514a3:2240_1: uppanno atthi. Chindajjāti amhākaṃ taṃ kaṅkhaṃ tāni ca vicikicchitāni vajirena sineruṃ
atk-s0514a3:2240_2: paharanto viya ajja chinda. Vitaremūti vitareyyāma.
atk-s0514a3:2241: Paṇḍito tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “mahārājāno tumhākaṃ sīlaṃ nissāya uppannaṃ vivādakathaṃ sukathitadukkathitaṃ jānissāmī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2242: “Ye paṇḍitā atthadasā bhavanti, bhāsanti te yoniso tattha kāle;
atk-s0514a3:2243: Kathaṃ nu kathānaṃ abhāsitānaṃ, atthaṃ nayeyyuṃ kusalā janindā”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2244_0: Tattha atthadasāti atthadassanasamatthā. Tattha kāleti tasmiṃ viggahe ārocite yuttappayuttakāle
atk-s0514a3:2244_1: te paṇḍitā tamatthaṃ ācikkhantā yoniso bhāsanti. Atthaṃ nayeyyuṃ kusalāti kusalā
atk-s0514a3:2244_2: chekāpi samānā abhāsitānaṃ kathānaṃ kathaṃ nu atthaṃ ñāṇena nayeyyuṃ upaparikkheyyuṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2244_3: Janindāti rājāno ālapati. Tasmā idaṃ tāva me vadetha.
atk-s0514a3:2245: “Kathaṃ have bhāsati nāgarājā, garuḷo pana venateyyo kimāha;
atk-s0514a3:2246: Gandhabbarājā pana kiṃ vadeti, kathaṃ pana kurūnaṃ rājaseṭṭho”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2249: “Khantiṃ have bhāsati nāgarājā, appāhāraṃ garuḷo venateyyo;
atk-s0514a3:2251_0: Tassattho – paṇḍita, nāgarājā tāva kopaneyyepi puggale akuppanasaṅkhātaṃ adhivāsanakhantiṃ
atk-s0514a3:2251_1: vaṇṇeti, garuḷo appāhāratāsaṅkhātaṃ āhārahetu pāpassa akaraṇaṃ, sakko pañcakāmaguṇaratīnaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2252: Atha tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā mahāsatto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2253: “Sabbāni etāni subhāsitāni, na hettha dubbhāsitamatthi kiñci;
atk-s0514a3:2254: Yasmiñca etāni patiṭṭhitāni, arāva nābhyā susamohitāni;
atk-s0514a3:2255: Catubbhi dhammehi samaṅgibhūtaṃ, taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu loke”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2256_0: Tattha etānīti etāni cattāripi guṇajātāni yasmiṃ puggale sakaṭanābhiyaṃ suṭṭhu samohitāni
atk-s0514a3:2256_1: arā viya patiṭṭhitāni, catūhipetehi dhammehi samannāgataṃ puggalaṃ paṇḍitā “samaṇa”nti āhu loketi.
atk-s0514a3:2257: Evaṃ mahāsatto catunnampi sīlaṃ ekasamameva akāsi. Taṃ sutvā cattāropi rājāno tassa tuṭṭhā thutiṃ karontā imaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0514a3:2258: “Tuvañhi seṭṭho tvamanuttarosi, tvaṃ dhammagū dhammavidū sumedho;
atk-s0514a3:2259: Paññāya pañhaṃ samadhiggahetvā, acchecchi dhīro vicikicchitāni;
atk-s0514a3:2260: Acchecchi kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchitāni, cundo yathā nāgadantaṃ kharenā”ti..
atk-s0514a3:2261_0: Tattha tvamanuttarosīti tvaṃ anuttaro asi, natthi tayā uttaritaro nāma. Dhammagūti
atk-s0514a3:2261_1: dhammassa gopako ceva dhammaññū ca. Dhammavidūti pākaṭadhammo. Sumedhoti sundarapañño
atk-s0514a3:2261_2: paññāyāti attano paññāya amhākaṃ pañhaṃ suṭṭhu adhigaṇhitvā “idamettha kāraṇa”nti
atk-s0514a3:2261_3: yathābhūtaṃ ñatvā. Acchecchīti tvaṃ dhīro amhākaṃ vicikicchitāni chindi, evaṃ chindanto
atk-s0514a3:2261_4: ca “chindajja kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchitānī”ti idaṃ amhākaṃ āyācanaṃ sampādento acchecchi
atk-s0514a3:2261_5: kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchitāni. Cundo yathā nāgadantaṃ kharenāti yathā dantakāro kakacena
atk-s0514a3:2262_0: Evaṃ te cattāropi rājāno tassa pañhabyākaraṇena tuṭṭhamānasā ahesuṃ. Atha naṃ sakko
atk-s0514a3:2262_1: dibbadukūlena pūjesi, garuḷo suvaṇṇamālāya, varuṇo nāgarājā maṇinā, dhanañcayarājā
atk-s0514a3:2264: Pañhassa veyyākaraṇena tuṭṭho, dadāmi te dhammapūjāya dhīra.
atk-s0514a3:2266: Pañhassa veyyākaraṇena tuṭṭho, dadāmi te dhammapūjāya dhīra.
atk-s0514a3:2267: “Maṇiṃ anagghaṃ ruciraṃ pabhassaraṃ, kaṇṭhāvasattaṃ maṇibhūsitaṃ me;
atk-s0514a3:2268: Pañhassa veyyākaraṇena tuṭṭho, dadāmi te dhammapūjāya dhīra.
atk-s0514a3:2269: “Gavaṃ sahassaṃ usabhañca nāgaṃ, ājaññayutte ca rathe dasa ime;
atk-s0514a3:2270: Pañhassa veyyākaraṇena tuṭṭho, dadāmi te gāmavarāni soḷasā”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2271: Evaṃ sakkādayo mahāsattaṃ pūjetvā sakaṭṭhānameva agamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:2274_0: Tesu nāgarājassa bhariyā vimalādevī nāma. Sā tassa gīvāya piḷandhanamaṇiṃ apassantī
atk-s0514a3:2274_1: pucchi “deva, kahaṃ pana te maṇī”ti? “Bhadde, candabrāhmaṇaputtassa vidhurapaṇḍitassa
atk-s0514a3:2274_2: dhammakathaṃ sutvā pasannacitto ahaṃ tena maṇinā taṃ pūjesiṃ. Na kevalañca ahameva,
atk-s0514a3:2274_3: sakkopi taṃ dibbadukūlena pūjesi, supaṇṇarājā suvaṇṇamālāya, dhanañcayarājā gavassasahassādīhi
atk-s0514a3:2274_4: pūjesī”ti. “Dhammakathiko so, devā”ti. “Bhadde, kiṃ vadesi, jambudīpatale buddhuppādo
atk-s0514a3:2274_5: viya pavattati, sakalajambudīpe ekasatarājāno tassa madhuradhammakathāya bajjhitvā
atk-s0514a3:2274_6: hatthikantavīṇāsarena paluddhamattavāraṇā viya attano attano rajjāni gantuṃ na icchanti,
atk-s0514a3:2274_7: evarūpo so madhuradhammakathiko”ti tassa guṇaṃ vaṇṇesi. Sā vidhurapaṇḍitassa guṇakathaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2274_8: sutvā tassa dhammakathaṃ sotukāmā hutvā cintesi “sacāhaṃ vakkhāmi ‘deva, tassa dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2274_9: sotukāmā, idha naṃ ānehī’ti, na metaṃ ānessati. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ ‘tassa me hadaye dohaḷo
atk-s0514a3:2274_10: uppanno’ti gilānālayaṃ kareyya”nti. Sā tathā katvā siragabbhaṃ pavisitvā attano paricārikānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2274_11: saññaṃ datvā sirisayane nipajji. Nāgarājā upaṭṭhānavelāya taṃ apassanto “kahaṃ vimalā”ti
atk-s0514a3:2274_12: paricārikāyo pucchitvā “gilānā, devā”ti vutte uṭṭhāyāsanā tassā santikaṃ gantvā sayanapasse
atk-s0514a3:2276: “Paṇḍu kisiyāsi dubbalā, vaṇṇarūpaṃ na tavedisaṃ pure;
atk-s0514a3:2277: Vimale akkhāhi pucchitā, kīdisī tuyhaṃ sarīravedanā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2278_0: Tattha paṇḍūti paṇḍupalāsavaṇṇā. Kisiyāti kisā. Dubbalāti appathāmā. Vaṇṇarūpaṃ na
atk-s0514a3:2278_1: tavedisaṃ pureti tava vaṇṇasaṅkhātaṃ rūpaṃ pure edisaṃ na hoti, niddosaṃ anavajjaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2278_2: taṃ idāni parivattitvā amanuññasabhāvaṃ jātaṃ. Vimaleti taṃ ālapati.
atk-s0514a3:2281: “Dhammo manujesu mātīnaṃ, dohaḷo nāma janinda vuccati;
atk-s0514a3:2283_0: Tattha dhammoti sabhāvo. Mātīnanti itthīnaṃ. Janindāti nāgajanassa inda. Dhammāhaṭaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2283_1: nāgakuñjara, vidhurassa hadayābhipatthayeti nāgaseṭṭha, ahaṃ dhammena samena asāhasikakammena
atk-s0514a3:2283_2: āhaṭaṃ vidhurassa hadayaṃ abhipatthayāmi, taṃ me labhamānāya jīvitaṃ atthi, alabhamānāya
atk-s0514a3:2286: “Candaṃ kho tvaṃ dohaḷāyasi, sūriyaṃ vā atha vāpi mālutaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2287: Dullabhañhi vidhurassa dassanaṃ, ko vidhuramidha mānayissatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2288_0: Tattha dullabhañhi vidhurassa dassananti asamadhurassa vidhurassa dassanameva dullabhaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2288_1: Tassa hi sakalajambudīpe rājāno dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā vicaranti,
atk-s0514a3:2288_2: passitumpi naṃ koci na labhati, taṃ ko idha ānayissatīti vadati.
atk-s0514a3:2289_0: Sā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “alabhamānāya me idheva maraṇa”nti parivattitvā piṭṭhiṃ datvā
atk-s0514a3:2289_1: sāḷakakaṇṇena mukhaṃ pidahitvā nipajji. Nāgarājā anattamano sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0514a3:2289_2: sayanapiṭṭhe nisinno “vimalā vidhurapaṇḍitassa hadayamaṃsaṃ āharāpetī”ti saññī hutvā
atk-s0514a3:2289_3: “paṇḍitassa hadayaṃ alabhantiyā vimalāya jīvitaṃ natthi, kathaṃ nu kho tassa hadayamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2289_4: labhissāmī”ti cintesi. Athassa dhītā irandhatī nāma nāgakaññā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā
atk-s0514a3:2289_5: mahantena sirivilāsena pitu upaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā pitaraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā,
atk-s0514a3:2289_6: sā tassa indriyavikāraṃ disvā “tāta, ativiya domanassappattosi, kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti
atk-s0514a3:2291: “Kiṃ nu tāta tuvaṃ pajjhāyasi, padumaṃ hatthagataṃva te mukhaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2292: Kiṃ nu dummanarūposi issara, mā tvaṃ soci amittatāpanā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2293: Tattha pajjhāyasīti punappunaṃ cintesi. Hatthagatanti hatthena parimadditaṃ padumaṃ viya te mukhaṃ jātaṃ. Issarāti pañcayojanasatikassa mandiranāgabhavanassa, sāmīti.
atk-s0514a3:2294: Dhītu vacanaṃ sutvā nāgarājā tamatthaṃ ārocento āha –
atk-s0514a3:2296: “Mātā hi tava irandhati, vidhurassa hadayaṃ dhaniyati;
atk-s0514a3:2297: Dullabhañhi vidhurassa dassanaṃ, ko vidhuramidha mānayissatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2299: Atha naṃ nāgarājā “amma, mama santike vidhuraṃ ānetuṃ samattho natthi, tvaṃ mātu jīvitaṃ dehi, vidhuraṃ ānetuṃ samatthaṃ bhattāraṃ pariyesāhī”ti uyyojento upaḍḍhagāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2303: Iti so kilesābhiratabhāvena dhītu ananucchavikaṃ kathaṃ kathesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2304: “Pituno ca sā sutvāna vākyaṃ, rattiṃ nikkhamma avassutiṃ carī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2305_0: Tattha avassutinti bhikkhave, sā nāgamāṇavikā pitu vacanaṃ sutvā pitaraṃ assāsetvā
atk-s0514a3:2305_1: mātu santikaṃ gantvā tampi assāsetvā attano sirigabbhaṃ gantvā sabbālaṅkārehi attānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2305_2: alaṅkaritvā ekaṃ kusumbharattavatthaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ ekaṃse katvā tameva rattiṃ udakaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2305_3: dvidhā katvā nāgabhavanato nikkhamma himavantappadese samuddatīre ṭhitaṃ saṭṭhiyojanubbedhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2305_4: ekagghanaṃ kāḷapabbataṃ nāma añjanagiriṃ gantvā avassutiṃ cari kilesaavassutiṃ bhattupariyesanaṃ carīti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2306_0: Carantī ca yāni himavante vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni, tāni āharitvā sakalapabbataṃ
atk-s0514a3:2306_1: maṇiagghiyaṃ viya alaṅkaritvā uparitale pupphasanthāraṃ katvā manoramenākārena naccitvā
atk-s0514a3:2308: “Ke gandhabbe rakkhase ca nāge, ke kimpurise cāpi mānuse;
atk-s0514a3:2309: Ke paṇḍite sabbakāmadade, dīgharattaṃ bhattā me bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2310_0: Tattha ke gandhabbe rakkhase ca nāgeti ko gandhabbo vā rakkhaso vā nāgo vā. Ke paṇḍite
atk-s0514a3:2310_1: sabbakāmadadeti ko etesu gandhabbādīsu paṇḍito sabbakāmaṃ dātuṃ samattho, so vidhurassa
atk-s0514a3:2310_2: hadayamaṃsadohaḷiniyā mama mātu manorathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā mayhaṃ dīgharattaṃ bhattā bhavissatīti.
atk-s0514a3:2311_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe vessavaṇamahārājassa bhāgineyyo puṇṇako nāma yakkhasenāpati tigāvutappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2311_1: manomayasindhavaṃ abhiruyha kāḷapabbatamatthakena yakkhasamāgamaṃ gacchanto taṃ tāya
atk-s0514a3:2311_2: gītasaddaṃ assosi. Anantare attabhāve anubhūtapubbāya itthiyā gītasaddo tassa chaviādīni
atk-s0514a3:2311_3: chinditvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsi. So tāya paṭibaddhacitto hutvā nivattitvā sindhavapiṭṭhe
atk-s0514a3:2311_4: nisinnova “bhadde, ahaṃ mama paññāya dhammena samena vidhurassa hadayaṃ ānetuṃ samatthomhi,
atk-s0514a3:2311_5: tvaṃ mā cintayī”ti taṃ assāsento aṭṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2313: “Assāsa hessāmi te pati, bhattā te hessāmi anindalocane;
atk-s0514a3:2314: Paññā hi mamaṃ tathāvidhā, assāsa hessasi bhariyā mamā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2315: Tattha anindalocaneti aninditabbalocane. Tathāvidhāti vidhurassa hadayamaṃsaṃ āharaṇasamatthā.
atk-s0514a3:2316: Atha naṃ irandhatī “tena hi ehi, gacchāma me pitu santika”nti ānesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2319: Ehi gacchāma pitu mamantike, esova te etamatthaṃ pavakkhatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2320_0: Tattha pubbapathānugatenāti anantare attabhāve bhūtapubbasāmike tasmiṃ pubbapatheneva
atk-s0514a3:2320_1: anugatena. Ehi gacchāmāti bhikkhave, so yakkhasenāpati evaṃ vatvā “imaṃ assapiṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0514a3:2320_2: āropetvā nessāmī”ti pabbatamatthakā otaritvā tassā gahaṇatthaṃ hatthaṃ pasāresi.
atk-s0514a3:2320_3: Sā attano hatthaṃ gaṇhituṃ adatvā tena pasāritahatthaṃ sayaṃ gahetvā “sāmi, nāhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2320_4: anāthā, mayhaṃ pitā varuṇo nāma nāgarājā, mātā vimalā nāma devī, ehi mama pitu santikaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2320_5: gacchāma, eso eva te yathā amhākaṃ maṅgalakiriyāya bhavitabbaṃ, evaṃ etamatthaṃ pavakkhatī”ti avacāsi.
atk-s0514a3:2321: Evaṃ vatvā sā yakkhaṃ gahetvā pitu santikaṃ agamāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2325: Tattha pitusantikupāgamīti attano pituno nāgarañño santikaṃ upāgami.
atk-s0514a3:2326: Puṇṇakopi yakkho paṭiharitvā nāgarājassa santikaṃ gantvā irandhatiṃ yācanto āha –
atk-s0514a3:2328: “Nāgavara vaco suṇohi me, patirūpaṃ paṭipajja suṅkiyaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2329: Patthemi ahaṃ irandhatiṃ, tāya samaṅgiṃ karohi maṃ tuvaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2334_0: Tattha suṅkiyanti attano kulapadesānurūpaṃ dhitu suṅkaṃ dhanaṃ paṭipajja gaṇha. Samaṅgiṃ
atk-s0514a3:2334_1: karohīti maṃ tāya saddhiṃ samaṅgibhūtaṃ karohi. Valabhiyoti bhaṇḍasakaṭiyo. Nānāratnassa
atk-s0514a3:2338: Anāmanta kataṃ kammaṃ, taṃ pacchā anutappatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2339_0: Tattha yāva āmantaye ñātīti bho yakkhasenāpati, ahaṃ tuyhaṃ dhītaraṃ demi, no na
atk-s0514a3:2339_1: demi, thokaṃ pana āgamehi, yāva ñātakepi jānāpemi. Taṃ pacchā anutappatīti itthiyo
atk-s0514a3:2339_2: hi gatagataṭṭhāne abhiramantipi anabhiramantipi, anabhiratikāle ñātakādayo amhehi
atk-s0514a3:2339_3: saddhiṃ anāmantetvā kataṃ kammaṃ nāma evarūpaṃ hotīti ussukkaṃ na karonti, evaṃ taṃ
atk-s0514a3:2340: Evaṃ vatvā so bhariyāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tāya saddhiṃ sallapi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2345: “‘Ayaṃ so puṇṇako yakkho, yācatī maṃ irandhatiṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2346: Bahunā vittalābhena, tassa dema piyaṃ mama”’nti.
atk-s0514a3:2347_0: Tattha pavisitvāti varuṇo puṇṇakaṃ tattheva ṭhapetvā sayaṃ uṭṭhāya yatthassa bhariyā
atk-s0514a3:2347_1: nipannā, taṃ nivesanaṃ pavisitvā. Piyaṃ mamanti mama piyaṃ dhītaraṃ tassa bahunā
atk-s0514a3:2350: “Na dhanena na vittena, labbhā amhaṃ irandhatī;
atk-s0514a3:2351: Sace ca kho hadayaṃ paṇḍitassa, dhammena laddhā idha māhareyya;
atk-s0514a3:2352: Etena vittena kumāri labbhā, nāññaṃ dhanaṃ uttari patthayāmā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2353: Tattha amhaṃ irandhatīti amhākaṃ dhītā irandhatī. Etena vittenāti etena tuṭṭhikāraṇena.
atk-s0514a3:2354: So tāya saddhiṃ mantetvā punadeva puṇṇakena saddhiṃ mantesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2359: “‘Na dhanena na vittena, labbhā amhaṃ irandhatī;
atk-s0514a3:2360: Sace tuvaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍitasa, dhammena laddhā idha māharesi;
atk-s0514a3:2361: Etena vittena kumāri labbhā, nāññaṃ dhanaṃ uttari patthayāmā”’ti.
atk-s0514a3:2365: “Yaṃ paṇḍitotyeke vadanti loke, tameva bāloti punāhu aññe;
atk-s0514a3:2366: Akkhāhi me vippavadanti ettha, kaṃ paṇḍitaṃ nāga tuvaṃ vadesī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2367_0: Tattha yaṃ paṇḍitotyeketi so kira “hadayaṃ paṇḍitassā”ti sutvā cintesi “yaṃ eke paṇḍitoti
atk-s0514a3:2367_1: vadanti, tameva aññe bāloti kathenti. Kiñcāpi me irandhatiyā vidhuroti akkhātaṃ,
