atk-s0514a3:2367_2: tathāpi tathato jānituṃ pucchissāmi na”nti. Tasmā evamāha.
atk-s0514a3:2370: “Korabyarājassa dhanañcayassa, yadi te suto vidhuro nāma kattā;
atk-s0514a3:2371: Ānehi taṃ paṇḍitaṃ dhammaladdhā, irandhatī padacarā te hotū”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2372: Tattha dhammaladdhāti dhammena labhitvā. Padacarāti pādaparicārikā.
atk-s0514a3:2373: Taṃ sutvā puṇṇako somanassappatto sindhavaṃ nayanatthāya upaṭṭhākaṃ āṇāpesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2375: “Idañca sutvā varuṇassa vākyaṃ, uṭṭhāya yakkho paramappatīto;
atk-s0514a3:2376: Tattheva santo purisaṃ asaṃsi, ānehi ājaññamidheva yutta”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2377: Tattha purisaṃ asaṃsīti attano upaṭṭhākaṃ āṇāpesi. Ājaññanti kāraṇākāraṇajānanakasindhavaṃ. Yuttanti kappitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2381_0: Tattha jātarūpamayā kaṇṇāti tameva sindhavaṃ vaṇṇento āha. Tassa hi manomayassa sindhavassa
atk-s0514a3:2381_1: jātarūpamayā kaṇṇā, kācamhicamayā khurā, tassa khurā rattamaṇimayāti attho. Jambonadassa
atk-s0514a3:2382_0: So puriso tāvadeva taṃ sindhavaṃ ānesi. Puṇṇako taṃ abhiruyha ākāsena vessavaṇassa
atk-s0514a3:2382_1: santikaṃ gantvā nāgabhavanaṃ vaṇṇetvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Tassatthassa pakāsanatthaṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-s0514a3:2387: “So puṇṇako kāmarāgena giddho, irandhatiṃ nāgakaññaṃ jigīsaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2388: Gantvāna taṃ bhūtapatiṃ yasassiṃ, iccabravī vessavaṇaṃ kuveraṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2391: Nagare nimmite kañcanamaye, maṇḍalassa uragassa niṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2400: Ete dumā pariṇāmitā, sobhayanti uragassa mandiraṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2412: Taṃ tesaṃ demi issara, tena te denti irandhatiṃ mama”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2413_0: Tattha devavāhavahaṃ yānanti vahitabboti vāho, devasaṅkhātaṃ vāhaṃ vahatīti devavāhavahaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2413_1: Yanti etenāti yānaṃ. Kappitakesamassūti maṇḍanavasena susaṃvihitakesamassu. Devānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2413_2: pana kesamassukaraṇakammaṃ nāma natthi, vicittakathikena pana kathitaṃ. Jigīsanti
atk-s0514a3:2413_3: patthayanto. Vessavaṇanti visāṇāya rājadhāniyā issararājānaṃ. Kuveranti evaṃnāmakaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2413_4: Bhogavatī nāmāti sampannabhogatāya evaṃladdhanāmaṃ. Mandireti mandiraṃ, bhavananti
atk-s0514a3:2413_5: attho. Vāsā hiraññavatīti nāgarājassa vasanaṭṭhānattā vāsāti ca, kañcanavatiyā suvaṇṇapākārena
atk-s0514a3:2413_6: parikkhittattā hiraññavatīti ca vuccati. Nagare nimmiteti nagaraṃ nimmitaṃ. Kañcanamayeti
atk-s0514a3:2413_7: suvaṇṇamayaṃ. Maṇḍalassāti bhogamaṇḍalena samannāgatassa. Niṭṭhitanti karaṇapariniṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2413_8: Oṭṭhagīviyoti oṭṭhagīvāsaṇṭhānena katā rattamaṇimasāragallamayā aṭṭālakā. Pāsādetthāti
atk-s0514a3:2413_9: ettha nāgabhavane pāsādā. Silāmayāti maṇimayā. Sovaṇṇaratanehīti suvaṇṇasaṅkhātehi
atk-s0514a3:2413_10: ratanehi, suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāhi chāditāti attho. Sahāti sahakārā. Uparibhaddakāti uddālakajātikāyeva
atk-s0514a3:2413_11: rukkhā. Campeyyakā nāgamallikāti campakā ca nāgā ca mallikā ca. Bhaginīmālā atha
atk-s0514a3:2413_12: mettha koliyāti bhaginīmālā ceva atha ettha nāgabhavane koliyā nāma rukkhā ca. Ete
atk-s0514a3:2413_13: dumā pariṇāmitāti ete pupphūpagaphalūpagarukkhā aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭṭasākhatāya pariṇāmitā
atk-s0514a3:2413_14: ākulasamākulā. Khajjuretthāti khajjurirukkhā ettha. Silāmayāti indanīlamaṇimayā.
atk-s0514a3:2413_15: Sovaṇṇadhuvapupphitāti te pana suvaṇṇapupphehi niccapupphitā. Yattha vasatopapātikoti
atk-s0514a3:2413_16: yattha nāgabhavane opapātiko nāgarājā vasati. Kañcanavelliviggahāti suvaṇṇarāsisassirikasarīrā.
atk-s0514a3:2413_17: Kālā taruṇāva uggatāti vilāsayuttatāya mandavāteritā kālavallipallavā viya uggatā.
atk-s0514a3:2413_19: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tidivokacarāti tidasabhavanacarā. Vijjuvabbhaghanāti abbhaghanavalāhakantarato
atk-s0514a3:2413_20: nissaṭā vijjulatā viya. Taṃ tesaṃ demīti taṃ tassa hadayaṃ ahaṃ tesaṃ demi, evaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2414_0: Iti so vessavaṇena ananuññāto gantuṃ avisahitvā taṃ anujānāpetuṃ etā ettakā gāthā
atk-s0514a3:2414_1: kathesi. Vessavaṇo pana tassa kathaṃ na suṇāti. Kiṃkāraṇā? Dvinnaṃ devaputtānaṃ vimānaaḍḍaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2414_2: paricchindatīti. Puṇṇako attano vacanassa assutabhāvaṃ ñatvā jinakadevaputtassa santike
atk-s0514a3:2414_3: aṭṭhāsi. Vessavaṇo aḍḍaṃ vinicchinitvā parājitaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā itaraṃ “gaccha tvaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2414_4: tava vimāne vasāhī”ti āha. Puṇṇako “gaccha tva”nti vuttakkhaṇeyeva “mayhaṃ mātulena
atk-s0514a3:2414_5: mama pesitabhāvaṃ jānāthā”ti katipayadevaputte sakkhiṃ katvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
atk-s0514a3:2414_6: sindhavaṃ āharāpetvā abhiruyha pakkāmi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2416: “So puṇṇako bhūtapatiṃ yasassiṃ, āmantaya vessavaṇaṃ kuveraṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2417: Tattheva santo purisaṃ asaṃsi, ānehi ājaññamidheva yuttaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2425_0: So ākāsena gacchantoyeva cintesi “vidhurapaṇḍito mahāparivāro, na sakkā taṃ gaṇhituṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2425_1: dhanañcayakorabyo pana jūtavittako, taṃ jūtena jinitvā vidhuraṃ gaṇhissāmi, ghare
atk-s0514a3:2425_2: panassa bahūni ratanāni, appagghena lakkhena jūtaṃ na kīḷissati, mahaggharatanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2425_3: harituṃ vaṭṭati, aññaṃ ratanaṃ rājā na gaṇhissati, rājagahassa sāmantā vepullapabbatabbhantare
atk-s0514a3:2425_4: cakkavattirañño paribhogamaṇiratanaṃ atthi mahānubhāvaṃ, taṃ gahetvā tena rājānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2425_5: palobhetvā jinissāmī”ti. So tathā akāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2427: “So aggamā rājagahaṃ surammaṃ, aṅgassa rañño nagaraṃ durāyutaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2435_0: Tattha aṅgassa raññoti tadā aṅgassa raññova magadharajjaṃ ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ – “aṅgassa
atk-s0514a3:2435_1: rañño nagara”nti. Durāyutanti paccatthikehi durāyuttaṃ. Masakkasāraṃ viya vāsavassāti
atk-s0514a3:2435_3: vāsavassa bhavanaṃ viya. Dijābhighuṭṭhanti aññehi ca pakkhīhi abhisaṅghuṭṭhaṃ ninnāditaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2435_4: Nānāsakuntābhirudanti madhurassarena gāyantehi viya nānāvidhehi sakuṇehi abhirudaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2435_5: abhigītanti attho. Suvaṅgaṇanti sundaraaṅgaṇaṃ manuññatalaṃ. Himavaṃva pabbatanti
atk-s0514a3:2435_6: himavantapabbataṃ viya. Vepulamābhirūhīti bhikkhave, so puṇṇako evarūpaṃ vepullapabbataṃ
atk-s0514a3:2435_7: abhiruhi. Pabbatakūṭamajjheti pabbatakūṭaantare taṃ maṇiṃ addasa.
atk-s0514a3:2437: “Disvā maṇiṃ pabhassaraṃ jātimantaṃ, manoharaṃ maṇiratanaṃ uḷāraṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2442_0: Tattha manoharanti manasābhipatthitassa dhanassa āharaṇasamatthaṃ. Daddallamānanti
atk-s0514a3:2442_1: ujjalamānaṃ. Yasasāti parivāramaṇigaṇena. Obhāsatīti taṃ maṇiratanaṃ ākāse vijjuriva
atk-s0514a3:2442_2: obhāsati. Tamaggahīti taṃ maṇiratanaṃ aggahesi. Taṃ pana maṇiratanaṃ kumbhiro nāma
atk-s0514a3:2442_3: yakkho kumbhaṇḍasahassaparivāro rakkhati. So pana tena kujjhitvā olokitamatteneva
atk-s0514a3:2442_4: bhītatasito palāyitvā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ patvā kampamāno olokento aṭṭhāsi. Iti taṃ
atk-s0514a3:2442_5: palāpetvā puṇṇako maṇiratanaṃ aggahesi. Manoharaṃ nāmāti manasā cintitaṃ dhanaṃ āharituṃ
atk-s0514a3:2443: Iti so taṃ gahetvā ākāsena gacchanto taṃ nagaraṃ patto. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2446: Samāgate ekasataṃ samagge, avhettha yakkho avikampamāno.
atk-s0514a3:2449: Kamanuttaraṃ ratanavaraṃ jināma, ko vāpi no jeti varaddhanenā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2450_0: Tattha oruyhupāgacchi sabhaṃ kurūnanti bhikkhave, so puṇṇako assapiṭṭhito oruyha
atk-s0514a3:2450_1: assaṃ adissamānarūpaṃ ṭhapetvā māṇavakavaṇṇena kurūnaṃ sabhaṃ upagato. Ekasatanti
atk-s0514a3:2450_2: ekasatarājāno achambhīto hutvā “ko nīdhā”tiādīni vadanto jūtena avhettha. Ko nīdhāti
atk-s0514a3:2450_3: ko nu imasmiṃ rājasamāgame. Raññanti rājūnaṃ antare. Varamābhijetīti amhākaṃ santakaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2450_4: seṭṭharatanaṃ abhijeti, “ahaṃ jināmī”ti vattuṃ ussahati. Kamābhijeyyāmāti kaṃ vā
atk-s0514a3:2450_5: mayaṃ jineyyāma. Varaddhanenāti uttamadhanena. Kamanuttaranti jinanto ca kataraṃ
atk-s0514a3:2450_6: rājānaṃ anuttaraṃ ratanavaraṃ jināma. Ko vāpi no jetīti atha vā ko nāma rājā amhe
atk-s0514a3:2450_7: varadhanena jeti. Iti so catūhi padehi korabyameva ghaṭṭeti.
atk-s0514a3:2451: Atha rājā “mayā ito pubbe evaṃ sūro hutvā kathento nāma na diṭṭhapubbo, ko nu kho eso”ti cintetvā pucchanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2453: “Kuhiṃ nu raṭṭhe tava jātibhūmi, na korabyasseva vaco tavedaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2454: Abhītosi no vaṇṇanibhāya sabbe, akkhāhi me nāmañca bandhave cā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2455: Tattha na korabyassevāti kururaṭṭhavāsikasseva tava vacanaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0514a3:2456_0: Taṃ sutvā itaro “ayaṃ rājā mama nāmaṃ pucchati, puṇṇako ca nāma dāso hoti. Sacāhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2456_1: ‘puṇṇakosmī’ti vakkhāmi, ‘esa dāso, tasmā maṃ pagabbhatāya evaṃ vadetī’ti avamaññissati,
atk-s0514a3:2456_2: anantarātīte attabhāve nāmamassa kathessāmī”ti cintetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2459: Aṅgesu me ñātayo bandhavā ca, akkhena devasmi idhānupatto”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2460_0: Tattha anūnanāmoti na ūnanāmo. Iminā attano puṇṇakanāmameva paṭicchannaṃ katvā katheti.
atk-s0514a3:2460_1: Iti mavhayantīti iti maṃ avhayanti pakkosanti. Aṅgesūti aṅgaraṭṭhe kālacampānagare
atk-s0514a3:2460_2: vasanti. Akkhena devasmīti deva, jūtakīḷanatthena idha anuppattosmi.
atk-s0514a3:2461: Atha rājā “māṇava, tvaṃ jūtena jito kiṃ dassasi, kiṃ te atthī”ti pucchanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2463: “Kiṃ māṇavassa ratanāni atthi, ye taṃ jinanto hare akkhadhutto;
atk-s0514a3:2464: Bahūni rañño ratanāni atthi, te tvaṃ daliddo kathamavhayesī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2465_0: Tassattho – kittakāni bhoto māṇavassa ratanāni atthi, ye taṃ jinanto akkhadhutto
atk-s0514a3:2465_1: “āharā”ti vatvā hareyya. Rañño pana nivesane bahūni ratanāni atthi, te rājāno evaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2465_2: bahudhane tvaṃ daliddo samāno kathaṃ jūtena avhayasīti.
atk-s0514a3:2468: “Manoharo nāma maṇī mamāyaṃ, manoharaṃ maṇiratanaṃ uḷāraṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2469: Imañca ājaññamamittatāpanaṃ, etaṃ me jinitvā hare akkhadhutto”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2470: Pāḷipotthakesu pana “maṇi mama vijjati lohitaṅko”ti likhitaṃ. So pana maṇi veḷuriyo, tasmā idameva sameti.
atk-s0514a3:2471: Tattha ājaññanti imaṃ ājānīyassañca maṇiñcāti etaṃ me ubhayaṃ hareyya akkhadhuttoti assaṃ dassetvā evamāha.
atk-s0514a3:2474: “Eko maṇī māṇava kiṃ karissati, ājāniyeko pana kiṃ karissati;
atk-s0514a3:2475: Bahūni rañño maṇiratanāni atthi, ājāniyā vātajavā anappakā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2478_0: So rañño kathaṃ sutvā “mahārāja, kiṃ nāma etaṃ vadetha, eko asso assasahassaṃ lakkhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2478_1: hoti, eko maṇi maṇisahassaṃ lakkhaṃ hoti. Na hi sabbe assā ekasadisā, imassa tāva
atk-s0514a3:2478_2: javaṃ passathā”ti vatvā assaṃ abhiruhitvā pākāramatthakena pesesi. Sattayojanikaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2478_3: nagaraṃ assehi gīvāya gīvaṃ paharantehi parikkhittaṃ viya ahosi. Athānukkamena assopi
atk-s0514a3:2478_4: na paññāyi, yakkhopi na paññāyi, udare baddharattapaṭova paññāyi. So assato oruyha
atk-s0514a3:2478_5: “diṭṭho, mahārāja, assassa vego”ti vatvā “āma, diṭṭho”ti vutte “idāni puna passa,
atk-s0514a3:2478_6: mahārājā”ti vatvā assaṃ antonagare uyyāne pokkharaṇiyā udakapiṭṭhe pesesi, khuraggāni
atk-s0514a3:2478_7: atementova pakkhandi. Atha naṃ padumapattesu vicarāpetvā pāṇiṃ paharitvā hatthaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2478_8: pasāresi, asso āgantvā pāṇitale patiṭṭhāsi. Tato “vaṭṭate evarūpaṃ assaratanaṃ narindā”ti
atk-s0514a3:2478_9: vatvā “vaṭṭatī”ti vutte “mahārāja, assaratanaṃ tāva tiṭṭhatu, maṇiratanassa mahānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2484: Nāgarājā supaṇṇā ca, maṇimhi passa nimmita”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2485_0: Tattha itthīnanti etasmiñhi maṇiratane alaṅkatapaṭiyattā anekā itthiviggahā purisaviggahā
atk-s0514a3:2485_1: nānappakārā migapakkhisaṅghā senaṅgādīni ca paññāyanti, tāni dassento evamāha. Nimmitanti
atk-s0514a3:2485_2: idaṃ evarūpaṃ accherakaṃ maṇimhi nimmitaṃ passa.
atk-s0514a3:2493: Tattha balaggānīti balāneva. Viyūḷhānīti byūhavasena ṭhitāni.
atk-s0514a3:2499: Aṭṭālake ca dvāre ca, maṇimhi passa nimmita”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2500_0: Tattha puranti nagaraṃ. Uddhāpasampannanti pākāravatthunā sampannaṃ. Bahupākāratoraṇanti
atk-s0514a3:2500_2: nagarūpacāre vicittā ramaṇīyabhūmiyo. Esikāti nagaradvāresu uṭṭhāpite esikatthambhe.
atk-s0514a3:2500_3: Palikhanti palighaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Aggaḷānīti nagaradvārakavāṭāni. Dvāre cāti gopurāni ca.
atk-s0514a3:2503: Haṃsā koñcā mayūrā ca, cakkavākā ca kukkuhā.
atk-s0514a3:2507: Tattha toraṇamaggesūti etasmiṃ nagare toraṇaggesu. Kuṇālakāti kāḷakokilā. Citrāti citrapattakokilā.
atk-s0514a3:2514_0: Tattha supākāranti kañcanapākāraparikkhittaṃ. Paṇṇasālāyoti nānābhaṇḍapuṇṇe āpaṇe.
atk-s0514a3:2514_1: Nivesane nivese cāti gehāni ceva gehavatthūni ca. Sandhibyūheti gharasandhiyo ca
atk-s0514a3:2516: “Pānāgāre ca soṇḍe ca, sūnā odaniyā gharā;
atk-s0514a3:2517: Vesī ca gaṇikāyo ca, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2524_0: Tattha soṇḍe cāti attano anurūpehi kaṇṭhakaṇṇapilandhanehi samannāgate āpānabhūmiṃ
atk-s0514a3:2524_1: sajjetvā nisinne surāsoṇḍe ca. Āḷāriketi pūvapāke. Sūdeti bhattakārake. Pāṇissareti
atk-s0514a3:2533: Vetālike ca jalle ca, maṇimhi passa nimmita”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2534_1: nānātūriyānaṃ tāḷitehi saṅghuṭṭhaṃ. Muṭṭhikāti muṭṭhikamallā. Sobhiyāti nagarasobhanā
atk-s0514a3:2534_2: itthī ca sampannarūpā purisā ca. Vetāliketi vetālauṭṭhāpake. Jalleti massūni karonte nhāpite.
atk-s0514a3:2538: Tattha mañcātimañceti mañcānaṃ upari baddhamañce. Bhūmiyoti ramaṇīyā samajjabhūmiyo.
atk-s0514a3:2541: Nihate nihatamāne ca, maṇimhi passa nimmita”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2542: Tattha samajjasminti mallaraṅge. Nihateti nihanitvā jinitvā ṭhite. Nihatamāneti parājite.
atk-s0514a3:2548: Eṇeyyā ca varāhā ca, gaṇino nīkasūkarā.
atk-s0514a3:2552_0: Tattha palāsādāti khaggamigā. “Palatā”tipi pāṭho. Gavajāti gavayā. Varāhāti ekā migajātikā.
atk-s0514a3:2552_1: Tathā gaṇino ceva nīkasūkarā ca. Bahū citrāti nānappakārā citrā migā. Biḷārāti araññabiḷārā.
atk-s0514a3:2559: Tattha najjāyoti nadiyo. Soṇṇavālukasanthatāti suvaṇṇavālukāya santhatatalā. Kumbhīlāti ime evarūpā jalacarā antonadiyaṃ vicaranti, tepi maṇimhi passāhīti.
atk-s0514a3:2563: Tattha veḷuriyakarodāyoti veḷuriyapāsāṇe paharitvā saddaṃ karontiyo evarūpā najjāyoti.
atk-s0514a3:2570: Tattha puthulomanisevitāti mahāmacchehi nisevitā. Vanarājehīti vanarājīhi, ayameva vā pāṭho.
atk-s0514a3:2579: Cattāro ca mahārāje, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2595_0: Tattha videheti pubbavidehadīpaṃ. Goyāniyeti aparagoyānadīpaṃ. Kuruyoti uttarakuru
atk-s0514a3:2595_1: ca dakkhiṇato jambudīpañca. Anupariyanteti ete candimasūriye sineruṃ anupariyāyante.
atk-s0514a3:2598: Pajjalante ca vaṇṇena, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2600: “Tāvatiṃse ca yāme ca, tusite cāpi nimmite;
atk-s0514a3:2608: Cha piṅgalā pannarasa, haliddā ca catuddasa.
atk-s0514a3:2618_0: Tattha dasettha rājiyo setāti etasmiṃ maṇikkhandhe dasa setarājiyo. Cha piṅgalā pannarasāti
atk-s0514a3:2618_1: cha ca pannarasa cāti ekavīsati piṅgalarājiyo. Haliddāti haliddavaṇṇā catuddasa.
atk-s0514a3:2618_2: Tiṃsatīti indagopakavaṇṇābhā tiṃsa rājiyo. Dasa chaccāti dasa ca cha ca soḷasa kāḷarājiyo.
atk-s0514a3:2618_3: Pannavīsatīti pañcavīsati mañjeṭṭhavaṇṇā pabhassarā. Missā bandhukapupphehīti kāḷamañjeṭṭhavaṇṇarājiyo
atk-s0514a3:2618_4: etehi missā vicittikā passa. Ettha hi kāḷarājiyo bandhujīvakapupphehi missā, mañjeṭṭharājiyo
atk-s0514a3:2618_5: nīluppalehi vicittikā. Odhisuṅkanti suṅkakoṭṭhāsaṃ. Yo maṃ jūte jinissati, tassimaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2618_6: suṅkakoṭṭhāsaṃ passāti vadati. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “hotu suṅkaṃ, mahārājā”tipi pāṭho.
atk-s0514a3:2618_7: Tassattho – dvipaduttama passa tvaṃ imaṃ evarūpaṃ maṇikkhandhaṃ, idameva, mahārāja,
atk-s0514a3:2618_8: suṅkaṃ hotu. Yo maṃ jūte jinissati, tassidaṃ bhavissatīti.
atk-s0514a3:2621_0: Evaṃ vatvā puṇṇako “mahārāja, ahaṃ tāva jūte parājito imaṃ maṇiratanaṃ dassāmi, tvaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2621_1: pana kiṃ dassasī”ti āha. “Tāta, mama sarīrañca deviñca setacchattañca ṭhapetvā sesaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2621_2: mama santakaṃ suṅkaṃ hotū”ti. “Tena hi, deva, mā cirāyi, ahaṃ dūrāgato, khippaṃ jūtamaṇḍalaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2621_3: sajjāpehī”ti. Rājā amacce āṇāpesi. Te khippaṃ jūtamaṇḍalaṃ sajjetvā rañño varapotthakattharaṇaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2621_4: santharitvā sesarājūnañcāpi āsanāni paññapetvā puṇṇakassapi patirūpaṃ āsanaṃ paññapetvā
atk-s0514a3:2621_5: rañño kālaṃ ārocayiṃsu. Tato puṇṇako rājānaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0514a3:2623: “Upāgataṃ rāja mupehi lakkhaṃ, netādisaṃ maṇiratanaṃ tavatthi;
atk-s0514a3:2624: Dhammena jissāma asāhasena, jito ca no khippamavākarohī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2625_0: Tassattho – mahārāja, jūtasālāya kammaṃ upāgataṃ niṭṭhitaṃ, etādisaṃ maṇiratanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2625_1: tava natthi, mā papañcaṃ karohi, upehi lakkhaṃ akkhehi kīḷanaṭṭhānaṃ upagaccha. Kīḷantā
atk-s0514a3:2625_2: ca mayaṃ dhammena jissāma, dhammeneva no asāhasena jayo hotu. Sace pana tvaṃ jito
atk-s0514a3:2625_3: bhavissasi, atha no khippamavākarohi, papañcaṃ akatvāva jito dhanaṃ dadeyyāsīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0514a3:2626_0: Atha naṃ rājā “māṇava, tvaṃ maṃ ‘rājā’ti mā bhāyi, dhammeneva no asāhasena jayaparājayo
atk-s0514a3:2626_1: bhavissatī”ti āha. Taṃ sutvā puṇṇako “amhākaṃ dhammeneva jayaparājayabhāvaṃ jānāthā”ti
atk-s0514a3:2628: “Pañcāla paccuggata sūrasena, macchā ca maddā saha kekakebhi;
atk-s0514a3:2629: Passantu note asaṭhena yuddhaṃ, na no sabhāyaṃ na karonti kiñcī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2630_0: Tattha paccuggatāti uggatattā paññātattā pākaṭattā pañcālarājānamevālapati. Macchā
atk-s0514a3:2630_1: cāti tvañca, samma maccharāja. Maddāti maddarāja. Saha kekakebhīti kekakebhināmena
atk-s0514a3:2630_2: janapadena saha vattamānakekakebhirāja, tvañca. Atha vā sahasaddaṃ “kekakebhī”ti
atk-s0514a3:2630_3: padassa pacchato ṭhapetvā paccuggatasaddañca sūrasenavisesanaṃ katvā pañcālapaccuggatasūrasena
atk-s0514a3:2630_4: macchā ca maddā ca kekakebhi saha sesarājāno cāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Passantu
atk-s0514a3:2630_5: noteti amhākaṃ dvinnaṃ ete rājāno asaṭhena akkhayuddhaṃ passantu. Na no sabhāyaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2630_6: na karonti kiñcīti ettha noti nipātamattaṃ, sabhāyaṃ kiñci sakkhiṃ na na karonti,
atk-s0514a3:2630_7: khattiyepi brāhmaṇepi karontiyeva, tasmā sace kiñci akāraṇaṃ uppajjati, “na no sutaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2630_8: na no diṭṭha”nti vattuṃ na labhissatha, appamattā hothāti.
atk-s0514a3:2631_0: Evaṃ yakkhasenāpati rājāno sakkhiṃ akāsi. Rājāpi ekasatarājaparivuto puṇṇakaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0514a3:2631_1: jūtasālaṃ pāvisi. Sabbepi patirūpāsanesu nisīdiṃsu, rajataphalake suvaṇṇapāsake ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:2631_2: Puṇṇako turitaturito āha “mahārāja, pāsakesu āyā nāma mālikaṃ sāvaṭṭaṃ bahulaṃ santibhadrādayo
atk-s0514a3:2631_3: catuvīsati, tesu tumhe attano ruccanakaṃ āyaṃ gaṇhathā”ti. Rājā “sādhū”ti bahulaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2631_4: gaṇhi. Puṇṇako sāvaṭṭaṃ gaṇhi. Atha naṃ rājā āha “tena hi tāva māṇava, pāsake pātehī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2631_5: “Mahārāja, paṭhamaṃ mama vāro na pāpuṇāti, tumhe pātethā”ti vutte rājā “sādhū”ti
atk-s0514a3:2631_6: sampaṭicchi. Tassa pana tatiye attabhāve mātubhūtapubbā ārakkhadevatā, tassā ānubhāvena
atk-s0514a3:2631_7: rājā jūte jināti. Sā tassa avidūre ṭhitā ahosi. Rājā devadhītaraṃ anussaritvā jūtagītaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2634: “Atha passatu maṃ amma, vijayaṃ me padissatu;
atk-s0514a3:2636: “Devate tvajja rakkha devi, passa mā maṃ vibhāveyya;
atk-s0514a3:2637: Anukampakā patiṭṭhā ca, passa bhadrāni rakkhituṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2640: “Devate me jayaṃ dehi, passa maṃ appabhāginaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2645_0: Rājā evaṃ jūtagītaṃ gāyitvā pāsake hatthena parivattetvā ākāse khipi. Puṇṇakassa
atk-s0514a3:2645_1: ānubhāvena pāsakā rañño parājayāya bhassanti. Rājā jūtasippamhi atikusalatāya pāsake
atk-s0514a3:2645_2: attano parājayāya bhassante ñatvā ākāseyeva saṅkaḍḍhanto gahetvā puna ākāse khipi.
atk-s0514a3:2645_3: Dutiyampi attano parājayāya bhassante ñatvā tatheva aggahesi. Tato puṇṇako cintesi
atk-s0514a3:2645_4: “ayaṃ rājā mādisena yakkhena saddhiṃ jūtaṃ kīḷanto bhassamāne pāsake saṅkaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0514a3:2645_5: gaṇhāti, kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti. So olokento tassa ārakkhadevatāya ānubhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0514a3:2645_6: akkhīni ummīletvā kuddho viya naṃ olokesi. Sā bhītatasitā palāyitvā cakkavāḷapabbatamatthakaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2645_7: patvā kampamānā oloketvā aṭṭhāsi. Rājā tatiyampi pāsake khipitvā attano parājayāya
atk-s0514a3:2645_8: bhassante ñatvāpi puṇṇakassānubhāvena hatthaṃ pasāretvā gaṇhituṃ nāsakkhi. Te rañño
atk-s0514a3:2645_9: parājayāya patiṃsu. Athassa parājitabhāvaṃ ñatvā puṇṇako apphoṭetvā mahantena saddena
atk-s0514a3:2645_10: “jitaṃ me”ti tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ nadi. So saddo sakalajambudīpaṃ phari. Tamatthaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2647: “Te pāvisuṃ akkhamadena mattā, rājā kurūnaṃ puṇṇako cāpi yakkho;
atk-s0514a3:2648: Rājā kaliṃ viccinamaggahesi, kaṭaṃ aggahī puṇṇako nāma yakkho.
atk-s0514a3:2650: “Te tattha jūte ubhaye samāgate, raññaṃ sakāse sakhīnañca majjhe;
atk-s0514a3:2651: Ajesi yakkho naravīraseṭṭhaṃ, tatthappanādo tumulo babhūvā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2652_0: Tattha pāvisunti jūtasālaṃ pavisiṃsu. Viccinanti rājā catuvīsatiyā āyesu vicinanto
atk-s0514a3:2652_1: kaliṃ parājayaggāhaṃ aggahesi. Kaṭaṃ aggahīti puṇṇako nāma yakkho jayaggāhaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0514a3:2652_2: Te tattha jūte ubhaye samāgateti te tattha jūte samāgatā ubho jūtaṃ kīḷiṃsūti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2652_3: Raññanti atha tesaṃ ekasatarājūnaṃ sakāse avasesānañca sakhīnaṃ majjhe so yakkho
atk-s0514a3:2652_4: naravīraseṭṭhaṃ rājānaṃ ajesi. Tatthappanādo tumulo babhūvāti tasmiṃ jūtamaṇḍale
atk-s0514a3:2652_5: “rañño parājitabhāvaṃ jānātha, jitaṃ me, jitaṃ me”ti mahanto saddo ahosi.
atk-s0514a3:2653: Rājā parājito anattamano ahosi. Atha naṃ samassāsento puṇṇako gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2655: “Jayo mahārāja parājayo ca, āyūhataṃ aññatarassa hoti;
atk-s0514a3:2656: Janinda jīnosi varaddhanena, jito ca me khippamavākarohī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2657_0: Tattha āyūhatanti dvinnaṃ vāyāmamānānaṃ aññatarassa eva hoti, tasmā “parājitomhī”ti
atk-s0514a3:2657_1: mā cintayi. Jīnosīti parihīnosi. Varaddhanenāti paramadhanena. Khippamavākarohīti
atk-s0514a3:2658: Atha naṃ rājā “gaṇha, tātā”ti vadanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2660: “Hatthī gavāssā maṇikuṇḍalā ca, yañcāpi mayhaṃ ratanaṃ pathabyā;
atk-s0514a3:2661: Gaṇhāhi kaccāna varaṃ dhanānaṃ, ādāya yenicchasi tena gacchā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2664: “Hatthī gavāssā maṇikuṇḍalā ca, yañcāpi tuyhaṃ ratanaṃ pathabyā;
atk-s0514a3:2665: Tesaṃ varo vidhuro nāma kattā, so me jito taṃ me avākarohī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2666: Tattha so me jito taṃ meti mayā hi tava vijite uttamaṃ ratanaṃ jitaṃ, so ca sabbaratanānaṃ varo vidhuro, tasmā, deva, so mayā jito nāma hoti, taṃ me dehīti.
atk-s0514a3:2669: “Attā ca me so saraṇaṃ gatī ca, dīpo ca leṇo ca parāyaṇo ca;
atk-s0514a3:2670: Asantuleyyo mama so dhanena, pāṇena me sādiso esa kattā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2671_0: Tattha attā ca me soti so mayhaṃ attā ca, mayā ca “attānaṃ ṭhapetvā sesaṃ dassāmī”ti
atk-s0514a3:2671_1: vuttaṃ, tasmā taṃ mā gaṇhi. Na kevalañca attāva, atha kho me so saraṇañca gati ca
atk-s0514a3:2671_2: dīpo ca leṇo ca parāyaṇo ca. Asantuleyyo mama so dhanenāti sattavidhena ratanena
atk-s0514a3:2674: “Ciraṃ vivādo mama tuyhañcassa, kāmañca pucchāma tameva gantvā;
atk-s0514a3:2675: Esova no vivaratu etamatthaṃ, yaṃ vakkhatī hotu kathā ubhinna”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2676: Tattha vivaratu etamatthanti “so tava attā vā na vā”ti etamatthaṃ esova pakāsetu. Hotu kathā ubhinnanti yaṃ so vakkhati, sāyeva no ubhinnaṃ kathā hotu, taṃ pamāṇaṃ hotūti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2679: “Addhā hi saccaṃ bhaṇasi, na ca māṇava sāhasaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2680: Tameva gantvā pucchāma, tena tussāmubho janā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2681: Tattha na ca māṇava sāhasanti mayhaṃ pasayha sāhasikavacanaṃ na ca bhaṇasi.
atk-s0514a3:2682_0: Evaṃ vatvā rājā ekasatarājāno puṇṇakañca gahetvā tuṭṭhamānaso vegena dhammasabhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2682_1: agamāsi. Paṇḍitopi āsanā oruyha rājānaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Atha puṇṇako
atk-s0514a3:2682_2: mahāsattaṃ āmantetvā “paṇḍita, ‘tvaṃ dhamme ṭhito jīvitahetupi musāvādaṃ na bhaṇasī’ti
atk-s0514a3:2682_3: kittisaddo te sakalaloke phuṭo, ahaṃ pana te ajja dhamme ṭhitabhāvaṃ jānissāmī”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2684: “Saccaṃ nu devā vidahū kurūnaṃ, dhamme ṭhitaṃ vidhuraṃ nāmamaccaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2685: Dāsosi rañño uda vāsi ñāti, vidhuroti saṅkhā katamāsi loke”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2686_0: Tattha saccaṃ nu devā vidahū kurūnaṃ, dhamme ṭhitaṃ vidhuraṃ nāmamaccanti “kurūnaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2686_1: raṭṭhe vidhuro nāma amacco dhamme ṭhito jīvitahetupi musāvādaṃ na bhaṇatī”ti evaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2686_2: devā vidahū vidahanti kathenti pakāsenti, evaṃ vidahamānā te devā saccaṃ nu vidahanti,
atk-s0514a3:2686_3: udāhu abhūtavādāyeveteti. Vidhuroti saṅkhā katamāsi loketi yā esā tava “vidhuro”ti
atk-s0514a3:2686_4: loke saṅkhā paññatti, sā katamā āsi, tvaṃ pakāsehi, kiṃ nu rañño dāso nīcatarajātiko,
atk-s0514a3:2686_5: udāhu samo vā uttaritaro vā ñātīti idaṃ tāva me ācikkha, dāsosi rañño, uda vāsi ñātīti.
atk-s0514a3:2687_0: Atha mahāsatto “ayaṃ maṃ evaṃ pucchati, ahaṃ kho panetaṃ ‘rañño ñātī’tipi ‘rañño
atk-s0514a3:2687_1: uttaritaro’tipi ‘rañño na kiñci homī’tipi saññāpetuṃ sakkomi, evaṃ santepi imasmiṃ
atk-s0514a3:2687_2: loke saccasamo avassayo nāma natthi, saccameva kathetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā “māṇava,
atk-s0514a3:2687_3: nevāhaṃ rañño ñāti, na uttaritaro, catunnaṃ pana dāsānaṃ aññataro”ti dassetuṃ gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2689: “Āmāyadāsāpi bhavanti heke, dhanena kītāpi bhavanti dāsā;
atk-s0514a3:2690: Sayampi heke upayanti dāsā, bhayā paṇunnāpi bhavanti dāsā.
atk-s0514a3:2692: “Ete narānaṃ caturova dāsā, addhā hi yonito ahampi jāto;
atk-s0514a3:2693: Bhavo ca rañño abhavo ca rañño, dāsāhaṃ devassa parampi gantvā;
atk-s0514a3:2695_0: Tattha āmāyadāsāti dāsiyā kucchimhi jātadāsā. Sayampi heke upayanti dāsāti ye keci
atk-s0514a3:2695_1: upaṭṭhākajātikā, sabbe te sayaṃ dāsabhāvaṃ upagatā dāsā nāma. Bhayā paṇunnāti rājabhayena
atk-s0514a3:2695_2: vā corabhayena vā attano vasanaṭṭhānato paṇunnā karamarā hutvā paravisayaṃ gatāpi
atk-s0514a3:2695_3: dāsāyeva nāma. Addhā hi yonito ahampi jātoti māṇava, ekaṃseneva ahampi catūsu dāsayonīsu
atk-s0514a3:2695_4: ekato sayaṃ dāsayonito nibbattadāso. Bhavo ca rañño abhavo ca raññoti rañño vuḍḍhi
atk-s0514a3:2695_5: vā hotu avuḍḍhi vā, na sakkā mayā musā bhāsituṃ. Parampīti dūraṃ gantvāpi ahaṃ devassa
atk-s0514a3:2695_6: dāsoyeva. Dajjāti maṃ rājā jayadhanena khaṇḍetvā tuyhaṃ dento dhammena sabhāvena dadeyyāti.
atk-s0514a3:2696: Taṃ sutvā puṇṇako haṭṭhatuṭṭho puna apphoṭetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2698: “Ayaṃ dutīyo vijayo mamajja, puṭṭho hi kattā vivarettha pañhaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2699: Adhammarūpo vata rājaseṭṭho, subhāsitaṃ nānujānāsi mayha”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2700_0: Tattha rājaseṭṭhoti ayaṃ rājaseṭṭho adhammarūpo vata. Subhāsitanti vidhurapaṇḍitena
atk-s0514a3:2700_1: sukathitaṃ suvinicchitaṃ. Nānujānāsi mayhanti idānetaṃ vidhurapaṇḍitaṃ mayhaṃ kasmā
atk-s0514a3:2701_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā anattamano hutvā “paṇḍito mādisaṃ yasadāyakaṃ anoloketvā idāni diṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2701_1: māṇavakaṃ oloketī”ti mahāsattassa kujjhitvā “māṇava, sace so dāso me bhaveyya, taṃ
atk-s0514a3:2703: “Evaṃ ce no so vivarettha pañhaṃ, dāsohamasmi na ca khosmi ñāti;
atk-s0514a3:2704: Gaṇhāhi kaccāna varaṃ dhanānaṃ, ādāya yenicchasi tena gacchā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2705_0: Tattha evaṃ ce no so vivarettha pañhanti sace so amhākaṃ pañhaṃ “dāsohamasmi, na
atk-s0514a3:2705_1: ca khosmi ñātī”ti evaṃ vivari ettha parisamaṇḍale, atha kiṃ acchasi, sakalaloke dhanānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2705_2: varaṃ etaṃ gaṇha, gahetvā ca pana yena icchasi, tena gacchāti.
atk-s0514a3:2708_0: Evañca pana vatvā rājā cintesi “paṇḍitaṃ gahetvā māṇavo yathāruci gamissati, tassa
atk-s0514a3:2708_1: gatakālato paṭṭhāya mayhaṃ madhuradhammakathā dullabhā bhavissati, yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2708_2: attano ṭhāne ṭhapetvā alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīdapetvā gharāvāsapañhaṃ puccheyya”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2708_3: Atha naṃ rājā evamāha “paṇḍita, tumhākaṃ gatakāle mama madhuradhammakathā dullabhā
atk-s0514a3:2708_4: bhavissati, alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīdāpetvā attano ṭhāne ṭhatvā mayhaṃ gharāvāsapañhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2708_5: kathethā”ti. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvā raññā pañhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2711: Khemā vutti kathaṃ assa, kathaṃ nu assa saṅgaho.
atk-s0514a3:2714: Asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ, kathaṃ pecca na socatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2715_0: Tattha khemā vutti kathaṃ assāti kathaṃ gharāvāsaṃ vasantassa gahaṭṭhassa khemā nibbhayā
atk-s0514a3:2715_1: vutti bhaveyya. Kathaṃ nu assa saṅgahoti catubbidho saṅgahavatthusaṅkhāto saṅgaho
atk-s0514a3:2715_2: tassa kathaṃ bhaveyya. Abyābajjhanti niddukkhatā. Saccavādī cāti kathaṃ nu māṇavo
atk-s0514a3:2715_3: saccavādī nāma bhaveyya. Peccāti paralokaṃ gantvā.
atk-s0514a3:2716: Taṃ sutvā paṇḍito rañño pañhaṃ kathesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2722: Na seve lokāyatikaṃ, netaṃ paññāya vaḍḍhanaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2734: Khemā vutti siyā evaṃ, evaṃ nu assa saṅgaho.
atk-s0514a3:2737: Asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ, evaṃ pecca na socatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2738_0: Tattha taṃ tatthāti bhikkhave, taṃ rājānaṃ tattha dhammasabhāyaṃ ñāṇagatiyā gatimā,
atk-s0514a3:2738_1: abbocchinnavīriyena dhitimā, bhūrisamāya vipulāya paññāya matimā, saṇhasukhumatthadassinā
atk-s0514a3:2738_2: ñāṇena atthadassimā, paricchinditvā jānanañāṇasaṅkhātāya paññāya sabbadhammānaṃ saṅkhātā,
atk-s0514a3:2738_3: vidhurapaṇḍito etaṃ “na sādhāraṇadārassā”tiādivacanaṃ abravi. Tattha yo paresaṃ dāresu
atk-s0514a3:2738_4: aparajjhati, so sādhāraṇadāro nāma, tādiso na assa bhaveyya. Na bhuñje sādumekakoti
atk-s0514a3:2738_5: sādurasaṃ paṇītabhojanaṃ aññesaṃ adatvā ekakova na bhuñjeyya. Lokāyatikanti anatthanissitaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2738_6: saggamaggānaṃ adāyakaṃ aniyyānikaṃ vitaṇḍasallāpaṃ lokāyatikavādaṃ na seveyya. Netaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2738_7: paññāya vaḍḍhananti na hi etaṃ lokāyatikaṃ paññāya vaḍḍhanaṃ. Sīlavāti akhaṇḍehi
atk-s0514a3:2738_8: pañcahi sīlehi samannāgato. Vattasampannoti gharāvāsavattena vā rājavattena vā samannāgato.
atk-s0514a3:2738_9: Appamattoti kusaladhammesu appamatto. Nivātavuttīti atimānaṃ akatvā nīcavutti ovādānusāsanipaṭicchako.
atk-s0514a3:2738_10: Atthaddhoti thaddhamacchariyavirahito. Suratoti soraccena samannāgato. Sakhiloti
atk-s0514a3:2739_0: Saṅgahetā ca mittānanti kalyāṇamittānaṃ saṅgahakaro. Dānādīsu yo yena saṅgahaṃ icchati,
atk-s0514a3:2739_1: tassa teneva saṅgāhako. Saṃvibhāgīti dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānañceva kapaṇaddhikavaṇibbakayācakādīnañca
atk-s0514a3:2739_2: saṃvibhāgakaro. Vidhānavāti “imasmiṃ kāle kasituṃ vaṭṭati, imasmiṃ kāle vapituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0514a3:2739_3: evaṃ sabbakiccesu vidhānasampanno. Tappeyyāti gahitagahitabhājanāni pūretvā dadamāno
atk-s0514a3:2739_4: tappeyya. Dhammakāmoti paveṇidhammampi sucaritadhammampi kāmayamāno patthayamāno.
atk-s0514a3:2739_5: Sutādhāroti sutassa ādhārabhūto. Paripucchakoti dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇe upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0514a3:2739_6: “kiṃ, bhante, kusala”ntiādivacanehi paripucchanasīlo. Sakkaccanti gāravena. Evaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2739_7: nu assa saṅgahoti saṅgahopissa evaṃ kato nāma bhaveyya. Saccavādīti evaṃ paṭipannoyeva
atk-s0514a3:2740: Evaṃ mahāsatto rañño gharāvāsapañhaṃ kathetvā pallaṅkā oruyha rājānaṃ vandi. Rājāpissa mahāsakkāraṃ katvā ekasatarājūhi parivuto attano nivesanameva gato.
atk-s0514a3:2743: Mahāsatto pana paṭinivatto. Atha naṃ puṇṇako āha –
atk-s0514a3:2745: “Ehi dāni gamissāma, dinno no issarena me;
atk-s0514a3:2747_0: Tattha dinno noti ettha noti nipātamattaṃ, tvaṃ issarena mayhaṃ dinnoti attho. Sanantanoti
atk-s0514a3:2747_1: mama atthaṃ paṭipajjantena hi tayā attano sāmikassa attho paṭipanno hoti. Yañcetaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2747_2: sāmikassa atthakaraṇaṃ nāma, esa dhammo sanantano porāṇakapaṇḍitānaṃ sabhāvoti.
atk-s0514a3:2751: Tīhañca taṃ vāsayemu agāre, yenaddhunā anusāsemu putte”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2752_0: Tattha tayāhamasmīti tayā laddhohamasmīti jānāmi, labhantena ca na aññathā laddho.
atk-s0514a3:2752_1: Dinnohamasmi tava issarenāti mama issarena raññā ahaṃ tava dinno. Tīhaṃ cāti māṇava,
atk-s0514a3:2752_2: ahaṃ tava bahūpakāro, rājānaṃ anoloketvā saccameva kathesiṃ, tenāhaṃ tayā laddho,
atk-s0514a3:2752_3: tvaṃ me mahantaguṇabhāvaṃ jānāhi, mayaṃ tīṇipi divasāni attano agāre vāsemu, tasmā
atk-s0514a3:2752_4: yenaddhunā yattakena kālena mayaṃ puttādāre anusāsemu, taṃ kālaṃ adhivāsehīti.
atk-s0514a3:2753: Taṃ sutvā puṇṇako “saccaṃ paṇḍito āha, bahūpakāro esa mama, ‘sattāhampi aḍḍhamāsampi nisīdāhī’ti vutte adhivāsetabbamevā”ti cintetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2755: “Taṃ me tathā hotu vasemu tīhaṃ, kurutaṃ bhavajja gharesu kiccaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2756: Anusāsataṃ puttadāre bhavajja, yathā tayī pecca sukhī bhaveyyā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2757_0: Tattha taṃ meti yaṃ tvaṃ vadesi, sabbaṃ taṃ mama tathā hotu. Bhavajjāti bhavaṃ ajja
atk-s0514a3:2757_1: paṭṭhāya tīhaṃ anusāsatu. Tayī peccāti yathā tayi gate pacchā tava puttadāro sukhī
atk-s0514a3:2758: Evaṃ vatvā puṇṇako mahāsattena saddhiṃyeva tassa nivesanaṃ pāvisi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2760: “Sādhūti vatvāna pahūtakāmo, pakkāmi yakkho vidhurena saddhiṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2762_0: Tattha pahūtakāmoti mahābhogo. Kuñjarājaññahayānuciṇṇanti kuñjarehi ca ājaññahayehi
atk-s0514a3:2762_1: ca anuciṇṇaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ. Ariyaseṭṭhoti ācāraariyesu uttamo puṇṇako yakkho paṇḍitassa antepuraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0514a3:2763: Mahāsattassa pana tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ atthāya tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ. Tesu eko koñco nāma, eko mayūro nāma, eko piyaketo nāma. Te sandhāya ayaṃ gāthā vuttā –
atk-s0514a3:2765: “Koñcaṃ mayūrañca piyañca ketaṃ, upāgamī tattha surammarūpaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2767: Tattha tatthāti tesu tīsu pāsādesu yattha tasmiṃ samaye attanā vasati, taṃ surammarūpaṃ pāsādaṃ puṇṇakaṃ ādāya upāgami.
atk-s0514a3:2768_0: So upagantvā ca pana alaṅkatapāsādassa sattamāya bhūmiyā sayanagabbhañceva mahātalañca
atk-s0514a3:2768_1: sajjāpetvā sirisayanaṃ paññāpetvā sabbaṃ annapānādividhiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā devakaññāyo
atk-s0514a3:2768_2: viya pañcasatā itthiyo “imā te pādaparicārikā hontu, anukkaṇṭhanto idha vasāhī”ti
atk-s0514a3:2768_3: tassa niyyādetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gato. Tassa gatakāle tā itthiyo nānātūriyāni
atk-s0514a3:2768_4: gahetvā puṇṇakassa paricariyāya naccādīni paṭṭhapesuṃ. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2772: Tattha avhayanti varāvaranti varato varaṃ naccañca gītañca karontiyo pakkosanti.
atk-s0514a3:2774: “Samaṅgikatvā pamadāhi yakkhaṃ, annena pānena ca dhammapālo;
atk-s0514a3:2776: Tattha pamadāhīti pamadāhi ceva annapānehi ca samaṅgikatvā. Dhammapāloti dhammassa pālako gopako. Atthatthamevāti atthabhūtameva atthaṃ. Bhariyāyāti sabbajeṭṭhikāya bhariyāya.
atk-s0514a3:2779: Bhariyaṃvacā ‘ehi suṇohi bhoti, puttāni āmantaya tambanette”’ti.
atk-s0514a3:2780: Tattha bhariyaṃvacāti jeṭṭhabhariyaṃ avaca. Āmantayāti pakkosa.
atk-s0514a3:2782: “Sutvāna vākyaṃ patino anujjā, suṇisaṃ vaca tambanakhiṃ sunettaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2784_0: Tattha anujjāti evaṃnāmikā. Suṇisaṃvaca tambanakhiṃ sunettanti sā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0514a3:2784_1: assumukhī rodamānā “sayaṃ gantvā putte pakkosituṃ ayuttaṃ, suṇisaṃ pesessāmī”ti tassā
atk-s0514a3:2784_2: nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tambanakhiṃ sunettaṃ suṇisaṃ avaca. Vammadharānīti vammadhare
atk-s0514a3:2784_3: sūre, samattheti attho, ābharaṇabhaṇḍameva vā idha “vamma”nti adhippetaṃ, tasmā ābharaṇadharetipi
atk-s0514a3:2784_4: attho. Ceteti taṃ nāmenālapati, puttānīti mama putte ca dhītaro ca. Indīvarapupphasāmeti taṃ ālapati.
atk-s0514a3:2785_0: Sā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā pāsādā oruyha anuvicaritvā “pitā vo ovādaṃ dātukāmo pakkosati,
atk-s0514a3:2785_1: idaṃ kira vo tassa pacchimadassana”nti sabbamevassa suhadajanañca puttadhītaro ca
atk-s0514a3:2785_2: sannipātesi. Dhammapālakumāro pana taṃ vacanaṃ sutvāva rodanto kaniṭṭhabhātikagaṇaparivuto
atk-s0514a3:2785_3: pitu santikaṃ agamāsi. Paṇḍito te disvāva sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto assupuṇṇehi
atk-s0514a3:2785_4: nettehi āliṅgitvā sīse cumbitvā jeṭṭhaputtaṃ muhuttaṃ hadaye nipajjāpetvā hadayā
atk-s0514a3:2785_5: otāretvā sirigabbhato nikkhamma mahātale pallaṅkamajjhe nisīditvā puttasahassassa
atk-s0514a3:2785_6: ovādaṃ adāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2787: “Te āgate muddhani dhammapālo, cumbitvā putte avikampamāno;
atk-s0514a3:2788: Āmantayitvāna avoca vākyaṃ, dinnāhaṃ raññā idha māṇavassa.
atk-s0514a3:2790: “Tassajjahaṃ attasukhī vidheyyo, ādāya yenicchati tena gacchati;
atk-s0514a3:2791: Ahañca vo sāsitumāgatosmi, kathaṃ ahaṃ aparittāya gacche.
atk-s0514a3:2793: “Sace vo rājā kururaṭṭhavāsī, janasandho puccheyya pahūtakāmo;
atk-s0514a3:2794: Kimābhijānātha pure purāṇaṃ, kiṃ vo pitā puratthā.
atk-s0514a3:2796: “Samāsanā hotha mayāva sabbe, konīdha rañño abbhatiko manusso;
atk-s0514a3:2797: Tamañjaliṃ kariya vadetha evaṃ, mā hevaṃ deva na hi esa dhammo;
atk-s0514a3:2798: Viyaggharājassa nihīnajacco, samāsano deva kathaṃ bhaveyyā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2799_0: Tattha dhammapāloti mahāsatto. Dinnāhanti ahaṃ jayadhanena khaṇḍetvā raññā dinno.
atk-s0514a3:2799_1: Tassajjahaṃ attasukhī vidheyyoti ajja paṭṭhāya tīhamattaṃ ahaṃ iminā attano sukhena
atk-s0514a3:2799_2: attasukhī, tato paraṃ pana tassa māṇavassāhaṃ vidheyyo homi. So hi ito catutthe divase
atk-s0514a3:2799_3: ekaṃsena maṃ ādāya yatthicchati, tattha gacchati. Aparittāyāti tumhākaṃ parittaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2799_4: akatvā kathaṃ gaccheyyanti anusāsituṃ āgatosmi. Janasandhoti mittabandhanena mittajanassa
atk-s0514a3:2799_5: sandhānakaro. Pure purāṇanti ito pubbe tumhe kiṃ purāṇakāraṇaṃ abhijānātha. Anusāseti
atk-s0514a3:2799_6: anusāsi. Evaṃ tumhe raññā puṭṭhā “amhākaṃ pitā imañcimañca ovādaṃ adāsī”ti katheyyātha.
atk-s0514a3:2799_7: Samāsanā hothāti sace vo rājā mayā dinnassa ovādassa kathitakāle “etha tumhe, ajja
atk-s0514a3:2799_8: mayā saddhiṃ samāsanā hotha, idha rājakule tumhehi añño ko nu rañño abbhatiko manusso”ti
atk-s0514a3:2799_9: attano āsane nisīdāpeyya, atha tumhe añjaliṃ katvā taṃ rājānaṃ evaṃ vadeyyātha “deva,
atk-s0514a3:2799_10: evaṃ mā avaca. Na hi amhākaṃ esapaveṇidhammo. Viyaggharājassa kesarasīhassa nihīnajacco
atk-s0514a3:2799_11: jarasiṅgālo, deva, kathaṃ samāsano bhaveyya. Yathā siṅgālo sīhassa samāsano na hoti,
atk-s0514a3:2800: Imaṃ panassa kathaṃ sutvā puttadhītaro ca ñātisuhajjādayo ca dāsakammakaraporisā ca te sabbe sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā mahāviravaṃ viraviṃsu. Tesaṃ mahāsatto saññāpesi.
atk-s0514a3:2803_0: Atha ne paṇḍito puttadhītaro ca ñātayo ca upasaṅkamitvā tuṇhībhūte disvā “tātā, mā
atk-s0514a3:2803_1: cintayittha, sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, yaso nāma vipattipariyosāno, apica tumhākaṃ rājavasatiṃ
atk-s0514a3:2803_2: nāma yasapaṭilābhakāraṇaṃ kathessāmi, taṃ ekaggacittā suṇāthā”ti buddhalīlāya rājavasatiṃ
atk-s0514a3:2803_3: nāma paṭṭhapesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2805: “So ca putte amacce ca, ñātayo suhadajjane;
atk-s0514a3:2809: Yathā rājakulaṃ patto, yasaṃ poso nigacchatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2810_0: Tattha suhadajjaneti suhadayajane. Ethayyoti etha, ayyo. Piyasamudācārena putte ālapati.
atk-s0514a3:2810_1: Rājavasatinti mayā vuccamānaṃ rājapāricariyaṃ suṇātha. Yathāti yena kāraṇena rājakulaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2810_2: patto upasaṅkamanto rañño santike caranto poso yasaṃ nigacchati labhati, taṃ kāraṇaṃ suṇāthāti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2812: “Na hi rājakulaṃ patto, aññāto labhate yasaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2816: Atha vissasate tyamhi, guyhañcassa na rakkhatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2817_0: Tattha aññātoti apākaṭaguṇo aviditakammāvadāno. Nāsūroti na asūro bhīrukajātiko.
atk-s0514a3:2817_1: Yadāssa sīlanti yadā assa sevakassa rājā sīlañca paññañca soceyyañca adhigacchati,
atk-s0514a3:2817_2: ācārasampattiñca ñāṇabalañca sucibhāvañca jānāti. Atha vissasate tyamhīti atha rājā
atk-s0514a3:2817_3: tamhi vissasate vissāsaṃ karoti, attano guyhañcassa na rakkhati na gūhati.
atk-s0514a3:2820: Ajjhiṭṭho na vikampeyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2824_0: Tattha tulā yathāti yathā esā vuttappakārā tulā na onamati na unnamati, evameva rājasevako
atk-s0514a3:2824_1: kismiñcideva kamme raññā “idaṃ nāma karohī”ti ajjhiṭṭho āṇatto chandādiagativasena
atk-s0514a3:2824_2: na vikampeyya, sabbakiccesu paggahitatulā viya samo bhaveyya. Sa rājavasatinti so
atk-s0514a3:2824_3: evarūpo sevako rājakule vāsaṃ vaseyya, rājānaṃ paricareyya, evaṃ paricaranto pana
atk-s0514a3:2824_4: yasaṃ labheyyāti attho. Sabbāni abhisambhontoti sabbāni rājakiccāni karonto.
atk-s0514a3:2826: “Divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ, rājakiccesu paṇḍito;
atk-s0514a3:2827: Ajjhiṭṭho na vikampeyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2829: “Divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ, rājakiccesu paṇḍito;
atk-s0514a3:2833: Na tena vutto gaccheyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2834_0: Tattha na vikampeyyāti avikampamāno tāni kiccāni kareyya. Yo cassāti yo ca rañño
atk-s0514a3:2834_1: gamanamaggo sukato assa suppaṭiyādito sumaṇḍito, “iminā maggena gacchā”ti vuttopi tena na gaccheyya.
atk-s0514a3:2837: Sabbattha pacchato gacche, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2839: “Na rañño sadisaṃ vatthaṃ, na mālaṃ na vilepanaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2840: Ākappaṃ sarakuttiṃ vā, na rañño sadisamācare;
atk-s0514a3:2841: Aññaṃ kareyya ākappaṃ, sa rājavasatiṃ vase”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2842_0: Tattha na raññoti rañño kāmabhogena samaṃ kāmabhogaṃ na bhuñjeyya. Tādisassa hi rājā
atk-s0514a3:2842_1: kujjhati. Sabbatthāti sabbesu rūpādīsu kāmaguṇesu rañño pacchatova gaccheyya, hīnatarameva
atk-s0514a3:2842_2: seveyyāti attho. Aññaṃ kareyyāti rañño ākappato sarakuttito ca aññameva ākappaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0514a3:2849_0: Tattha bhāvanti vissāsavasena adhippāyaṃ. Acapaloti amaṇḍanasīlo. Nipakoti paripakkañāṇo.
atk-s0514a3:2849_1: Saṃvutindriyoti pihitachaḷindriyo rañño vā aṅgapaccaṅgāni orodhe vāssa na olokeyya.
atk-s0514a3:2849_2: Manopaṇidhisampannoti acapalena suṭṭhu ṭhapitena cittena samannāgato.
atk-s0514a3:2852: Nāssa kosā dhanaṃ gaṇhe, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2854: “Na niddaṃ bahu maññeyya, na madāya suraṃ pive;
atk-s0514a3:2855: Nāssa dāye mige haññe, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2857: “Nāssa pīṭhaṃ na pallaṅkaṃ, na kocchaṃ na nāvaṃ rathaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2863: “Na ve rājā sakhā hoti, na rājā hoti methuno;
atk-s0514a3:2868_0: Tattha na manteyyāti tassa rañño bhariyāhi saddhiṃ neva kīḷeyya, na raho manteyya.
atk-s0514a3:2868_1: Kosā dhananti rañño kosā dhanaṃ thenetvā na gaṇheyya. Na madāyāti tātā, rājasevako
atk-s0514a3:2868_2: nāma madatthāya suraṃ na piveyya. Nāssa dāye migeti assa rañño dinnābhaye mige na
atk-s0514a3:2868_3: haññeyya. Kocchanti bhaddapīṭhaṃ. Sammatomhīti ahaṃ sammato hutvā evaṃ karomīti na
atk-s0514a3:2868_4: āruheyya. Sammukhañcassa tiṭṭheyyāti assa rañño purato khuddakamahantakathāsavanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0514a3:2868_5: tiṭṭheyya. Sandissanto sabhattunoti yo rājasevako tassa bhattuno dassanaṭṭhāne tiṭṭheyya.
atk-s0514a3:2868_6: Sūkenāti akkhimhi patitena vīhisūkādinā ghaṭṭitaṃ akkhi pakatisabhāvaṃ jahantaṃ yathā
atk-s0514a3:2868_7: kujjhati nāma, evaṃ kujjhanti, na tesu vissāso kātabbo. Pūjito maññamānoti ahaṃ rājapūjitomhīti
atk-s0514a3:2868_8: maññamāno. Pharusaṃ patimanteyyāti yena so kujjhati, tathārūpaṃ na manteyya.
atk-s0514a3:2871: Aggīva saṃyato tiṭṭhe, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2873: “Puttaṃ vā bhātaraṃ vā saṃ, sampaggaṇhāti khattiyo;
atk-s0514a3:2874: Gāmehi nigamehi vā, raṭṭhehi janapadehi vā;
atk-s0514a3:2876_0: Tattha laddhadvāro labhe dvāranti ahaṃ nippaṭihāro laddhadvāroti appaṭihāretvā na
atk-s0514a3:2876_1: paviseyya, punapi dvāraṃ labheyya, paṭihāretvāva paviseyyāti attho. Saṃyatoti appamatto
atk-s0514a3:2876_2: hutvā. Bhātaraṃ vā santi sakaṃ bhātaraṃ vā. Sampaggaṇhātīti “asukagāmaṃ vā asukanigamaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2876_3: vā assa demā”ti yadā sevakehi saddhiṃ katheti. Na bhaṇe chekapāpakanti tadā guṇaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2880: Na tesaṃ antarā gacche, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2883: Paṭilomaṃ na vatteyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2886: Appāsī nipako sūro, sa rājavasatiṃ vase”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2887_0: Tattha na tesaṃ antarā gaccheti tesaṃ lābhassa antarā na gacche, antarāyaṃ na kareyya.
atk-s0514a3:2887_1: Vaṃsovāpīti yathā vaṃsagumbato uggatavaṃso vātena pahaṭakāle pakampati, evaṃ raññā
atk-s0514a3:2887_2: kathitakāle pakampeyya. Cāpovūnudaroti yathā cāpo mahodaro na hoti, evaṃ mahodaro
atk-s0514a3:2887_3: na siyā. Ajivhavāti yathā maccho ajivhatāya na katheti, tathā sevako mandakathatāya
atk-s0514a3:2890: Kāsaṃ sāsaṃ daraṃ bālyaṃ, khīṇamedho nigacchati.
atk-s0514a3:2893: Avikiṇṇaṃ mitaṃ vācaṃ, patte kāle udīraye.
atk-s0514a3:2896: Samphaṃ giraṃ na bhāseyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2900_0: Tattha na bāḷhanti punappunaṃ kilesavasena na gaccheyya. Tejasaṅkhayanti evaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0514a3:2900_1: hi puriso tejasaṅkhayaṃ gacchati pāpuṇāti, taṃ sampassanto bāḷhaṃ na gaccheyya. Daranti
atk-s0514a3:2900_2: kāyadarathaṃ. Bālyanti dubbalabhāvaṃ. Khīṇamedhoti punappunaṃ kilesarativasena khīṇapañño
atk-s0514a3:2900_3: puriso ete kāsādayo nigacchati. Nātivelanti tātā rājūnaṃ santike pamāṇātikkantaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2900_4: na bhāseyya. Patte kāleti attano vacanakāle sampatte. Asaṅghaṭṭoti paraṃ asaṅghaṭṭento.
atk-s0514a3:2903: Appamatto suci dakkho, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2910_0: Tattha vinītoti ācārasampanno. Sippavāti attano kule sikkhitabbasippena samannāgato.
atk-s0514a3:2910_1: Dantoti chasu dvāresu nibbisevano. Katattoti sampāditatto. Niyatoti yasādīni nissāya
atk-s0514a3:2910_2: acalasabhāvo. Mudūti anatimānī. Appamattoti kattabbakiccesu pamādarahito. Dakkhoti
atk-s0514a3:2910_3: upaṭṭhāne cheko. Nivātavuttīti nīcavutti. Sukhasaṃvāsoti garusaṃvāsasīlo. Sahituṃ
atk-s0514a3:2910_4: patitanti pararājūhi sakarañño santikaṃ guyharakkhaṇavasena vā paṭicchannapākaṭakaraṇavasenavā
atk-s0514a3:2910_5: pesitaṃ. Tathārūpena hi saddhiṃ kathentopi rañño sammukhāva katheyya. Bhattāraññevudikkheyyāti
atk-s0514a3:2910_6: attano sāmikameva olokeyya. Na ca aññassa rājinoti aññassa rañño santako na bhaveyya.
atk-s0514a3:2923_0: Tattha sakkaccaṃ payirupāseyyāti gāravena punappunaṃ upasaṅkameyya. Anuvāseyyāti
atk-s0514a3:2923_1: uposathavāsaṃ vasanto anuvatteyya. Tappeyyāti yāvadatthaṃ dānena tappeyya. Āsajjāti
atk-s0514a3:2923_2: upasaṅkamitvā. Paññeti paṇḍite, āsajjapaññe vā, asajjamānapaññeti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2926: Na ca kiñci nivāreyya, dānakāle vaṇibbake.
atk-s0514a3:2929: Kālaññū samayaññū ca, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2933_0: Tattha dinnapubbanti pakatipaṭiyattaṃ dānavattaṃ. Samaṇabrāhmaṇeti samaṇe vā brāhmaṇe
atk-s0514a3:2933_1: vā. Vaṇibbaketi dānakāle vaṇibbake āgate disvā kiñci na nivāreyya. Paññavāti vicāraṇapaññāya
atk-s0514a3:2933_3: dāsakammakaraporisādīnaṃ saṃvidahanakoṭṭhāsesu cheko. Kālaññūti “ayaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2933_4: ayaṃ sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ, ayaṃ uposathakammaṃ kātuṃ kālo”ti jāneyya. Samayaññūti “ayaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2933_5: kasanasamayo, ayaṃ vapanasamayo, ayaṃ vohārasamayo, ayaṃ upaṭṭhānasamayo”ti jāneyya.
atk-s0514a3:2935: “Khalaṃ sālaṃ pasuṃ khettaṃ, gantā cassa abhikkhaṇaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2936: Mitaṃ dhaññaṃ nidhāpeyya, mitaṃva pācaye ghare.
atk-s0514a3:2938: “Puttaṃ vā bhātaraṃ vā saṃ, sīlesu asamāhitaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2939: Anaṅgavā hi te bālā, yathā petā tatheva te;
atk-s0514a3:2944_0: Tattha pasuṃ khettanti gokulañceva sassaṭṭhānañca. Gantāti gamanasīlo. Mitanti minitvā
atk-s0514a3:2944_1: ettakanti ñatvā koṭṭhesu nidhāpeyya. Ghareti gharepi parijanaṃ gaṇetvā mitameva pacāpeyya.
atk-s0514a3:2944_2: Sīlesu asamāhitanti evarūpaṃ dussīlaṃ anācāraṃ kismiñci ādhipaccaṭṭhāne na ṭhapeyyāti
atk-s0514a3:2944_3: attho. Anaṅgavā hi te bālāti “aṅgametaṃ manussānaṃ, bhātā loke pavuccatī”ti kiñcāpi
atk-s0514a3:2944_4: jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhabhātaro aṅgasamānatāya “aṅga”nti vuttā, ime pana dussīlā, tasmā aṅgasamānā
atk-s0514a3:2944_5: na honti. Yathā pana susāne chaḍḍitā petā matā, tatheva te. Tasmā tādisā ādhipaccaṭṭhāne
atk-s0514a3:2944_6: na ṭhapetabbā. Kuṭumbañhi te vināsenti, vinaṭṭhakuṭumbassa ca daliddassa rājavasati
atk-s0514a3:2944_7: nāma na sampajjati. Āsīnānanti āgantvā nisinnānaṃ puttabhātānaṃ matasattānaṃ matakabhattaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2944_8: viya dento ghāsacchādanamattameva padāpeyya. Uṭṭhānasampanneti uṭṭhānavīriyena samannāgate.
atk-s0514a3:2946: “Sīlavā ca alolo ca, anurakkho ca rājino;
atk-s0514a3:2947: Āvī raho hito tassa, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2953: Āhatopi na kuppeyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2954_0: Tattha aloloti aluddho. Cittaṭṭhoti citte ṭhito, rājacittavasikoti attho. Asaṅkusakavuttissāti
atk-s0514a3:2954_1: appaṭilomavutti assa. Adhosiranti pāde dhovantopi adhosiraṃ katvā heṭṭhāmukhova dhoveyya,
atk-s0514a3:2959: “Yo deti sayanaṃ vatthaṃ, yānaṃ āvasathaṃ gharaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2964_0: Tattha kumbhampañjaliṃ kariyā, cāṭañcāpi padakkhiṇanti vuddhiṃ paccāsīsanto puriso
atk-s0514a3:2964_1: udakapūritaṃ kumbhaṃ disvā tassa añjaliṃ kareyya, cāṭañca sakuṇaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0514a3:2964_2: Añjaliṃ vā padakkhiṇaṃ vā karontassa te kiñci dātuṃ na sakkonti. Kimevāti yo pana
atk-s0514a3:2964_3: sabbakāmānaṃ dātā dhīro ca, taṃ rājānaṃ kiṃkāraṇā na namasseyya. Rājāyeva hi namassitabbo
atk-s0514a3:2964_4: ca ārādhetabbo ca. Pajjunnorivāti megho viya. Esayyo rājavasatīti ayyo yā ayaṃ mayā
atk-s0514a3:2964_5: kathitā, esā rājavasati nāma rājasevakānaṃ anusāsanī. Yathāti yāya rājavasatiyā vattamāno
atk-s0514a3:2964_6: naro rājānaṃ ārādheti, rājūnañca santikā pūjaṃ labhati, sā esāti.
atk-s0514a3:2965: Evaṃ asamadhuro vidhurapaṇḍito buddhalīlāya rājavasatiṃ kathesi;
atk-s0514a3:2968_0: Evaṃ puttadārañātimittasuhajjādayo anusāsantasseva tassa tayo divasā jātā. So divasassa
atk-s0514a3:2968_1: pāripūriṃ ñatvā pātova nhatvā nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā “rājānaṃ apaloketvā māṇavena
atk-s0514a3:2968_2: saddhiṃ gamissāmī”ti ñātigaṇaparivuto rājanivesanaṃ gantvā rājānaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2968_3: ṭhito vattabbayuttakaṃ vacanaṃ avoca. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2973: “Vanditvā sirasā pāde, katvā ca naṃ padakkhiṇaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2979: “Putte ca me udikkhesi, yañca maññaṃ ghare dhanaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2980: Yathā pecca na hāyetha, ñātisaṅgho mayī gate.
atk-s0514a3:2983: Evetaṃ khalitaṃ mayhaṃ, etaṃ passāmi accaya”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2984_0: Tattha suhadehīti suhadayehi ñātimittādīhi. Yañca maññanti yañca me aññaṃ tayā ceva
atk-s0514a3:2984_1: aññehi ca rājūhi dinnaṃ ghare aparimāṇaṃ dhanaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ tvameva olokeyyāsi. Peccāti
atk-s0514a3:2984_2: pacchākāle. Khalatīti pakkhalati. Evetanti evaṃ etaṃ. Ahañhi bhūmiyaṃ khalitvā tattheva
atk-s0514a3:2984_3: patiṭṭhitapuriso viya tumhesu khalitvā tumhesuyeva patiṭṭhahāmi. Etaṃ passāmīti yo
atk-s0514a3:2984_4: esa “kiṃ te rājā hotī”ti māṇavena puṭṭhassa mama tumhe anoloketvā saccaṃ apekkhitvā
atk-s0514a3:2984_5: “dāsohamasmī”ti vadantassa accayo, etaṃ accayaṃ passāmi, añño pana me doso natthi,
atk-s0514a3:2984_6: taṃ me accayaṃ tumhe khamatha, etaṃ hadaye katvā pacchā mama puttadāresu mā aparajjhitthāti.
atk-s0514a3:2985: Taṃ sutvā rājā “paṇḍita, tava gamanaṃ mayhaṃ na ruccati, māṇavaṃ upāyena pakkosāpetvā ghātetvā kilañjena paṭicchādetuṃ mayhaṃ ruccatī”ti dīpento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2987: “Sakkā na gantuṃ iti mayha hoti, chetvā vadhitvā idha kātiyānaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2988: Idheva hohī iti mayha ruccati, mā tvaṃ agā uttamabhūripaññā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2989: Tattha chetvāti idheva rājagehe taṃ pothetvā māretvā paṭicchādessāmīti.
atk-s0514a3:2990: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “deva, tumhākaṃ ajjhāsayo evarūpo hoti, so tumhesu ayutto”ti vatvā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2992: “Mā hevadhammesu manaṃ paṇīdahi, atthe ca dhamme ca yutto bhavassu;
atk-s0514a3:2993: Dhiratthu kammaṃ akusalaṃ anariyaṃ, yaṃ katvā pacchā nirayaṃ vajeyya.
atk-s0514a3:2995: “Nevesa dhammo na puneta kiccaṃ, ayiro hi dāsassa janinda issaro;
atk-s0514a3:2996: Ghātetuṃ jhāpetuṃ athopi hantuṃ, na ca mayha kodhatthi vajāmi cāha”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2997_0: Tattha mā hevadhammesu manaṃ paṇīdahīti adhammesu anatthesu ayuttesu tava cittaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2997_1: mā heva paṇidahīti attho. Pacchāti yaṃ kammaṃ katvāpi ajarāmaro na hoti, atha kho
atk-s0514a3:2997_2: pacchā nirayameva upapajjeyya. Dhiratthu kammanti taṃ kammaṃ garahitaṃ atthu assa
atk-s0514a3:2997_3: bhaveyya. Nevesāti neva esa. Ayiroti sāmiko. Ghātetunti etāni ghātādīni kātuṃ ayiro
atk-s0514a3:2997_4: dāsassa issaro, sabbānetāni kātuṃ labhati, mayhaṃ māṇave appamattakopi kodho natthi,
atk-s0514a3:2997_5: dinnakālato paṭṭhāya tava cittaṃ sandhāretuṃ vaṭṭati, vajāmi ahaṃ narindāti āha –
atk-s0514a3:2998_0: Evaṃ vatvā mahāsatto rājānaṃ vanditvā rañño orodhe ca puttadāre ca rājaparisañca
atk-s0514a3:2998_1: ovaditvā tesu sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkuṇitvā mahāviravaṃ viravantesuyeva rājanivesanā
atk-s0514a3:2998_2: nikkhami. Sakalanagaravāsinopi “paṇḍito kira māṇavena saddhiṃ gamissati, etha, passissāma
atk-s0514a3:2998_3: na”nti mantayitvā rājaṅgaṇeyeva naṃ passiṃsu. Atha ne mahāsatto assāsetvā “tumhe
atk-s0514a3:2998_4: mā cintayittha, sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, sarīraṃ addhuvaṃ, yaso nāma vipattipariyosāno,
atk-s0514a3:2998_5: apica tumhe dānādīsu puññesu appamattā hothā”ti tesaṃ ovādaṃ datvā nivattāpetvā attano
atk-s0514a3:2998_6: gehābhimukho pāyāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe dhammapālakumāro bhātikagaṇaparivuto “pitu paccuggamanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2998_7: karissāmī”ti nikkhanto nivesanadvāreyeva pitu sammukho ahosi. Mahāsatto taṃ disvā
atk-s0514a3:2998_8: sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto upaguyha ure nipajjāpetvā nivesanaṃ pāvisi. Tamatthaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3002_0: Ghare panassa sahassaputtā, sahassadhītaro, sahassabhariyāyo, ca sattavaṇṇadāsisatāni
atk-s0514a3:3002_1: ca santi, tehi ceva avasesadāsidāsakammakarañātimittasuhajjādīhi ca sakalanivesanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3002_2: yugantavātābhighātapatitehi sālehi sālavanaṃ viya nirantaraṃ ahosi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:3005: Senti puttā ca dārā ca, vidhurassa nivesane.
atk-s0514a3:3010: “Orodhā ca kumārā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
atk-s0514a3:3020: Bāhā paggayha pakkantuṃ, kasmā no vijahissasi.
atk-s0514a3:3022: “Orodhā ca kumārā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
atk-s0514a3:3023: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, kasmā no vijahissasi.
atk-s0514a3:3026: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, kasmā no vijahissasi.
atk-s0514a3:3029: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, kasmā no vijahissasī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3030_0: Tattha sentīti mahātale chinnapādā viya patitā āvattantā parivattantā sayanti. Itthisahassaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3030_1: bhariyānanti bhariyānameva itthīnaṃ sahassaṃ. Kasmā no vijahissasīti kena kāraṇena
atk-s0514a3:3031_0: Mahāsatto sabbaṃ taṃ mahājanaṃ assāsetvā ghare avasesakiccāni katvā antojanañca bahijanañca
atk-s0514a3:3031_1: ovaditvā ācikkhitabbayuttakaṃ sabbaṃ ācikkhitvā puṇṇakassa santikaṃ gantvā attano
atk-s0514a3:3031_2: niṭṭhitakiccataṃ ārocesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:3034: Mittāmacce ca bhacce ca, puttadāre ca bandhave.
atk-s0514a3:3039: “Avasī tuvaṃ mayha tīhaṃ agāre, katāni kiccāni gharesu mayhaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3040: Anusāsitā puttadārā mayā ca, karoma kaccāna yathāmatiṃ te”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3041_0: Tattha kammantaṃ saṃvidhetvānāti “evañca kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ghare kattabbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3041_1: kammaṃ saṃvidahitvā. Nidhinti nidahitvā ṭhapitadhanaṃ. Iṇadānanti iṇavasena saṃyojitadhanaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3041_2: Yathāmatiṃ teti idāni tava ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ karomāti vadati.
atk-s0514a3:3044: “Sace hi katte anusāsitā te, puttā ca dārā anujīvino ca;
atk-s0514a3:3045: Handehi dānī taramānarūpo, dīgho hi addhāpi ayaṃ puratthā.
atk-s0514a3:3049: Tattha katteti somanassappatto yakkho mahāsattaṃ ālapati. Dīgho hi addhāpīti gantabbamaggopi dīgho. “Achambhitovā”ti idaṃ so heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ anotaritvā tatova gantukāmo hutvā avaca.
atk-s0514a3:3052: “Sohaṃ kissa nu bhāyissaṃ, yassa me natthi dukkaṭaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3053: Kāyena vācā manasā, yena gaccheyya duggati”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3054: Tattha sohaṃ kissa nu bhāyissanti idaṃ mahāsatto “achambhitova gaṇhāhī”ti vuttattā evamāha.
atk-s0514a3:3055_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto sīhanādaṃ naditvā achambhito kesarasīho viya nibbhayo hutvā “ayaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3055_1: sāṭako mama aruciyā mā muccatū”ti adhiṭṭhānapāramiṃ purecārikaṃ katvā daḷhaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0514a3:3055_2: assassa vāladhiṃ viyūhitvā ubhohi hatthehi daḷhaṃ vāladhiṃ gahetvā dvīhi pādehi assassa
atk-s0514a3:3055_3: ūrūsu paliveṭhetvā “māṇava, gahito me vāladhi, yathāruci yāhī”ti āha. Tasmiṃ khaṇe
atk-s0514a3:3055_4: puṇṇako manomayasindhavassa saññaṃ adāsi. So paṇḍitaṃ ādāya ākāse pakkhandi. Tamatthaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3059_0: Tattha sākhāsu selesu asajjamānoti puṇṇako kira cintesi “dūraṃ agantvāva imaṃ himavantappadese
atk-s0514a3:3059_1: rukkhesu pabbatesu ca pothetvā māretvā hadayamaṃsaṃ ādāya kaḷevaraṃ pabbatantare
atk-s0514a3:3059_2: chaḍḍetvā nāgabhavanameva gamissāmī”ti. So rukkhe ca pabbate ca apariharitvā tesaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3059_3: majjheneva assaṃ pesesi. Mahāsattassānubhāvena rukkhāpi pabbatāpi sarīrato ubhosu
atk-s0514a3:3059_4: passesu ratanamattaṃ paṭikkamanti. So “mato vā, no vā”ti parivattitvā mahāsattassa
atk-s0514a3:3059_5: mukhaṃ olokento kañcanādāsamiva vippasannaṃ disvā “ayaṃ evaṃ na maratī”ti punapi
atk-s0514a3:3059_6: sakalahimavantappadese rukkhe ca pabbate ca tikkhattuṃ pothento pesesi. Evaṃ pothentopi
atk-s0514a3:3059_7: tatheva rukkhapabbatā dūrameva paṭikkamantiyeva. Mahāsatto pana kilantakāyo ahosi.
atk-s0514a3:3059_8: Atha puṇṇako “ayaṃ neva marati, idāni vātakkhandhe cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karissāmī”ti kodhābhibhūto
atk-s0514a3:3059_9: sattamaṃ vātakkhandhaṃ pakkhandi. Bodhisattassānubhāvena vātakkhandho dvidhā hutvā
atk-s0514a3:3059_10: bodhisattassa okāsaṃ akāsi. Tato verambhavātehi paharāpesi, verambhavātāpi satasahassaasanisaddo
atk-s0514a3:3059_11: viya hutvā bodhisattassa okāsaṃ adaṃsu. So puṇṇako tassa antarāyābhāvaṃ passanto
atk-s0514a3:3059_12: taṃ ādāya kāḷapabbataṃ agamāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0514a3:3062: Tattha asajjamānoti alaggamāno appaṭihaññamāno vidhurapaṇḍitaṃ vahanto kāḷapabbatamatthakaṃ upāgato.
atk-s0514a3:3063_0: Evaṃ puṇṇakassa mahāsattaṃ gahetvā gatakāle paṇḍitassa puttadārādayo puṇṇakassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3063_1: gantvā tattha mahāsattaṃ adisvā chinnapādā viya patitvā aparāparaṃ parivattamānā
atk-s0514a3:3063_2: mahāsaddena parideviṃsu. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:3068: “Orodhā ca kumārā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
atk-s0514a3:3080: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, ‘paṇḍito so kuhiṃ gato’.
atk-s0514a3:3081: “Orodhā ca kumārā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
atk-s0514a3:3082: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, ‘paṇḍito so kuhiṃ gato’.
atk-s0514a3:3084: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, ‘paṇḍito so kuhiṃ gato’.
atk-s0514a3:3087: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, ‘paṇḍito so kuhiṃ gato”’ti.
atk-s0514a3:3088_0: Evaṃ pakkanditvā ca pana te sabbepi sakalanagaravāsīhi saddhiṃ roditvā rājadvāraṃ
atk-s0514a3:3088_1: agamaṃsu. Rājā mahantaṃ paridevasaddaṃ sutvā sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā “tumhe kasmā
atk-s0514a3:3088_2: paridevathā”ti pucchi. Athassa te “deva, so kira māṇavo na brāhmaṇo, yakkho pana
atk-s0514a3:3088_3: brāhmaṇavaṇṇena āgantvā paṇḍitaṃ ādāya gato, tena vinā amhākaṃ jīvitaṃ natthi. Sace
atk-s0514a3:3088_4: so ito sattame divase nāgamissati, sakaṭasatehi sakaṭasahassehi ca dārūni saṅkaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0514a3:3088_5: sabbe mayaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletvā pavisissāmā”ti imamatthaṃ ārocentā imaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0514a3:3091: Sabbe aggiṃ pavekkhāma, natthattho jīvitena no”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3092_0: Sammāsambuddhassa parinibbutakālepi “mayaṃ aggiṃ pavisitvā marissāmā”ti vattāro nāma
atk-s0514a3:3092_1: nāhesuṃ. Aho subhāsitaṃ mahāsatte nāgarehīti. Rājā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “tumhe mā cintayittha,
atk-s0514a3:3092_2: mā socittha, mā paridevittha, madhurakatho paṇḍito māṇavaṃ dhammakathāya palobhetvā
atk-s0514a3:3092_3: attano pādesu pātetvā sakalanagaravāsīnaṃ assumukhaṃ hāsayanto na cirasseva āgamissatī”ti
atk-s0514a3:3094: “Paṇḍito ca viyatto ca, vibhāvī ca vicakkhaṇo;
atk-s0514a3:3096_0: Tattha viyattoti veyyattiyā vicāraṇapaññāya samannāgato. Vibhāvīti atthānatthaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3096_1: vibhāvetvā dassetvā kathetuṃ samattho. Vicakkhaṇoti taṅkhaṇeyeva ṭhānuppattikāya
atk-s0514a3:3096_2: kāraṇacintanapaññāya yutto. Mā bhāyitthāti mā bhāyatha, attānaṃ mocetvā khippaṃ āgamissatīti assāseti.
atk-s0514a3:3097: Nāgarāpi “paṇḍito kira rañño kathetvā gato bhavissatī”ti assāsaṃ paṭilabhitvā attano gehāni pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:3100_0: Puṇṇakopi mahāsattaṃ kāḷāgirimatthake ṭhapetvā “imasmiṃ jīvamāne mayhaṃ vuḍḍhi nāma
atk-s0514a3:3100_1: natthi, imaṃ māretvā hadayamaṃsaṃ gahetvā nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā vimalāya datvā irandhatiṃ
atk-s0514a3:3100_2: gahetvā devalokaṃ gamissāmī”ti cintesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:3102: “So tattha gantvāna vicintayanto, uccāvacā cetanakā bhavanti;
atk-s0514a3:3103: Nayimassa jīvena mamatthi kiñci, hantvānimaṃ hadayamānayissa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3104_0: Tattha soti so puṇṇako. Tattha gantvānāti gantvā tattha kāḷāgirimatthake ṭhito. Uccāvacā
atk-s0514a3:3104_1: cetanakā bhavantīti khaṇe khaṇe uppajjamānā cetanā uccāpi avacāpi uppajjanti. Ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3104_2: kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ mametassa jīvitadānacetanāpi uppajjeyyāti. Imassa pana jīvitena
atk-s0514a3:3104_3: tahiṃ nāgabhavane mama appamattakampi kiñci kiccaṃ natthi, idhevimaṃ māretvā assa
atk-s0514a3:3105_0: Tato puna cintesi “yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ sahatthena amāretvā bheravarūpadassanena jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3105_1: pāpeyya”nti. So bheravayakkharūpaṃ nimminitvā mahāsattaṃ tajjento āgantvā taṃ pātetvā
atk-s0514a3:3105_2: dāṭhānaṃ antare katvā khāditukāmo viya ahosi, mahāsattassa lomahaṃsanamattampi nāhosi.
atk-s0514a3:3105_3: Tato sīharūpena mattamahāhatthirūpena ca āgantvā dāṭhāhi ceva dantehi ca vijjhitukāmo
atk-s0514a3:3105_4: viya ahosi. Tathāpi abhāyantassa ekadoṇikanāvappamāṇaṃ mahantaṃ sappavaṇṇaṃ nimminitvā
atk-s0514a3:3105_5: assasanto passasanto “susū”ti saddaṃ karonto āgantvā mahāsattassa sakalasarīraṃ veṭhetvā
atk-s0514a3:3105_6: matthake phaṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhāsi, tassa sārajjamattampi nāhosi. Atha “naṃ pabbatamatthake
atk-s0514a3:3105_7: ṭhapetvā pātetvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karissāmī”ti mahāvātaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi. So tassa kesaggamattampi
atk-s0514a3:3105_8: cāletuṃ nāsakkhi. Atha naṃ tattheva pabbatamatthake ṭhapetvā hatthī viya khajjūrirukkhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3105_9: pabbataṃ aparāparaṃ cālesi, tathāpi naṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānato kesaggamattampi cāletuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0514a3:3106_0: Tato “saddasantāsenassa hadayaphālanaṃ katvā māressāmī”ti antopabbataṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0514a3:3106_1: pathaviñca nabhañca ekaninnādaṃ karonto mahānādaṃ nadi, evampissa sārajjamattampi
atk-s0514a3:3106_2: nāhosi. Jānāti hi mahāsatto “yakkhasīhahatthināgarājavesehi āgatopi mahāvātavuṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0514a3:3106_3: samuṭṭhāpakopi pabbatacalanaṃ karontopi antopabbataṃ pavisitvā nādaṃ vissajjentopi
atk-s0514a3:3106_4: māṇavoyeva, na añño”ti. Tato puṇṇako cintesi “nāhaṃ imaṃ bāhirupakkamena māretuṃ
atk-s0514a3:3106_5: sakkomi, sahattheneva naṃ māressāmī”ti. Tato yakkho mahāsattaṃ pabbatamuddhani ṭhapetvā
atk-s0514a3:3106_6: pabbatapādaṃ gantvā maṇikkhandhe paṇḍusuttaṃ pavesento viya pabbataṃ pavisitvā tāsento
atk-s0514a3:3106_7: vagganto antopabbatena uggantvā mahāsattaṃ pāde daḷhaṃ gahetvā parivattetvā adhosiraṃ
atk-s0514a3:3106_8: katvā anālambe ākāse vissajjesi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0514a3:3108: “So tattha gantvā pabbatantarasmiṃ, anto pavisitvāna paduṭṭhacitto;
atk-s0514a3:3110_0: Tattha so tattha gantvāti so puṇṇako pabbatamatthakā pabbatapādaṃ gantvā tattha pabbatantare
atk-s0514a3:3110_1: ṭhatvā tassa anto pavisitvā pabbatamatthake ṭhitassa heṭṭhā paññāyamāno asaṃvute
atk-s0514a3:3110_2: bhūmipadese dhāresīti. Na āditova dhāresi, tattha pana taṃ khipitvā pannarasayojanamattaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3110_3: bhaṭṭhakāle pabbatamuddhani ṭhitova hatthaṃ vaḍḍhetvā adhosiraṃ bhassantaṃ pādesu
atk-s0514a3:3110_4: gahetvā adhosirameva ukkhipitvā mukhaṃ olokento “na maratī”ti ñatvā dutiyampi khipitvā
atk-s0514a3:3110_5: tiṃsayojanamattaṃ bhaṭṭhakāle tatheva ukkhipitvā puna tassa mukhaṃ olokento jīvantameva
atk-s0514a3:3110_6: disvā cintesi “sace idāni saṭṭhiyojanamattaṃ bhassitvā na marissati, pādesu naṃ gahetvā
atk-s0514a3:3110_7: pabbatamuddhani pothetvā māressāmī”ti atha naṃ tatiyampi khipitvā saṭṭhiyojanamattaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3110_8: bhaṭṭhakāle hatthaṃ vaḍḍhetvā pādesu gahetvā ukkhipi. Tato mahāsatto cintesi “ayaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3110_9: maṃ paṭhamaṃ pannarasayojanaṭṭhānaṃ khipi, dutiyampi tiṃsayojanaṃ, tatiyampi saṭṭhiyojanaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:3110_10: idāni puna maṃ na khipissati, ukkhipantoyeva pabbatamuddhani paharitvā māressati,
atk-s0514a3:3110_11: yāva maṃ ukkhipitvā pabbatamuddhani na potheti, tāva naṃ adhosiro hutvā olambantova
atk-s0514a3:3110_12: māraṇakāraṇaṃ pucchissāmī”ti. Evaṃ cintetvā ca pana so achambhito asantasanto tathā
atk-s0514a3:3110_13: akāsi. Tena vuttaṃ “dhārayi kātiyāno”ti, tikkhattuṃ khipitvā dhārayīti attho.
atk-s0514a3:3112: “So lambamāno narake papāte, mahabbhaye lomahaṃse vidugge;
atk-s0514a3:3113: Asantasanto kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭho, iccabravi puṇṇakaṃ nāma yakkhaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3116: Accāhitaṃ kammaṃ karosi ludraṃ, bhāve ca te kusalaṃ natthi kiñci.
atk-s0514a3:3118: “Yaṃ maṃ papātasmiṃ papātumicchasi, ko nu tavattho maraṇena mayhaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3119: Amānusasseva tavajja vaṇṇo, ācikkha me tvaṃ katamāsi devatāti.
atk-s0514a3:3120_0: Tattha so lambamānoti so kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭho tatiyavāre lambamāno. Ariyāvakāsoti
atk-s0514a3:3120_1: rūpena ariyasadiso devavaṇṇo hutvā carasi. Asaññatoti kāyādīhi asaññato dussīlo.
atk-s0514a3:3120_2: Accāhitanti hitātikkantaṃ, atiahitaṃ vā. Bhāve ca teti tava citte appamattakampi
atk-s0514a3:3120_3: kusalaṃ natthi. Amānusasseva tavajja vaṇṇoti ajja tava idaṃ kāraṇaṃ amānusasseva.
atk-s0514a3:3120_4: Katamāsi devatāti yakkhānaṃ antare katarayakkho nāma tvaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3123: “Yadi te suto puṇṇako nāma yakkho, rañño kuverassa hi so sajibbo;
atk-s0514a3:3124: Bhūmindharo varuṇo nāma nāgo, brahā sucī vaṇṇabalūpapanno.
atk-s0514a3:3126: “Tassānujaṃ dhītaraṃ kāmayāmi, irandhatī nāma sā nāgakaññā;
atk-s0514a3:3127: Tassā sumajjhāya piyāya hetu, patārayiṃ tuyha vadhāya dhīrā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3128_0: Tattha sajibboti sajīvo amacco. Brahāti ārohapariṇāhasampanno uṭṭhāpitakañcanarūpasadiso.
atk-s0514a3:3128_1: Vaṇṇabalūpapannoti sarīravaṇṇena ca kāyabalena ca upagato. Tassānujanti tassa anujātaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3128_2: dhītaraṃ. Patārayinti cittaṃ pavattesiṃ, sanniṭṭhānamakāsinti attho.
atk-s0514a3:3129: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “ayaṃ loko duggahitena nassati, nāgamāṇavikaṃ patthentassa mama maraṇena kiṃ payojanaṃ, tathato kāraṇaṃ jānissāmī”ti cintetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3131: “Mā heva tvaṃ yakkha ahosi mūḷho, naṭṭhā bahū duggahītena loke;
atk-s0514a3:3132: Kiṃ te sumajjhāya piyāya kiccaṃ, maraṇena me iṅgha suṇomi sabba”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3133: Taṃ sutvā tassa ācikkhanto puṇṇako āha –
atk-s0514a3:3136: Taṃ yācamānaṃ sasuro avoca, yathā mamaññiṃsu sukāmanītaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3138: “Dajjemu kho te sutanuṃ sunettaṃ, sucimhitaṃ candanalittagattaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3139: Sace tuvaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍitassa, dhammena laddhā idha māharesi;
atk-s0514a3:3140: Etena vittena kumāri labbhā, naññaṃ dhanaṃ uttari patthayāma.
atk-s0514a3:3142: “Evaṃ na mūḷhosmi suṇohi katte, na cāpi me duggahitatthi kiñci;
atk-s0514a3:3143: Hadayena te dhammaladdhena nāgā, irandhatiṃ nāgakaññaṃ dadanti.
atk-s0514a3:3145: “Tasmā ahaṃ tuyhaṃ vadhāya yutto, evaṃ mamattho maraṇena tuyhaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3146: Idheva taṃ narake pātayitvā, hantvāna taṃ hadayamānayissa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3147_0: Tattha dhītukāmoti dhītaraṃ kāmemi patthemi, dhītu atthāya vicarāmi. Ñātibhatohamasmīti
atk-s0514a3:3147_1: tasmā tassa ñātibhatako nāma ahaṃ amhi. Tanti taṃ nāgakaññaṃ. Yācamānanti yācantaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3147_2: maṃ. Yathā manti yasmā maṃ. Aññiṃsūti jāniṃsu. Sukāmanītanti suṭṭhu esa kāmena nītoti
atk-s0514a3:3147_3: sukāmanīto, taṃ sukāmanītaṃ. Tasmā sasuro ‘dajjemu kho te”tiādimavoca. Tattha dajjemūti
atk-s0514a3:3147_4: dadeyyāma. Sutanunti sundarasarīraṃ. Idha māharesīti idha nāgabhavane dhammena laddhā āhareyyāsīti.
atk-s0514a3:3148_0: Tassa taṃ kathaṃ sutvā mahāsatto cintesi “vimalāya mama hadayena kiccaṃ natthi, varuṇanāgarājena
atk-s0514a3:3148_1: mama dhammakathaṃ sutvā maṇinā maṃ pūjetvā tattha gatena mama dhammakathikabhāvo
atk-s0514a3:3148_2: vaṇṇito bhavissati, tato vimalāya mama dhammakathāya dohaḷo uppanno bhavissati, varuṇena
atk-s0514a3:3148_3: duggahitaṃ gahetvā puṇṇako āṇatto bhavissati, svāyaṃ attanā duggahitena maṃ māretuṃ
atk-s0514a3:3148_4: evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ pāpesi, mama paṇḍitabhāvo ṭhānuppattikāraṇacintanasamatthatā imasmiṃ
atk-s0514a3:3148_5: maṃ mārente kiṃ karissati, handāhaṃ saññāpessāmi na”nti. Cintetvā ca pana “māṇava,
atk-s0514a3:3148_6: sādhunaradhammaṃ nāma jānāmi, yāvāhaṃ na marāmi, tāva maṃ pabbatamuddhani nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0514a3:3148_7: sādhunaradhammaṃ nāma suṇohi, pacchā yaṃ icchasi, taṃ kareyyāsī”ti vatvā sādhunaradhammaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3148_8: vaṇṇetvā attano jīvitaṃ āharāpento so adhosiro olambantova gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3150: “Khippaṃ mamaṃ uddhara kātiyāna, hadayena me yadi te atthi kiccaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3151: Ye kecime sādhunarassa dhammā, sabbeva te pātukaromi ajjā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3152_0: Taṃ sutvā puṇṇako “ayaṃ paṇḍitena devamanussānaṃ akathitapubbo dhammo bhavissati,
atk-s0514a3:3152_1: khippameva naṃ uddharitvā sādhunaradhammaṃ suṇissāmī”ti cintetvā mahāsattaṃ ukkhipitvā
atk-s0514a3:3152_2: pabbatamuddhani nisīdāpesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:3154: “So puṇṇako kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭhaṃ, nagamuddhani khippaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā;
atk-s0514a3:3157: “Samuddhaṭo mesi tuvaṃ papātā, hadayena te ajja mamatthi kiccaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3158: Ye kecime sādhunarassa dhammā, sabbeva me pātukarohi ajjā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3159: Tattha assatthamāsīnanti laddhassāsaṃ hutvā nisinnaṃ. Samekkhiyānāti disvā. Sādhunarassa dhammāti narassa sādhudhammā, sundaradhammāti attho.
atk-s0514a3:3162: “Samuddhaṭo tyasmi ahaṃ papātā, hadayena me yadi te atthi kiccaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3163: Ye kecime sādhunarassa dhammā, sabbeva te pātukaromi ajjā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3165_0: Atha naṃ mahāsatto “kiliṭṭhagattomhi, nhāyāmi tāvā”ti āha. Yakkhopi “sādhū”ti nhānodakaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3165_1: āharitvā nhātakāle mahāsattassa dibbadussagandhamālādīni datvā alaṅkatappaṭiyattakāle
atk-s0514a3:3165_2: dibbabhojanaṃ adāsi. Atha mahāsatto bhuttabhojano kāḷāgirimatthakaṃ alaṅkārāpetvā
atk-s0514a3:3165_3: āsanaṃ paññāpetvā alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvā buddhalīlāya sādhunaradhammaṃ desento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3167: “Yātānuyāyī ca bhavāhi māṇava, allañca pāṇiṃ parivajjayassu;
atk-s0514a3:3168: Mā cassu mittesu kadāci dubbhī, mā ca vasaṃ asatīnaṃ nigacche”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3169: Tattha allañca pāṇiṃ parivajjayassūti allaṃ tintaṃ pāṇiṃ mā dahi mā jhāpehi.
atk-s0514a3:3170: Yakkho saṃkhittena bhāsite cattāro sādhunaradhamme bujjhituṃ asakkonto vitthārena pucchanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3172: “Kathaṃ nu yātaṃ anuyāyi hoti, allañca pāṇiṃ dahate kathaṃ so;
atk-s0514a3:3173: Asatī ca kā ko pana mittadubbho, akkhāhi me pucchito etamattha”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3176: “Asanthutaṃ nopi ca diṭṭhapubbaṃ, yo āsanenāpi nimantayeyya;
atk-s0514a3:3177: Tasseva atthaṃ puriso kareyya, yātānuyāyīti tamāhu paṇḍitā.
atk-s0514a3:3180: Na tassa pāpaṃ manasāpi cintaye, adubbhapāṇiṃ dahate mittadubbho.
atk-s0514a3:3183: Na tassa sākhaṃ bhañjeyya, mittadubbho hi pāpako.
atk-s0514a3:3185: “Puṇṇampi cemaṃ pathaviṃ dhanena, dajjitthiyā puriso sammatāya;
atk-s0514a3:3186: Laddhā khaṇaṃ atimaññeyya tampi, tāsaṃ vasaṃ asatīnaṃ na gacche.
atk-s0514a3:3190: Asatī ca sā so pana mittadubbho,
atk-s0514a3:3192_0: Tattha asanthutanti ekāhadvīhampi ekato avutthapubbaṃ. Yo āsanenāpīti yo evarūpaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3192_1: puggalaṃ āsanamattenapi nimantayeyya, pageva annapānādīhi. Tassevāti tassa pubbakārissa
atk-s0514a3:3192_2: atthaṃ puriso karoteva. Yātānuyāyīti pubbakāritāya yātassa puggalassa anuyāyī. Paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3192_3: karonto hi yāyī nāma, pacchā karonto anuyāyī nāmāti evaṃ paṇḍitā kathenti. Ayaṃ devarāja,
atk-s0514a3:3192_4: paṭhamo sādhunaradhammo. Adubbhapāṇinti adubbhakaṃ attano bhuñjanahatthameva dahanto
atk-s0514a3:3192_5: hi mittadubbhī nāma hoti. Iti allahatthassa ajjhāpanaṃ nāma ayaṃ dutiyo sādhunaradhammo.
atk-s0514a3:3192_6: Na tassāti tassa sākhaṃ vā pattaṃ vā na bhañjeyya. Kiṃkāraṇā? Mittadubbho hi pāpako.
atk-s0514a3:3192_7: Iti paribhuttacchāyassa acetanassa rukkhassapi pāpaṃ karonto mittadubbhī nāma hoti,
atk-s0514a3:3192_8: kimaṅgaṃ pana manussabhūtassāti. Evaṃ mittesu adubbhanaṃ nāma ayaṃ tatiyo sādhunaradhammo.
atk-s0514a3:3192_9: Dajjitthiyāti dadeyya itthiyā. Sammatāyāti “ahameva tassā piyo, na añño, maññeva
atk-s0514a3:3192_10: sā icchatī”ti evaṃ suṭṭhu matāya. Laddhā khaṇanti aticārassa okāsaṃ labhitvā. Asatīnanti
atk-s0514a3:3192_11: asaddhammasamannāgatānaṃ itthīnaṃ. Iti mātugāmaṃ nissāya pāpassa akaraṇaṃ nāma ayaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3192_12: catuttho sādhunaradhammo. So dhammiko hohīti devarāja, so tvaṃ imehi catūhi sādhunaradhammehi yutto hohīti.
atk-s0514a3:3193: Evaṃ mahāsatto yakkhassa cattāro sādhunaradhamme buddhalīlāya kathesi.
atk-s0514a3:3196_0: Te dhamme suṇantoyeva puṇṇako sallakkhesi “catūsupi ṭhānesu paṇḍito attano jīvitameva
atk-s0514a3:3196_1: yācati, ayaṃ kho mayhaṃ pubbe asanthutasseva sakkāramakāsi, ahamassa nivesane tīhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3196_2: mahantaṃ yasaṃ anubhavanto vasiṃ, ahañcimaṃ pāpakammaṃ karonto mātugāmaṃ nissāya
atk-s0514a3:3196_3: karomi, sabbathāpi ahameva mittadubbhī. Sace paṇḍitaṃ aparajjhāmi, na sādhunaradhamme
atk-s0514a3:3196_4: vattissāmi nāma, tasmā kiṃ me nāgamāṇavikāya, indapatthanagaravāsīnaṃ assumukhāni
atk-s0514a3:3196_5: hāsento imaṃ vegena tattha netvā dhammasabhāyaṃ otāressāmī”ti cintetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3198: “Avasiṃ ahaṃ tuyha tīhaṃ agāre, annena pānena upaṭṭhitosmi;
atk-s0514a3:3199: Mitto mamāsī visajjāmahaṃ taṃ, kāmaṃ gharaṃ uttamapañña gaccha.
atk-s0514a3:3201: Api hāyatu nāgakulā attho, alampi me nāgakaññāya hotu;
atk-s0514a3:3202: So tvaṃ sakeneva subhāsitena, muttosi me ajja vadhāya paññā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3203: Tattha upaṭṭhitosmīti tayā upaṭṭhitosmi. Visajjāmahaṃ tanti vissajjemi ahaṃ taṃ. Kāmanti ekaṃsena. Vadhāyāti vadhato. Paññāti paññavanta.
atk-s0514a3:3204: Atha naṃ mahāsatto “māṇava, tvaṃ tāva maṃ attano gharaṃ mā pesehi, nāgabhavanameva maṃ nehī”ti vadanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3206: “Handa tuvaṃ yakkha mamampi nehi, sasuraṃ te atthaṃ mayi carassu;
atk-s0514a3:3207: Mayañca nāgādhipatiṃ vimānaṃ, dakkhemu nāgassa adiṭṭhapubba”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3208_0: Tattha handāti vavassaggatthe nipāto. Sasuraṃ te atthaṃ mayi carassūti tava sasurassa
atk-s0514a3:3208_1: santakaṃ atthaṃ mayi cara mā nāsehi. Nāgādhipatiṃ vimānanti ahampi nāgādhipatiñca
atk-s0514a3:3211: “Yaṃ ve narassa ahitāya assa, na taṃ pañño arahati dassanāya;
atk-s0514a3:3212: Atha kena vaṇṇena amittagāmaṃ, tuvamicchasi uttamapañña gantu”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3213: Tattha amittagāmanti amittassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ, amittasamāgamanti attho.
atk-s0514a3:3216: “Addhā pajānāmi ahampi etaṃ, na taṃ pañño arahati dassanāya;
atk-s0514a3:3217: Pāpañca me natthi kataṃ kuhiñci, tasmā na saṅke maraṇāgamāyā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3219_0: Apica, devarāja, tādiso yakkho kakkhaḷo mayā dhammakathāya palobhetvā mudukato, idāneva
atk-s0514a3:3219_1: maṃ “alaṃ me nāgamāṇavikāya, attano gharaṃ yāhī”ti vadesi, nāgarājassa mudukaraṇaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3219_2: mama bhāro, nehiyeva maṃ tatthāti. Tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā puṇṇako “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā tuṭṭhacitto āha –
atk-s0514a3:3221: “Handa ca ṭhānaṃ atulānubhāvaṃ, mayā saha dakkhasi ehi katte;
atk-s0514a3:3222: Yatthacchati naccagītehi nāgo, rājā yathā vessavaṇo naḷiññaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3224: “Naṃ nāgakaññā caritaṃ gaṇena, nikīḷitaṃ niccamaho ca rattiṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3227: “Annena pānena upetarūpaṃ, naccehi gītehi ca vāditehi;
atk-s0514a3:3229_0: Tattha handa cāti nipātamattameva. Ṭhānanti nāgarājassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ. Naḷiññanti
atk-s0514a3:3229_1: naḷiniyaṃ nāma rājadhāniyaṃ. Caritaṃ gaṇenāti taṃ nāgakaññānaṃ gaṇena caritaṃ. Nikīḷitanti
atk-s0514a3:3229_2: niccaṃ aho ca rattiñca nāgakaññāhi kīḷitānukīḷitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3230: Evañca pana vatvā puṇṇako mahāsattaṃ assapiṭṭhaṃ āropetvā tattha nesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:3232: “So puṇṇako kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭhaṃ, nisīdayī pacchato āsanasmiṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3235: “Patvāna ṭhānaṃ atulānubhāvaṃ, aṭṭhāsi kattā pacchato puṇṇakassa;
atk-s0514a3:3237_0: Tattha so puṇṇakoti bhikkhave, so evaṃ nāgabhavanaṃ vaṇṇetvā paṇḍitaṃ attano ājaññaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3237_1: āropetvā nāgabhavanaṃ nesi. Ṭhānanti nāgarājassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ. Pacchato puṇṇakassāti
atk-s0514a3:3237_2: puṇṇakassa kira etadahosi “sace nāgarājā paṇḍitaṃ disvā muducitto bhavissati, iccetaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3237_3: kusalaṃ. No ce, tassa taṃ apassantasseva sindhavaṃ āropetvā ādāya gamissāmī”ti. Atha
atk-s0514a3:3237_4: naṃ pacchato ṭhapesi. Tena vuttaṃ “pacchato puṇṇakassā”ti. Sāmaggipekkhamānoti sāmaggiṃ
atk-s0514a3:3237_5: apekkhamāno. “Sāmaṃ apekkhī”tipi pāṭho, attano jāmātaraṃ passitvā paṭhamataraṃ sayameva
atk-s0514a3:3240: “Yannu tuvaṃ agamā maccalokaṃ, anvesamāno hadayaṃ paṇḍitassa;
atk-s0514a3:3242: Tattha kacci samiddhenāti kacci te manorathena samiddhena nipphannena idhāgatosīti pucchati.
atk-s0514a3:3245: “Ayañhi so āgato yaṃ tvamicchasi, dhammena laddho mama dhammapālo;
atk-s0514a3:3246: Taṃ passatha sammukhā bhāsamānaṃ, sukho have sappurisehi saṅgamo”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3247_0: Tattha yaṃ tvamicchasīti yaṃ tvaṃ icchasi. “Yantu micchasī”tipi pāṭho. Sammukhā bhāsamānanti
atk-s0514a3:3247_1: taṃ lokasakkataṃ dhammapālaṃ idāni madhurena sarena dhammaṃ bhāsamānaṃ sammukhāva
atk-s0514a3:3247_2: passatha, sappurisehi ekaṭṭhāne samāgamo hi nāma sukho hotīti.
atk-s0514a3:3253_0: Tattha byamhitoti bhīto. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – paṇḍita, tvaṃ adiṭṭhapubbaṃ nāgabhavanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3253_1: disvā maraṇabhayena aṭṭito bhīto hutvā yaṃ maṃ nābhivādesi, idaṃ kāraṇaṃ paññavantānaṃ na hotīti.
atk-s0514a3:3254_0: Evaṃ vandanaṃ paccāsīsantaṃ nāgarājānaṃ mahāsatto “na tvaṃ mayā vanditabbo”ti avatvāva
atk-s0514a3:3254_1: attano ñāṇavantatāya upāyakosallena “ahaṃ vajjhappattabhāvena naṃ taṃ vandāmī”ti
atk-s0514a3:3256: “Na camhi byamhito nāga, na ca maccubhayaṭṭito;
atk-s0514a3:3257: Na vajjho abhivādeyya, vajjhaṃ vā nābhivādaye.
atk-s0514a3:3260: Yaṃ naro hantumiccheyya, taṃ kammaṃ nupapajjatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3261_0: Tassattho – nevāhaṃ, nāgarāja, adiṭṭhapubbaṃ nāgabhavanaṃ disvā bhīto, na maraṇabhayaṭṭito.
atk-s0514a3:3261_1: Mādisassa hi maraṇabhayaṃ nāma natthi, vajjho pana abhivādetuṃ, vajjhaṃ vā avajjhopi
atk-s0514a3:3261_2: abhivādāpetuṃ na labhati. Yañhi naro hantumiccheyya, so taṃ kathaṃ nu abhivādeyya,
atk-s0514a3:3261_3: kathaṃ vā tena attānaṃ abhivādāpayetha ve. Tassa hi taṃ kammaṃ na upapajjati. Tvañca
atk-s0514a3:3261_4: kira maṃ mārāpetuṃ imaṃ āṇāpesi, kathāhaṃ taṃ vandādhīti.
atk-s0514a3:3262: Taṃ sutvā nāgarājā mahāsattassa thutiṃ karonto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a3:3265: Na vajjho abhivādeyya, vajjhaṃ vā nābhivādaye.
atk-s0514a3:3268: Yaṃ naro hantumiccheyya, taṃ kammaṃ nupapajjatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3269: Idāni mahāsatto nāgarājena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karonto āha –
atk-s0514a3:3271: “Asassataṃ sassataṃ nu tavayidaṃ, iddhī jutī balavīriyūpapatti;
atk-s0514a3:3272: Pucchāmi taṃ nāgarājetamatthaṃ, kathaṃ nu te laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3274: “Adhiccaladdhaṃ pariṇāmajaṃ te, sayaṃkataṃ udāhu devehi dinnaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3275: Akkhāhi me nāgarājetamatthaṃ, yatheva te laddhamidaṃ vimāna”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3276_0: Tattha tavayidanti idaṃ tava yasajātaṃ, vimānaṃ vā asassataṃ sassatasadisaṃ, “mā
atk-s0514a3:3276_1: kho yasaṃ nissāya pāpamakāsī”ti iminā padena attano jīvitaṃ yācati. Iddhīti nāgaiddhi
atk-s0514a3:3276_2: ca nāgajuti ca kāyabalañca cetasikavīriyañca nāgabhavane upapatti ca yañca te idaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3276_3: vimānaṃ, pucchāmi taṃ nāgarāja, etamatthaṃ, kathaṃ nu te idaṃ sabbaṃ laddhanti. Adhiccaladdhanti
atk-s0514a3:3276_4: kiṃ nu tayā idaṃ vimānaṃ evaṃ sampannaṃ adhicca akāraṇena laddhaṃ, udāhu utupariṇāmajaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3276_5: te idaṃ, udāhu sayaṃ sahattheneva kataṃ, udāhu devehi te dinnaṃ, yatheva te idaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3279: “Nādhiccaladdhaṃ na pariṇāmajaṃ me, na sayaṃkataṃ nāpi devehi dinnaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3280: Sakehi kammehi apāpakehi, puññehi me laddhamidaṃ vimāna”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3284: “Kiṃ te vataṃ kiṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, kissa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
atk-s0514a3:3285: Iddhī jutī balavīriyūpapatti, idañca te nāga mahāvimāna”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3286: Tattha kiṃ te vatanti nāgarāja, purimabhave tava kiṃ vataṃ ahosi, ko pana brahmacariyavāso, katarassa sucaritassevesa iddhiādiko vipākoti.
atk-s0514a3:3289: “Ahañca bhariyā ca manussaloke, saddhā ubho dānapatī ahumhā;
atk-s0514a3:3290: Opānabhūtaṃ me gharaṃ tadāsi, santappitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca.
atk-s0514a3:3293: Acchādanaṃ sāyanamannapānaṃ, sakkacca dānāni adamha tattha.
atk-s0514a3:3295: “Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, tassa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
atk-s0514a3:3296: Iddhī jutī balavīriyūpapatti, idañca me dhīra mahāvimāna”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3297_0: Tattha manussaloketi aṅgaraṭṭhe kālacampānagare. Taṃ me vatanti taṃ sakkaccaṃ dinnadānameva
atk-s0514a3:3297_1: mayhaṃ vattasamādānañca brahmacariyañca ahosi, tasseva sucaritassa ayaṃ iddhādiko vipākoti.
atk-s0514a3:3300: “Evaṃ ce te laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ, jānāsi puññānaṃ phalūpapattiṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3301: Tasmā hi dhammaṃ cara appamatto, yathā vimānaṃ puna māvasesī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3302_0: Tattha jānāsīti sace tayā dānānubhāvena taṃ laddhaṃ, evaṃ sante jānāsi nāma puññānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3302_1: phalañca puññaphalena nibbattaṃ upapattiñca. Tasmā hīti yasmā puññehi tayā idaṃ laddhaṃ,
